teacher_info.intro:
Hey, bonjour ! I'm Tristan, from France! üá´üá∑
I was born and raised in Brittany and I lived there until I graduated with a Masters degree in language teaching and learning design. I've taught in different countries such as France, Poland and Taiwan where I live now. I started as a university TE of French in Taiwan until I decided to stay and become a full-time language teacher.
I'm passionate about education as a whole that I devote my life to. I also love linguistics, languages, music (that I've been teaching for many years as well), video games, sciences, horror movies, politics and too many other things... I'm a bit nerdy, let's say!
teacher_info.short_signature: Experienced young professional teacher with a master's in education

Hey, bonjour ! I'm Tristan, from France! üá´üá∑
I was born and raised in Brittany and I lived there until I graduated with a Masters degree in language teaching and learning design. I've taught in different countries such as France, Poland and Taiwan where I live now. I started as a university TE of French in Taiwan until I decided to stay and become a full-time language teacher.
I'm passionate about education as a whole that I devote my life to. I also love linguistics, languages, music (that I've been teaching for many years as well), video games, sciences, horror movies, politics and too many other things... I'm a bit nerdy, let's say!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
All I care about is:
- Wellbeing 
- Efficiency
- Confidence
- Motivation. 
It will always be my mission. If your motivation is high, then you can learn. I will fully adapt to you. I will not force you to do something that you genuinely don't want to do like homework or writing tasks. I'm very patient and enthusiastic about my job and I'm a very curious person so I love to know about my student's hobbies and try to articulate lessons around them. I try to keep a relaxed atmosphere in class and I will always do my best to make you feel safe. I'm also very flexible with schedules and methods so feel free to ask me if you need anything related to that!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My preferred method is through active learning. It's the most run-of-the-hill thing to say as a teacher but it's proven its efficacy countless times. I will make you guess things, teach you methodology to remember better and you will have exercises. A good teacher doesn't talk and explain non stop. They assist you, give you materials to learn from and guide through them. 
I'm very comfortable with any websites or technologies to learn, whether it be through games, videos, documents, mindmaps, texts, presentations, etc. I can always use what you prefer.
Again, your motivation is what matters most so if you want a more traditional approach, that's totally fine too!

teacher_info.teaching_style:
I like to begin with students by discussing their motivations, expectations, as well as any previous experience that they may have in their chosen subject. Think of it as a bit of an ice-breaker, wherein we can set goals, routines and parameters.

While others may desire to get in touch with their heritage; choosing to emerse themselves in the beautiful poetic culture of Urdu, or the religious serenity of classical Arabic.

Ultimately we can build a syllabus that works around you and your needs.
 So, why not book a trial today?

teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, my dear stidents, my name`s Olga, I come from Russia and I`m a native speaker of the language.

As far as my education is concerned, I`m a PhD holder in Russian Language and Literature. As well, I`m a certified and qualified professor of Russian for foreigners, with a diploma from Moscow University and one more from Saint Petersburg State University. Also, I`m a certified TRKI testor and have 2 certificates ( Moscow State University and Saint Petersburg State University).

I have been teaching for nine years now.

For my regular students I have a special discount (all students who took any sessions before 1st of May will have the same price for lessons as before).

Informal lessons only for students with B2 and up levels.

Thank you very much for your time and I am looking forward to meeting you!

Non-attendance policy: If you are late for a lesson, I will wait 15 minutes for you. If you are more than 15 minutes late, the lesson will not take place, but you will still need to pay for it.

Lesson cancellation policy: 24-hour notice is needed for lessons to be cancelled. If less than 24-hour notice is given, it will still be necessary for you to pay for the lesson, as I will be unable to give your lesson time to another student.

course_info.trial_description: Learning English basics as a beginner in the English language. This lesson will be mainly on the fundamentals and starting with namely; greetings, introducing yourself, numbers as well as everyday routines. All this is focused on being able introduce yourself in real life situations. The main focus being able to build confidence and feeling empowered and comfortable from the basics in speaking the language. The lesson will be conducted through body language for one, as body language can communicate greeting. This can also be taken as a real life situation. We will use vitalize the use of visual aids such as pictures and videos to better get the point across. All this amongst other methods such s capitalizing on students known language. We will also learn important everyday phrases like ''yes'', ''no'', ''please'' and ''thank you''

The lesson is based on everyday life abd scenarios. Lesson will be focused mainly on student being able how to greet or respond to being greeted. Building confidence in speaking the language even if it is just being able greet and introduce themselves for the time being. I will utilise the language known by my student to better communicate and ensure understanding of what is being taught, body language is also an effective way to showcase greeting and introductions. We will also have pictures and videos ready to display greetings. This will be an extremely educational lesson that will leave student confident and happy in their English language learning journey. I will also  ensure the ensure pronunciation is good for my students.

My students will also learn vocabulary associated with certain topics, this will boost their confidence in conversing in general, be it at work or on holiday, or even at home.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, I'm Saima!
I'm an experienced and certified language educator with a decade of teaching English, Urdu, and Punjabi to students of all ages and levels. Holding a Master's Degree in English Literature from The University of Punjab, I am passionate about language learning and firmly believe in the power of strategic planning to maximize student success. My commitment is to empower my students to achieve their language goals with confidence and efficiency, ensuring that each lesson brings them closer to fluency.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified Educator | 20+ Years of Experience in Language Mastery
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello, I'm Saima!
I'm an experienced and certified language educator with a decade of teaching English, Urdu, and Punjabi to students of all ages and levels. Holding a Master's Degree in English Literature from The University of Punjab, I am passionate about language learning and firmly believe in the power of strategic planning to maximize student success. My commitment is to empower my students to achieve their language goals with confidence and efficiency, ensuring that each lesson brings them closer to fluency.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I specialize in enhancing your skills across multiple languages with a focus on:

English: Mastering reading, comprehension, grammar, writing, and conversation.
Urdu: Refining reading, writing, and conversational abilities.
Punjabi: Developing conversational fluency.
Our lessons will delve into engaging topics like literature, arts, movies, travel, world history, culture, and even the fascinating world of animals, ensuring that our discussions are both enriching and stimulating.

I emphasize high-functioning conversations that target key problem areas, leveraging your current language knowledge while providing the necessary tools to boost your accuracy and fluency.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lesson plans are tailored to your specific level in English, Urdu, or Punjabi. The first step is to assess your current proficiency and identify areas where you need support. If you're a beginner, we'll follow a structured strategy designed to build a strong foundation. For advanced speakers, we'll focus on your passion projects, diving into thought-provoking articles or videos that I‚Äôll share with you beforehand. This personalized approach ensures that every lesson is relevant, engaging, and aligned with your language goals.

exp_info.description: I am a Certified Language Educator with over 20 years of experience teaching English, Urdu, and Punjabi both online and offline. My extensive background in the education industry has equipped me with the skills to effectively guide students of all levels. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, my tailored lessons are designed to meet your unique needs and help you achieve language mastery.

So feel free to discuss your objectives or requirements and have structured or unstructured lessons accordingly. Hope to see you in my class!

pro_course_detail.title: Punjabi Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you wish to learn how to become more fluent in your Punjabi speech and eventually how to sound more like a native speaker?  In this course you will practice and improve your fluency and pronunciation by examining in detail those elements of Punjabi, such as intonation and stress, which make native speakers sound the way they do. We will also discuss Punjabi culture. This course is for beginning to advanced students. In this course, I use different materials customized to cater the needs of my students. For example,
--PDF files
--Audios of these PDF files
--Powerpoint slides
--Songs and movies
--Stories for kids with PDF files as well as audios of these stories

teacher_info.intro:
*Please note: I only teach adults*. Hello! I'm Julian from South Africa. I have a 420-hour TEFL Diploma (Level 5). I specialise in Business English, Job Interview Preparation and Conversational Fluency. I mostly focus on helping working professionals who struggle to express their ideas clearly in business and social situations. My effective methods and system will enable you to both speak and think in English.
Many of my students have shared their success stories after having classes with me. Some of these stories include being able to do a presentation in English for the first time, participating effectively in business meetings, closing a deal in a negotiation and passing a job interview.
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified teacher specialising in Business English, Interview Preparation and Conversational Fluency
teacher_info.about_me:
*Please note: I only teach adults*. Hello! I'm Julian from South Africa. I have a 420-hour TEFL Diploma (Level 5). teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a professional and patient teacher who can easily adapt to the needs of my students and immediately identify problem areas in your communication that needs improvement. 
I offer constructive feedback which helps you to improve from lesson to lesson. One of my strengths is the ability to listen attentively to the student's specific needs and create a plan for them to achieve their desired goals. Every goal will be measurable. 
My ability to ask relevant and thought-provoking questions in the classroom will challenge you to think critically and creatively in my lessons.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Every class has a different structure depending on your needs. A usual class follows a 3-part structure: 
1. Vocabulary building (learning topic-based vocabulary to prepare you for discussions and simulations)
2. Discussion (building fluency based on the topic-based vocabulary you have learned)
3. Tasks/simulations/roleplaying (using the topic-based vocabulary in real-life situations)

exp_info.description: At ABC360, I taught children, business people and IELTS. I helped university students with their presentations. Business people were taught how to use English in their workplace in situations such as meetings and negotiations.
At the iTutorGroup, I taught conversational English in both one-to-one and group classes.

cert_info.description: This is a 420-hour Advanced TEFL Diploma. I had to complete seven written assignments to gain this qualification. This qualification allows me to teach General English, Business English, IELTS and CLIL.

specialty_cert.description: This diploma included a 60-hour Teaching Business English certificate which covered all aspects of the teaching Business English such as lesson planning, teaching business vocabulary, speaking, grammar, writing and pronunciation.

My 420-hour TEFL Advanced Diploma included a 60-hour certificate called "Prepare Learners for an English Language Examination". This certificate covered all parts of the IELTS examination (speaking, writing, listening and reading) and provided strategies which will help learner achieve their required band score.

sorted_cert_info.description: This is a 420-hour Advanced TEFL Diploma. I had to complete seven written assignments to gain this qualification. This qualification allows me to teach General English, Business English, IELTS and CLIL.

This diploma included a 60-hour Teaching Business English certificate which covered all aspects of the teaching Business English such as lesson planning, teaching business vocabulary, speaking, grammar, writing and pronunciation.

My 420-hour TEFL Advanced Diploma included a 60-hour certificate called "Prepare Learners for an English Language Examination". This certificate covered all parts of the IELTS examination (speaking, writing, listening and reading) and provided strategies which will help learner achieve their required band score.

course_info.trial_description: The trial lesson will be about finding out more information about yourself and your English goals. It will also give you an opportunity to see how I teach and plan my lessons. I will be able to assess your English proficiency as we speak and offer suggestions about the way forward. I can develop both short-term plans (1-3 months) as well as long-term plans (6-12 months). In this way, we can work systematically and more effectively.

pro_course_detail.title: Speak Business English with clarity and confidence!
pro_course_detail.description:
Globalization requires that you have the right skill set to engage with the international business community. I have experience teaching Business English to professionals from multinational companies such as Microsoft, BMW, Mastercard, Gucci, TikTok, Huawei, Unilever and Shell Oil Company. 

I teach both employers and employees on how to become effective communicators in the workplace. In my classes will cover topics such as:

- how to develop and express your ideas clearly and confidently
- business meetings (how to chair and participate in meetings)
- presentations (how to deliver an unforgettable presentation)
- negotiations (how to achieve a win-win solution)
- business storytelling
- customer service (dealing with customer complaints and queries)
- how to build effective business relationships
- writing formal emails
- informal vs formal language
- business terminology
- idiomatic expressions
- asking good business questions

I started my own company 5 years ago, so I am familiar with the language they use in business. On iTalki, I am working with professionals in the engineering, medical, digital marketing, advertising, HR,  IT, banking, and automobile industry. 

Through practical activities and customized lessons, you will be equipped with the relevant vocabulary, idioms, and functional language to effectively communicate in your unique business setting. Expect to speak confidently and clearly after these lessons. All your progress will be measurable. 

The phrasal verbs that you will learn in the lessons will set you apart in any conversation. Pronunciation will also be emphasized during these lessons. As part of their continual learning, I also send short podcasts that my students can listen to. This will further increase their vocabulary and improve their fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS and TOEFL preparation (with mock tests)
pro_course_detail.description:
Success stories: I recently helped 2 students reach their required band score! One student increased her speaking band score by 1 point! They are now able to study abroad. 

Relax! You don't need to know every word in the dictionary to reach your required band score! Getting a band score of 7 or above could literally change your life forever! To get a band score of 7 or above, you will need to use the English language creatively as well as using complex grammatical structures and advanced vocabulary. 
Having helped many IELTS students, I understand the pressure and struggles that IELTS students go through to reach their required band scores. I mainly help students who want to move from band 6 to band 7. These are predominantly students who are struggling to achieve a band 7 score either because of the speaking or writing part. The IELTS test is life-changing in many ways and I would love to help you achieve your dreams. These customized lessons will help you reach your required band score.  

I will be able to identify the areas where you are struggling and create an effective plan to correct those mistakes. I will be offering you some tips and strategies to make sure that you are ready to ace your test! You will feel empowered to face the test head-on. The student will also be able to put more attention on their areas of weakness while also improving their areas of strength. 

All your progress will be measurable. As part of their continual learning, I also send short podcasts that my students can listen to. This will further increase their vocabulary and improve their fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational fluency for adults
pro_course_detail.description:
A real conversation involves speaking, listening, asking questions and commenting on answers. To become a fluent English speaker, your brain and your mouth need to work together. I will show you how you can practically do this! All you need is some motivation, creativity, and good habits. All my conversation classes are based on real life situations. You will learn how to confidently express your ideas in a conversation.

There are a variety of topics we can discuss such as current news events, popular conversation topics and review of famous books to name a few. 

I will help build your vocabulary and speaking confidence. You will overcome any fear you have of speaking English with another person. 

The lessons will be conducted in a relaxed environment where you will be able to acquire the relevant words and phrases necessary for effective communication. Every conversational lesson is based on an interesting topic. I will send materials to you before the class so that you become familiar with the topic. In this way, you will have more speaking practice during the lesson. See you in class! 

As part of their continual learning, I also send short podcasts that my students can listen to. This will further increase their vocabulary and improve their fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: Job Interview Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
Success stories: I recently helped a few of my students pass their job interviews. They will now be starting new jobs with higher salaries and greater job satisfaction. (*Please check my reviews for success stories*)
Please note: It takes about 6-8 hours to prepare for a job interview depending on your English level. 
In these interactive classes, you will be introduced to all the language and strategies that you need to stand out in your interview. You will learn how to answer:
- "Tell me about yourself"
- Competency questions
- Describe your education and experience
- Behavioral questions
- Soft skills questions
- General interview questions 

A successful interview requires you to tell a unique story about your skills, achievements, qualifications, and personality. I have helped many students pass their job interviews. A successful job interview is one where you are able to differentiate yourself from other candidates. 

This requires preparation, fluency, and confidence. You will be prepared to answer both common and unexpected questions in the interview. You will learn about the power words, verbs, and phrases that you need to use in your interview. You will be able to apply time-tested strategies to help effectively answer every question that is posed to you. You will learn to speak in a way that sounds "clean" and "clear". I also offer a CV-checking service as well.

specialty_cert.description:
I am a certified professional Chinese language teacher with a TCSOL certification and 8 years of experience. To date, I have assisted more than 300 students in successfully passing the following Chinese proficiency exams: 
TOCFL (Test of Chinese as a Foreign Language)
HSK (Chinese Proficiency Test)
HSKK (HSK Speaking Test)
YCT (Youth Chinese Test)
‰∏≠ÂõΩË™ûÊ§úÂÆö

I have a Chinese teaching license and have been working on Italki for 8 years, during which I have taught 12,000 lessons with a 5.0 rating. Nearly 5,000 of these lessons were for children. I hope this work experience can demonstrate my ability to conduct KID lesson.

---------------------------------------------------------
"Easy Japanese" is a program of Japanese language lessons produced by Japan's public broadcaster, NHK WORLD RADIO JAPAN. You can learn basic grammar and useful expressions through lessons designed in audio-drama style. You can download audio and texts for the lessons free of charge.

Introduction of the story
The heroine of the story is Anna, a 20-year-old Thai student who loves Japanese manga. She has come to Japan to learn the Japanese language for one year at a university in Tokyo. She will learn practical Japanese through various experiences, such as classes at the university, daily life at a dormitory, shopping, and traveling.
Japanese Lesson only for N5~N4 level

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, my name is Victoria. I am a fluent English and native German speaker, living in the UK. I have lived half of my life in Germany and the other half in English speaking countries. I have lived 4 years in Ireland and have been living for the last 9 years in the UK. 

I love painting and listening to music in my spare time. I also enjoy going to museums and escaping into nature. I travel a lot and love exploring new places and cultures.
teacher_info.short_signature: Fun lessons you can look forward to! Certified TEFL teacher with over 6 years teaching experience.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, my name is Victoria. I am a fluent English and native German speaker, living in the UK. I have lived half of my life in Germany and the other half in English speaking countries. I have lived 4 years in Ireland and have been living for the last 9 years in the UK. 

I love painting and listening to music in my spare time. I also enjoy going to museums and escaping into nature. I travel a lot and love exploring new places and cultures.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a Master's degree in Pharmacy and a 120 hour TEFL/TESOL certificate. 
Although I like working in the Pharmacy industry, I enjoy teaching more. I am very passionate about it. I have experience teaching people of all ages. I have also taught multiple subjects, such as Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, German and English. I have been teaching for over 3 years online and offline.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My students have described me as a patient, interesting, energetic, enthusiastic, friendly and earnest teacher. 
I give instant corrections,  leave necessary notes,  give sufficient guidance, explain difficult words and interact well with my students. I believe that each lesson should be an adventure. 
I know that each student learns differently and has different interests , so I adapt my teaching styles and topics according to the student.

pro_course_detail.title: Beginner Learners: Speak with Confidence | *Promo Rate*
pro_course_detail.description: This course is designed for students who are just starting their journey in learning English. It focuses on building a strong foundation in the language, helping students gain confidence in speaking, listening, and understanding basic English. Through simple and engaging topics, students will learn essential vocabulary, basic grammar structures, and proper pronunciation. The course aims to develop practical communication skills, enabling students to participate in everyday conversations and understand common phrases. With a supportive and interactive approach, this class will guide students toward a comfortable and natural use of English in real-life situations.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice | (Intermediate & Advanced Learners)  | *Promo Rate*
pro_course_detail.description:
Intermediate
This course is designed to enhance fluency and boost confidence in conversational English. Through engaging and diverse topics, students will expand their vocabulary, perfect their pronunciation, and polish their grammar. The focus is on helping students speak naturally and accurately in any situation, minimizing common errors and enabling them to communicate with clarity and ease. Additionally, students will learn colloquial phrases to develop a more natural and authentic understanding of the language.

Advanced
This course is tailored for students who are already fluent and seek to achieve greater precision in their use of English. It focuses on refining language skills by exploring more nuanced and complex aspects of the language. Students will enhance their ability to discuss broader and more sophisticated topics with increased accuracy and confidence. The course also emphasizes mastering colloquial expressions and advanced vocabulary, allowing students to communicate with a level of fluency that is both accurate and natural.

Hello, in the first lesson, we will set a learning goal and corresponding materials that suit you, such as HSK, "Development Chinese", "New Practical Chinese", "Spoken Chinese" and so on. Of course, we can also choose different In the process, I will correct your pronunciation and grammar and give more examples to help you better understand vocabulary and other grammatical knowledge.
We can simulate different scenarios and scene dialogues for more targeted exercises. In this process, I will correct pronunciation errors and provide authentic Chinese expressions to help students use Chinese fluently and naturally in various scenes in life. expression.

For business Chinese students, they should be students who have a certain foundation in Chinese. We will use the textbook "Win in China" as the main textbook to explain one by one through different topics, including China's business etiquette, culture and other important elements.
I can help you study and complete the HSK1-6 test in a comprehensive way. We can strengthen practice in various aspects, such as reading, writing, listening, speaking, etc., to achieve a comprehensive review and summary.
I like ancient Chinese literature and modern literature. If there are foreign friends who are also interested in Chinese literature, I will be happy to give guidance and teach Chinese cultural thoughts, so that you will become an authentic Chinese master.

I can improve your grammar, pronunciation and vocabulary. 

I have been teaching online for around 1 year on several platforms and feel very comfortable teaching on a video camera.

I can help you prepare for a job interview as well as university interviews (masters, PhD).
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my lesson,  firstly I assess each student on their language ability and then formulate a plan of action in the most effective way of teaching that student. I used alot of different teaching methods, from a slow pace teaching approach to grammar lesson that teaches the student how to use grammar effectively in each language. 

For beginners, we will start with the basics together.  Firstly working on basic sentences and pronunciation. From the 1st lesson, I will teach you some basic sentences and words so you will be speaking before you know it.

I am a very laid back and patient teacher, I am great with beginners and children.

Chel

teacher_info.about_teacher: For me, teaching is not just a side job, but a passion and a career. I invest 100% in my students and even dedicate time to do research on the most effective ways to learn English. I had academic training when it comes to teaching as well as a lot of in-class and online experience. I like to consider myself a very friendly and encouraging teacher and am glad to say that my students say the same about me. As a teacher, creating a positive, fun experience for my students is an essential part of the job. I like to make my students forget that they are studying but rather enjoy the process while they are unconsciously acquiring the language just like a native speaker.
teacher_info.teaching_style: The teaching style that I adopt with you will depend on your goals and level, as well as your preferences. I acknowledge that every student is different and that the "One size fits all" approach does not work for everyone. If you are looking to improve your speaking skills for example, then we will work on topics of your interest, and talk freely about them. To make this easier for you, based on our first introductory session, I will make a list of potential topics that you might find interesting and we can go from there. I will also provide you with material to read or watch before class preferably so you can expand your vocabulary even more. That is just one example of how a lesson can go.

pro_course_detail.title: 3 in one: Conversational English with a hint of listening and writing practice
pro_course_detail.description: We will have a lesson plan to cover a variety of topics. Before each lesson, I will send you material to work on (interesting videos, articles, songs, blogs...) so you can expand your vocabulary and maximize your learning. In class, you will be able to use all the vocabulary you have learned, speak with confidence, and use correct, coherent English. I will make sure that these classes are as fun as possible and you will speak English naturally and confidently in no time.

pro_course_detail.title: Score high in TOEFL and IELTS
pro_course_detail.description: I have 2 years of experience preparing students for TOEFL and IELTS exams. If you are serious about getting the best score you can get, make sure you book a lesson package. The amount of homework I give you will depend on how much time you have until the exam and your availability. However, if you want to get the maximum out of these lessons, I recommend that you dedicate time to homework so we can make the most out of the lesson. Preparing for exams can be nerve-wracking, but with enough time and the right determination, I am sure we will nail it.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn English with games and activities for kids
pro_course_detail.description:
Learning a new language can be difficult for children, but if it feels like they are playing, then that's another story, if you want your child to learn English while having fun, make sure you book a lesson. For children, I recommend 30 min classes because their attention span is shorter than adults'. Consistency is also very important, so 5 - 6 30 min classes are ideal. An example for an assignment would be either a song they have to listen to or a few words/sentences they have to write; not much but just enough to reinforce what they have learned in class.
N.B I accept students starting from age 6.

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate English
pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson is designated for students who want to go from intermediate to proficient. 
The focus will depend on the student and the areas they want to work on, but we will mainly work on expanding vocabulary, speaking skills, and listening skills. 
For this course, writing and grammar are optional and up to the student to decide to add them or not. 
Homework will depend on the availability of the student.

teacher_info.teaching_style:

Our lessons depend on you and your needs. I'm very flexible and I'm happy to adapt to your learning style. Please let me know if you want to work on something specific. 

During conversation practice, I will correct your mistakes and offer better ways to express yourself. I will type everything in the chatbox so you can review it later. These conversations are aimed at helping you speak in a more natural, authentic way.

pro_course_detail.description:
Conversation classes are a really natural and easy way to improve your confidence, fluency, grammar, and vocabulary. We do all of this in context, focussing on the grammar mistakes that you make most often and looking at new vocabulary that you will actually use! Conversation based calls/classes are great if :

Ôºä  You want to improve your Chinese conversation skills, for work or anything else.
Ôºä  Your Chinese is at a high level and you just want to find out how you can make it better.
Ôºä  You're getting ready to work or live in a Chinese speaking place.
Ôºä  You've been studying Chinese for a while but you're not sure how to improve or what you should study next!

These classes work best when we agree a topic or subject before class that you would like to discuss. This way I can bring materials and resources to class that can help you get the most out of our time. If you don't have anything in particular that you would like to discuss then I am happy to suggest a topic for us. 

At the end of our call I will always send you the notes that I have made, including any corrections, recommendations, or new vocabulary. üìù

pro_course_detail.description:

Here are some of the ways I can help you:

üìå I can help you find the mistakes you make most often and explain how to correct them in a relaxed and helpful way that helps you to learn. At the end of each class you will leave with all of the notes I've made for you including corrections, examples, suggestions, and new resources.

course_info.trial_description:
As an Italki community teacher, I aim to provide engaging and interactive lessons tailored to the individual needs and goals of each student. My lessons focus on practical language skills, ensuring that students gain confidence and proficiency in real-world communication . Students can expect to learn:
Conversational Skills: Improve speaking and listening abilities through interactive dialogues and discussions.
Grammar and Vocabulary: Understand and use key grammatical structures and expand vocabulary relevant to everyday situations.
Pronunciation and Accent: Enhance pronunciation to sound more natural and reduce accent.
Reading and Writing: Develop skills for reading comprehension and writing, focusing on clarity and coherence.
Cultural Insights: Gain insights into the cultural aspects of language use, enhancing overall communication competence.
The lessons are not restricted to a specific textbook but will incorporate a variety of materials, including:
Custom handouts and worksheets: Tailored to the student's level and interests.
Online resources: Articles, blogs, and videos relevant to the topics being studied.
The main focus of the lesson is to build practical language skills that students can immediately apply in their daily lives. This includes:
Functional language use: Emphasizing language needed for everyday interactions.
Interactive practice: Encouraging active participation and communication.
Personalized learning: Adapting lessons to meet the specific needs and goals of each student teaching Methods:
Communicative Approach: Emphasizes real-life communication and interaction.
Task-Based Learning: Uses tasks and activities to promote language use in meaningful contexts materials:
Digital tools: Use of online platforms like Google Docs for collaborative activities and feedback.
Multimedia resources: Videos, audio clips, and interactive apps to enhance learning. Role-plays and Simulations: Practical scenarios to practice real-life conversations.

***Update to my video: I‚Äôve taught over 12,000 EFL classes over FIVE years!***

My neutral accent is particularly beneficial for EFL learners. I specialize in helping intermediate and advanced students, with an emphasis on engaging conversations.

In our lessons, there won‚Äôt be any PowerPoint presentations‚Äîwe‚Äôll use digital media to enrich your understanding and keep the focus on dynamic discussions. Every lesson will be tailored to your specific goals.

My first questions to you: Why are you learning English? What‚Äôs your motivation‚ÄîUniversity? Business? Travel? Culture?

We‚Äôll discover your ‚Äúwhy‚Äù and build your learning journey from there!

course_info.trial_description: This is a trial lesson! We will take this time to discuss your English goals. I will tell you a little bit about myself. I will learn a little about you! This lesson will allow me to create future lesson plans to help you succeed.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Travel / Fun
pro_course_detail.description:
This course will be designed for you to learn common English vocabulary, phrases and dialects that you will hear when conversing with native English speakers. 

I will design each lesson to help you learn English for traveling, online conversations, or even gaming! 

This course is ideal for intermediate or advanced students.
It can be customized for elementary level students.

**If you are interested in a class time that is not available, please message me!**

pro_course_detail.title: English for Business
pro_course_detail.description:
This course will be designed for you to learn common English vocabulary, phrases and dialects that you will hear when conversing with native English speakers in formal/work environments. 

In our first lesson, we will extensively discuss what type of business you work in and what your goals are within the company.  

I can confidently advise and assist within *ANY* business or industrial group. 
Note: In this profile, it specializes in the education industry. My lessons are not exclusive to education. Please contact me if you have any questions about your career goals. 

I will design each lesson to help you improve your business jargon to elevate your communication skills within your company.

This course is ideal for intermediate or advanced students.
It can be customized for elementary level students.

**If you are interested in a class time that is not available, please message me!**

pro_course_detail.title: English for University/School
pro_course_detail.description:
This course will be designed for you to learn common English vocabulary, phrases and grammar used in university/school settings. 
 
I will design each lesson to help you improve your schooling experience. I will not have formal lesson plans, but instead, we will focus on what you are doing at school. I will assist with essay preparation or aide in difficult concepts. 

This course is ideal for intermediate or advanced students.
It can be customized for elementary level students.

**If you are interested in a class time that is not available, please message me!**

pro_course_detail.title: ((Private lessons for S/M only))
pro_course_detail.description: Hello students, please do not choose this option. This is a private option for one specific student. I apologize for any confusion. Thank you!

course_info.trial_description: We'll be able to meet, discuss your difficulties and goals and finish with a sample lesson! Looking forward to meeting you and helping you better your English skills!

pro_course_detail.title: Lets talk!!! Everyday English without being nervous.
pro_course_detail.description:
We will have relaxed conversations as friends. You will not feel nervous! You will learn common English words and phrases which will allow you to converse comfortably with native English speakers. We will also look at vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation, as needed, to rapidly improve your English. I can also give you free eBooks in English.

IMPORTANT: In order to create the best possible learning environment,  use earbuds or headphones, with a microphone, and be in a quiet place in a home or business office.

pro_course_detail.title: Exam Preparation (IELTS, TOEFL, DUOLINGO, CPE, CAE, FCE, PET, KET, BEC, And Other Tests)
pro_course_detail.description: For those taking IELTS tests. I can help you prepare for the speaking or writing sections, or both. For the speaking, we will do practice speaking tests where I will give you corrections, suggestions to improve your answers and feedback. For the writing, I will give you homework and then at the beginning of the lessons I will correct it and give you suggestions and feedback.

pro_course_detail.title: Interview Skills or Job hunting and Business English
pro_course_detail.description: Students acquire and practice key business English vocabulary and pronunciation through a range of business contexts including: making introductions, delivering presentations, leading meetings, holding formal versus informal conversations, writing formal reports, executive summaries, cover letters, emails and invitations, etc. We discuss and complete activities from all business areas such as  finance, marketing, consulting, human resources, and strategic planning to name a few.  Students listen to and become familiar with different English accents which is essential for doing business today! All materials are provided and learners can also expect grammar to be incorporated where needed.

pro_course_detail.title: General English , Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
pro_course_detail.description:
One-on-one English classes covering a range of topics in everyday life, with vocabulary, pronunciation and grammar components. Students practice reading, speaking, listening and writing skills, and all materials are provided.

Additionally, lessons are designed to address each student's needs based on his/her native language, including pronunciation, where activities are customized to help every learner achieve natural and fluent speech

pro_course_detail.title: English for Children and Teenagers
pro_course_detail.description:
Speaking Skills and General English Lessons:

Comprehensive and integrated lessons designed to help you improve your communication skills in English.

- Productive skills: speaking and writing (focusing on fluency and accuracy)

- Receptive skills: listening and reading (focusing on understanding gist and details)

Naturally, we will also need to improve your awareness of vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation.

pro_course_detail.description:
*All lessons are conducted in Japanese.
*We will be using Zoom. Please select "Zoom" when booking your appointment.

For proficient speakers of Japanese who can confidently engage in everyday conversation:
Have you ever considered diving into Japanese literature?

In our lessons, we explore Japanese books together, unveiling expressions and vocabulary not commonly encountered in daily conversation or textbooks.

Let's read Japanese books aloud together or listen to me reading while delving into the nuances of the language. Whenever you encounter unfamiliar expressions or words, I'll be there to provide explanations promptly.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! my name is Ashley. I live in Emalahleni, which is a small town situated in Mpumalanga South Africa. I have studied a Bachelor of technology degree in Electrical engineering at the Tshwane University of Technology. In my spare time, I love cooking, watching movies and walking in parks. I enjoy being an English tutor as it gives me an opportunity to meet amazing people. I love meeting new people, learning different cultures and backgrounds.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! my name is Ashley. I live in Emalahleni, which is a small town situated in Mpumalanga South Africa. I have studied a Bachelor of technology degree in Electrical engineering at the Tshwane University of Technology. In my spare time, I love cooking, watching movies and walking in parks. I enjoy being an English tutor as it gives me an opportunity to meet amazing people. I love meeting new people, learning different cultures and backgrounds.
teacher_info.about_teacher: As a tutor, my focus is to help break down difficult concepts in a way that allows students greater comprehension and understanding to their course material. I have also been volunteering at a local day care/after care as an English teacher. My students where children between the ages of 6-17. My tasks included helping my students with home works and many more activities. I look forward to joining this platform.
teacher_info.teaching_style: As a community tutor, I will be providing casual conversation practice to help my students with their pronunciation and fluency. Speaking is the most important course in learning and acquiring a language. My lessons will also include, grammar corrections, vocabulary suggestions, sentence constructions and practice reading. Speaking English can cause a greater anxiety for students, my lessons will also include helping my students develop confidence and overcome the fear of speaking English in their context or publicly. I will also be providing job interview preparations.

course_info.trial_description: Speaking is the most effective way to acquire a language, it is important to speak frequently to improve your skills in speaking English, and build your confidence. This lesson is meant for all students, who wish to improve their skills in speaking English, fluency, clear accent and pronunciation. Having a partner that will help you to practice speaking English is very important, i will be that partner! I have material available to cater for the lessons. During our lessons, I will be correcting your grammar, constructing of sentence, and giving vocabulary  suggestions. I will cater the lessons depending on your level and goal, I prefer working with children and adults.

Hello, my name is Jessica, nice to meet you here. I'm a native Chinese speaker and I also an certified IPA teacher.
With 2 years teaching experience at classroom,3 year teaching experice on line, I work with students of all ages and all levels from beginning to advanced.In my class, you needn't to memorize long lists of vocabulary, instead, you and I will discuss interesting topics, play games and practise language that you actually want to use. I guarantee that after you learned a few months, you will feel more comfortable to speak Chinese and know more about China.
Besides, I had also worked in some foreign trade companies before, if you want to learn Business Chinese, I'm the right tutor.

pro_course_detail.title: For Beginners--Get Basic Communication Skills in China
pro_course_detail.description:
Strong recommend to Beginners: this course contain 555 the most useful words for your to learn, after you learn, you 've got basic Chinese communication skills.

     The vocabulary and grammar of this course covered nearly all contents in HSK 1 and HSK 2. 
     In addition, there is daily speaking Chinese in the text. Students can easily pass HSK Level 2 examination after 45 to 60 hours study which is 20 times efficiency of traditional Chinese teaching.

     Beside the basic knowledge (how to express numbers, dates, greetings,weather, way of transportation, colors,sports etc.) this course is more practical and useful, it will help you use the language immediately when you come to China.(Feature:how to book airplane ticket and hotel, how to order food, go to hospital, celebrate birthday or festival etc.)

Teaching material: 45 Hours Reach to HSK 2 / Integrated Chinese

pro_course_detail.title: Business Master
pro_course_detail.description: I am an experienced English teacher specialising in teaching the language for business and work purposes. With a focus on real-world application, I help professionals improve their communication skills, build their business vocabulary, and become more confident in their professional interactions. My lessons are tailored to the specific needs of each student, with a focus on improving email writing, presentations, and other language skills relevant to the workplace. My expertise in the English language and my ability to tailor my teaching to the needs of each student make me well-equipped to help professionals achieve their language goals and succeed in their careers.

pro_course_detail.title: Workplace Mastering Confidence
pro_course_detail.description:
Self-Mastery: Reach Your Full Orgasmic Potential and Fulfilment at Work 
 
 Do you find yourself lacking confidence or having difficulties to be assertive at your workplace? This course is aimed at preparing you with tools and strategies that you need to be confident and to accomplish what you want in your career all in English.
 
 Key Topics: 
 
 Understanding Self-Confidence: Learn more about the elements that form self-confidence and the effects it has on one‚Äôs career. 
 Overcoming Imposter Syndrome: Understand how to counteract negativity and accept oneself for the capable person he or she is. 
 Effective Communication: Build up good communication skills to be able to voice yourself convincingly. 
 Body Language and Non-Verbal Cues: First, learn the trick to how to convey confidence through your body language. 
 Handling Stress and Pressure: Discover ways in how to remain calm and compose during a stressful period. 
 Negotiating with Confidence: Develop your negotiation skills to obtain good results. 
 Networking and Building Relationships: Improve your interpersonal communication skills in order to build your business circles. 
 By the end of this course, you will:
 
 Get more assertiveness and Self-confidence in your workplace. 
 Combat inadequacy complex and other kinds of distorted beliefs. 
 Engage in clear and assured oral and written communication in the work setting. 
 Always look good, be well groomed and self assured. 
 Develop good interpersonal skills and communication with other people. 
 Grow and develop yourself in every aspect of your life and reach your ultimate capabilities. Join me today and get ready to be the confident you at work you have always dreamed of being.

üåüüéÆ Roblox: Spanish Social Club for Casual Conversations üéÆüåü
üö™ Our doors are wide open, welcoming all children. In this class, your child will connect with fellow Spanish learners and Roblox enthusiasts. Together, we'll dive into games on Zoom, fostering communication and sharing tips. As a united group, we'll cultivate a community of friends who share a passion for Roblox. Come join the excitement! üåçüéâ
üéà Led by students themselves, this class is eagerly looking forward to meeting each and every one of you. The server will be secure and private, ensuring a safe environment.
üåà This inclusive class caters wonderfully to all children, including those who are shy or neurodivergent. Many of my students have formed enduring friendships here. With parental consent, they call each other outside of class to play a variety of games. I am privileged to offer a platform where kind and considerate children can forge lasting bonds.
üé≠ Using the vast array of Roblox realms and under the guidance of our instructor, learners can engage in role-playing games, honing conversational skills while having a blast. This ongoing club is designed for intermediate-level Spanish learners, proving to be a valuable resource for those who are bilingual or multilingual and wish to bolster their Spanish-speaking abilities.
üéØ Our primary goals for this class are to:
Foster a comfortable setting for students to boost their speaking confidence.
Assist in refining pronunciation.
Enhance grammar and intonation.
üéâ Each session will commence with an enjoyable icebreaker in Spanish, helping us get to know each other and setting the tone for our time together. Following the warm-up, every learner will have the chance to share a bit about their gaming experience. We'll then delve into key vocabulary that we'll be using throughout the session.

Welcome my students to my profile, I am Arabic teacher from Egypt and I have been teaching Arabic as a second language for 10 years , I am teaching (Modern standard , Classical Arabic, and Egyptian Dialects and Islamic studies ) My style of teaching depends on conversations after explaining the rule in a simplified way and I can also teach letters in less than 10 hours in easy ways .
After completing it, the student can reed and write the letters and know how to pronounce it, and read the words and sentences too, also know the basic grammar which can help you to build a good and right sentence such us Demonstratives nouns, the Pronouns and Possessive pronouns
teacher_info.short_signature: Certified TAFL (Teaching Arabic as Foreign Language) with 10 years experience in teaching Arabic
teacher_info.introduction:
I am a professional and experienced Arabic teacher for non-native speakers , graduated from Faculty of Al- Alsun ( Languages ) Arabic section Ain Shams University in Cairo which made me able to teach Arabic for Native speakers or non-native speakers . I have Two certificates in Arabic , Bachelor of Al sun and Diploma in Teaching Arabic for non-native speakers from Alexandria University in Alex  ,which qualify me to teach all levels and have  work experience in teaching Arabic  and Arabic and Islamic studies   in centers , now I am doing my master in Arabic  Linguistics and teaching Arabic in Alex university . 
I am a native speaker able to teach you modern standard Arabic , Quranic Arabic ( classical Arabic ) as well as Colloquial  Egyptian Arabic .
I offer you sessions and courses that make you able to speak and comprehend Arabic  in an easy way by focusing on all of the four language skills by using Effective materials .

pro_course_detail.title: Modern Standard Arabic for Beginners , Intermediate, and Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
hello my students :) For all levels  beginners and intermediate students ( from scratch) in this  course you will be able to speak , write and read lessons and phrases in different daily topics in our daily life . There are videos, flashcards,and authentic articles also , you will enjoy with it ^^
Looking forward to meet you in our first class ^^

 if you would love to start learning Modern Standard Arabic with the help of an experienced, methodological, and engaging Arabic instructor. I am always welcomed teach you  dialect once you are  more advanced! 
However, since you will be an absolute beginner in Arabic, a working knowledge of ENGLISH is necessary (especially for explaining grammar intricacies). 
i can say i am a teacher with previous language instruction experience and has obtained a degree/certification in linguistics or in Arabic instruction are highly preferred. Although native speakers with extensive knowledge of the grammar and syntax of the language to teach you^^

Additionally,  I will be responsible for creating lesson plans and bringing my own materials to class (or inform me of which workbooks to purchase or use). me, as the teacher, must decide which concepts are covered in which lessons. You need to be highly methodological and organized. 
In addition to language instruction, I hope you are willing to share my culture and teach you more about the diversity of Arab cultures. Arabic is a difficult language and laborious to learn, so show  you how can make it fun and engaging! 
This will be a very flexible time commitment with ^^
I am  passionate about sharing my language and are confident in teaching Arabic, please feel free to contact me ^^
I would love to look forward to our first class :) 
Thanks ,
Heba

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Rajesh. I'm a native Hindi speaker living in Jaipur, India. I give lessons of Hindi to students of all levels. Whether you want to learn basic everyday phrases, or achieve good writing skills, or read 'Ramayana', 'Mahabharata', "Bhagavad Gita" in original - I'll be glad to help. 

My main goal is to help you begin talking and communicating. I am proud when my students make progress.The best reward for me is when my students overcome their ‚Äúno mistakes‚Äù mindset or shyness, and begin interacting in their target language. 

I love both teaching and learning languages online. Being an enthusiastic language learner helps me enrich my teaching experience.

I can help you with all aspects of your Hindi including:

1. Conversation/communication 
2. Reading Devanagari scripts
3. Indian accent/pronunciation (Hindi)

Communication in all of its forms is very important to me, I want to empower you to communicate using the highest possible level possible. I will be empowering you to work alone outside the class  by giving you daily exercises and written tasks to complete.

My lessons are very person centered on what you need.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
The lessons are centered around what you need and what we agree upon.I am a very warm and friendly person. 
Some people prefer talking, others prefer grammar. I try to make our lessons entertaining and fun. My aim is to take the conversations "higher" so that you can improve your vocabulary in written and verbal expression. 
My particular passion (having worked on radio professionally) is to ensure you speak with clarity and I will be encouraging you to speak the best that you can by looking at your breathing, intonation and linking and blending your words.

teaching_experience.description: As a seasoned online educator since 2016, I take immense pride in having successfully taught Hindi to thousands of enthusiastic foreign students. My teaching philosophy revolves around creating an engaging and supportive learning environment, ensuring that learners not only grasp the fundamentals but also develop a deep appreciation for the richness of the Hindi language and culture.

course_info.trial_description:
Hello welcomes you. No language easy in the world except your mother tongue. Your mother tongue is also hard for others. Hard practice, deep observation (like a kid), dedication and many more things make it easy for learner. Yes you can do. My way of teaching is start from greetings. I taught my students that how to introduce yourself in Hindi. How to make small phrases in Hindi? How make short sentences that are used in everyday life. How to improve your pronunciation? I also give homework to my students. Homework enhances their learning intensity. So you are ready to learn with me. 

I charge a nominal fee of my trial class. Do you know why?

I have did this so that you can judge me before taking a proper lesson. Am I the right teacher for you? I also want to know what you really want to learn.

Happy learning.

pro_course_detail.title: Hindi Conversation Practice (‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§æ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§æ‡§≤‡§æ‡§™ ‡§Ö‡§≠‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏)
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello! This course is designed for those who want to come to India for tourism or religious purpose. The Golden Triangle of India is a tourist circuit that connects the national capital Delhi, Agra and Jaipur. Most people in this circuit speak Hindi. Whenever you come to do business or communicate with Indians, you need to understand Hindi a little bit. It makes your journey and work easier. This course will help you make simple sentences and have day-to-day conversations such as finding a way, booking a taxi, asking and negotiating prices, booking a hotel, etc. It also lays the foundation for learning Hindi.

It is not necessary that we only talk about tourism. In this topic we will practice simple Hindi phrases. It can also be simple things related to daily life. There is no way other than practice. you have to practice. I can only help you in practice. 

You have three options to take a 30, 45 or 60 minute lesson.
Happy Learning.

pro_course_detail.title: One to One private lesson on informal conversation (‡§Ö‡§®‡•å‡§™‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§ø‡§ï ‡§¨‡§æ‡§§‡§ö‡•Ä‡§§-casual conversation)
pro_course_detail.description:
How to greet in Hindi? Practice on greeting phrases in Hindi. Also you will learn how phrases are formed using words. Heritage language learners often speak informal dialects. Indian languages ‚Äã‚Äãare not simply a set of informal gestures, nor are they a signed version of a particular spoken language. We speak Hindi in basic formal discourse or political discussion and move towards regional language in informal conversations and gossip. 

Informal means informal. Do not be shy; ask me anything which you want to know. You have three options to take a 30, 45 or 60 minute lesson.

Happy Learning.

pro_course_detail.title: Complete beginners (Elementary)- ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§∂‡•Å‡§∞‡•Å‡§Ü‡§§‡•Ä (‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ‡§•‡§Æ‡§ø‡§ï ‡§ï‡§ï‡•ç‡§∑‡§æ)
pro_course_detail.description:
The complete beginner level is meant for those learners who want to start the Hindi alphabet from the beginning. This course focuses on the Devanagari script. 

You will know the following points under this syllabus.

a) Vowels
b) Vowel symbols
c) Consonants
d) Hindi alphabet
e) Combination of vowels with consonants
f) Conjunct characters
g) Bottom r and flying r
h) Chandrabindu ‡§Å (used for making nasal sounds)
i) Bindu ‡§Ç (used for making nasal sounds)
j) Reading Devanagari script (as per the duration)
k) Writing Devanagari Script (as per the duration)

After completing this course a student will enhance his writing skills, be able to read Devanagari script, can read Hindi books and will be able to speak in Hindi. The total course duration is 15 hours. 

You have three options to take a 30, 45 or 60 minute lesson.

Happy Learning

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate Hindi Course (‡§Æ‡§ß‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó ‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§™‡§æ‡§†‡•ç‡§Ø‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§Æ-Middle class Hindi course)
pro_course_detail.description:
The intermediate level is meant for those learners who possess some basic knowledge of Hindi, or who have completed our first level 'Complete beginners' course or the equivalent. The Intermediate Hindi Course will begin with a one-on-one online meeting determine each student's current level of Hindi, their goals, and their future aspirations. After this initial meeting, the context of the course will vary according to each student. Some of the materials covered in this course include basic and intermediate vocabulary, colloquial and idiomatic expressions, cordial conversations, as well as the skills required for writing and reading Hindi in academic contexts.

Topics covered under the course:-

a) How to construct of a meaningful word?
b) Identify of synonyms.
c) How to use synonyms accurately in a phrase.
d) Learn to make a meaningful sentence?
e) Definition and types of sentences.
f) Learn short and simple paragraph writing in Hindi.

After completing this course you will increase your word strength, Hindi writing skills, will be able to make short phrases. Now your confidence level will be high. You will be able to read short Hindi story and understand Hindi film, music etc. Your speaking ability will depend on your practice. I strongly recommend you to take some practice sessions with this course. The total course duration is 20 hours. 

You have three options to take a 30, 45 or 60 minute lesson. Practice sessions will be additional.
Happy learning

pro_course_detail.title: Hindi Grammar-I (‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§£-I)
pro_course_detail.description:
Grammar- Grammar is the discipline through which we speak, write and understand the pure language of a language.
These rules of language structure are limited and language expressions are unlimited. One rule governs innumerable emotions. The rules under which these rules of language are studied together are called grammar.
Language may vary from person to person. Thus, the form of a language is not definite. Due to ignorance or confusion, some people make mistakes in the pronunciation or meaning of words. Thus the form of language is distorted. The function of grammar is to maintain the correctness and uniformity of the language.
In fact grammar compiles and analyzes language rules and fixes these rules. These grammar rules standardize and define the language. Grammar itself does not make rules of language. Grammatical rules determine grammatical rules using the form of language that people of a linguistic society use. Therefore, it can be said that - Grammar is the scripture in which the rules for the knowledge of the pure form of a language are stated.

You will learn the following points under Hindi Grammar syllabus.
a) Etymology (‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶ ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞) 
b) Phonology (‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§£-‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞) 
c) Syntax (‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø ‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞) 
d) Noun (‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ú‡•ç‡§û‡§æ) 
e) Pronoun (‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§µ‡§®‡§æ‡§Æ) 
f) Verb (‡§ï‡•ç‡§∞‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ) 
g) Tense (‡§ï‡§æ‡§≤)
h) Adjective (‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•á‡§∑‡§£) 
i) Indeclinable (‡§Ö‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø) 
j) Gender (‡§≤‡§ø‡§Ç‡§ó) 
k) Prefixes (‡§â‡§™‡§∏‡§∞‡•ç‡§ó) 

Hindi grammar is a broad subject. To learn it completely, you need six months. Here is a point wise description for your convenience. Which topics do you want to learn? First you should book a trial to ensure your Grammar points.

The grammar course is divided into two parts and its duration is six months. The first part takes two months (60 hours). You have three options to take a 60, 45 or 30 minute lesson. Practice sessions will be additional.
Happy learning

pro_course_detail.title: Hindi Grammar-II (‡§π‡§ø‡§Ç‡§¶‡•Ä ‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ï‡§∞‡§£-II)
pro_course_detail.description:
Higher level grammar is studied in this section of Hindi grammar. Hindi has a special status in India. It is spoken by the largest population in India. It is the official language of the Union of India and eleven state governments, including Delhi. It is taught as a second language in all the non-Hindi speaking states under the three language formula. Under this formula, a child is supposed to learn his mother tongue, Hindi, and English. If a child‚Äôs mother tongue is Hindi, (s)he is expected to learn an additional modern Indian language or a foreign language. Hindi is taught as a foreign language in a large number of countries throughout the world. Besides need based language learning materials, there is a need for a pedagogically oriented grammar of this language. The present grammar aims to fulfill the need of second/foreign language learners of Hindi in India as well as other countries. To study the high-level literature available in Hindi, you will need a subtle knowledge of grammar. In this section, emphasis will be laid on intensive study of grammar.
You will learn the following points under Hindi Grammar-II syllabus.

.....continuous part-I

l) Seam (‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø) 
m) Seam severance (‡§∏‡§Ç‡§ß‡§ø-‡§µ‡§ø‡§ö‡•ç‡§õ‡•á‡§¶) 
n) Case (‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡§ï) 
o) Suffix (‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡§Ø) 
p) Idioms ( ‡§Æ‡•Å‡§π‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞‡•á) 
q) Compound (‡§∏‡§Æ‡§æ‡§∏) 
r) Punctuation Mark (‡§µ‡§ø‡§∞‡§æ‡§Æ ‡§ö‡§ø‡§π) 
s) Combination words (‡§Ø‡•Å‡§ó‡•ç‡§Æ-‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶) 
t) proverbs (‡§≤‡•ã‡§ï‡•ã‡§ï‡•ç‡§§‡§ø‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Å) 
u) Synonyms Words (‡§™‡§∞‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§Ø‡§µ‡§æ‡§ö‡•Ä ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶) 
v) Pure and Modified Words (‡§§‡§§‡•ç‡§∏‡§Æ-‡§§‡§¶‡•ç‡§≠‡§µ ‡§∂‡§¨‡•ç‡§¶) 
w) Sentence-Correction (‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø-‡§∂‡•Å‡§¶‡•ç‡§ß‡§ø) 
x) Metres (‡§õ‡§®‡•ç‡§¶) 
y) Sentiments (‡§∞‡§∏) 
z) Essay (‡§®‡§ø‡§¨‡§Ç‡§ß) 
aa) Pronunciation and Orthography (‡§â‡§ö‡•ç‡§ö‡§æ‡§∞‡§£ ‡§î‡§∞ ‡§µ‡§∞‡•ç‡§§‡§®‡•Ä) 
ab) Clause (‡§â‡§™‡§µ‡§æ‡§ï‡•ç‡§Ø) 
ac) Explanation (‡§µ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§ñ‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ) 

The grammar course is divided into two parts and its duration is six months. Seems you learned the first part. The second part takes four months (240 hours). You have three options to take a 60, 45 or 30 minute lesson. Once you completed entire grammar course you will become a wise man of Hindi.
Happy Learning.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
With nearly 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry and connecting with many people , I am here to guide you on your path to mastering Thai, Whether you're a beginner or looking to advance your language skills, I am dedicated to making your learning experience enjoyable and effective.

Imagine learning Thai as if you were conversing with a friend ,through personalized lessons, 
I will help you understand and making it easier for you to communicate and immerse yourself in the rich Thai culture together and progress to basic until advance levels 

In addition to language instruction as your Personal Assistant, I will share my extensive knowledge to help you about Thailand
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My teaching style is I want you have fun learning Thai language and make your lessons enjoyable like you learn and exchange culture with friend , You can tell me your goal and learning needs I will improve the lesson to suit you the most.
- I will let you learn the basic of Thai language to Intermediate or Advance level that are important to communicate easier and more confident
- I will let you learn about basic Thai culture so that you make as few mistake as possible in Thailand
- I will let you learn about basic etiquette in Thailand so that you have as few problem in Thailand
- I will let you learn about tourist attractions , street food ,various landmark and public transportation

teacher_info.intro: My name is Dorji Om and I am from Bhutan. Both my parents are from Bhutan and we are Dzongkha native speakers.
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Dorji Om and I am from Bhutan. Both my parents are from Bhutan and we are Dzongkha native speakers.
teacher_info.about_teacher: As a teacher, I am flexible and approachable. I am fluent in English and I can make the Dzongkha lesson plans as per your requirements. I am open to suggestions and feedbacks. Lets make the learning more fun and fruitful.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I can teach as per the convivence of my student. I usually use videos, books, pictures and music to teach Dzongkha.

course_info.trial_description:
Basic Dzongkha Language (Bhutanese National Language) for Beginners.

Are you interested to learn how to speak Dzongkha Language?  Dzongkha is a Sino-Tibetan language and it is spoken by more than 700,000 people in Bhutan. Dzongkha is a language with two tones. Dzongkha, like many Asian languages, has specific vocabulary to show respect. Words are replaced with their polite equivalents when speaking with and about someone respected.
In this course, I will teach you how to speak Dzongkha language and I am flexible when it comes to teaching method.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn Basic Dzongkha Language (Bhutanese National Language)
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to learn Basic Dzongkha langauge. Dzongkha is Bhutan's national language and it is spoken by more than 700,000 people in Bhutan. Dzongkha, like many Asian languages, has specific vocabulary to show respect. Words are replaced with their polite equivalents when speaking with and about someone respected.The name 'Dzongkha' literally translates as 'language of the fortresses'. 
Through this course, you would be able to learn how to speak in Dzongkha. I will make sure to make this course useful and fun to learn.

Hello all, you can select a class:

[A] Friendly & Relaxed conversation: This class is fun, helpful and no stress!   You can tell me about your day, or we can discuss interesting topics.  I will correct your pronunciation, spoken grammar, and teach you vocabulary and phrases.

pro_course_detail.description:
Preparation for IELTS Speaking exam practice. I will help you achieve Band 7 or 8.

Good luck everyone!

:: Lesson Objectives: 
[] Practise common interview questions
[] Teach you STRATEGIES to WIN 
[] Correct your pronunciation, grammar and all mistakes

course_info.trial_description:
If you KNOW a lot of English, but can't SPEAK as well as you'd like, it's not your fault. 
If you can UNDERSTAND a lot of English, but can't SPEAK as well as you'd like, it's not your fault. And the problem is most English lessons only teach you more vocabulary and grammar, instead of developing ALL of your communication skills.
the truth is it doesn‚Äôt matter how many words you know if you‚Äôre too shy to speak‚Ä¶ Or if your mind often ‚Äúgoes blank‚Äù in conversations‚Ä¶ Or if your accent is hard to understand.
I created The Native Fluency Blueprint to share the "native communication secrets" that can dramatically improve your communication skills,

teacher_info.intro: Hi! My name is Michael and I‚Äôm an American English tutor living in France. I speak a little bit of French. So if you are a French speaker, I may be a great English tutor for you. I have a lot of experience in teaching and speaking in English with people from all around the world such as France, Malaysia, China, and Korea. This includes working with everyone from young kids to adults. As such, I can definitely cater your lessons depending on your age, ability, and needs.

teacher_info.about_teacher: Before I began teaching English, I worked as a Mechanical Engineer dealing with a lot of foreign customers and clients. So I can also help you with your business, scientific, and engineering English if you need to improve them or learn them for work.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I invite you to take a lesson with me. We will focus largely on your English speaking and conversation and can focus on either a topic of your choosing or something that I have prepared. These lessons will include grammar and vocabulary practice.

exp_info.description:
I teach face to face English lessons in an after school academy to children from 6/7 years old up to 11 years old. My classes range in size from 3 to 6 students.

Lessons focus on building vocabulary and simple grammatical structures. We help solidify these concepts through exercises and games.

I work as a private English tutor for French high school and college students.

These lessons are conducted both face to face as well as through online video chat.

Lessons are focused on improving their English for school and exams such as the TOEFL and TOEIC.

I teach English to a variety of people both face to face and online through video chat. My students range from high school and college students preparing for English exams to professionals in various fields (such as college professors) looking to improve their English for work. The lessons are personalized for each student to their personal interests and English needs.
English tutor for high school students in a private after school academy.

cert_info.description: This course prepared teachers to teach English online in both one-to-one and group lessons. It explored the tools and resources available to online teachers and the key skills that they need. Teachers learned how to teach the four communicative skills of language using online tools, as well as how to develop learners‚Äô language use and pronunciation skills. The course also covered different teaching contexts and professional development for online teachers.

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a true passion for languages. I find great joy in sharing my knowledge with others and helping them develop their language skills. I am a patient listener and strive to create a comfortable learning environment where my students can feel at ease and push themselves out of their comfort zones to improve their language abilities. With fluency in three languages - English, Hindi, and Nepali - I understand the challenges that come with learning a new language, and I am here to guide you through the process. Whether you need assistance with reading, writing, speaking, or conversation practice, I am confident that I can help you succeed.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I specialize in conversation-based language lessons. From my experience, I've found that chatting is the most efficient way to pick up a new language. During our lessons, we'll cover a variety of topics that will help you actively expand your vocabulary. In addition, I'm always interested in getting to know my students better and building friendships, so we'll take the time to ask each other questions and get to know each other.

I like to make our lessons fun and engaging, and I believe that a relaxed and enjoyable environment is the best way to promote effective learning. So if you're ready to take your language skills to the next level, let's schedule a lesson and have some fun! Thank you

pro_course_detail.title: Basic (beginners)
pro_course_detail.description:
Fundamentals
-------------------------------------------------------------
‚òÖSounds are almost never used in isolation. They are part of sentences, paragraphs, whole conversations, and when we combine sounds together, they change, and you will learn exactly how that process works in Korean.

‚òÖThe Art of Pronunciation is designed to help you to be a better communicator. The core of language is conversation, and good pronunciation makes conversation easier, so good pronunciation equals good communication.

The course has three main objectives:

‚òÖThe first objective is to destroy myths and misconceptions, and explain what is possible, and necessary, to do with your pronunciation to communicate effectively.
‚òÖThe second objective is to show you the most important sounds in Korean and how to produce them, including:
‚ÜíA complete guide to Korean consonants
‚ÜíA complete guide to Korean vowels
‚ÜíHow to combine sounds in connected speech
‚ÜíThe prosody of Korean, including rhythm, stress and reduction
‚ÜíHow to practice and measure your pronunciation and much more!

‚òÖAnd the final, and biggest, objective of this course is to kill shame. 

‚óÜResearch shows that pronunciation is probably the number one cause of shame and embarrassment for people learning a language. That is not acceptable, and by the end of this course you will love the way you speak.

Course length: 20 lessons 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Level 1(Basic) : My Korean 1 & 2 (60 lessons)
‚û°How to read Hangul / Korean alphabet / Writing system
‚û°Basic expressions for use in everyday conversations.
‚û°Writing short sentences.
‚û°Pronunciation : Diction / Correction and practice.
‚û°Grammar : Hangul syllables / Subject particles / Simple tenses / Interrogative
I will be available to help you with your learning until you're able to speak with confidence and fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: Take it to the next level
pro_course_detail.description:
Level 2 (Intermediate) : Korean 4 5 6 (60 lessons)
‚û°Useful Expressions for real life Korean conversation.
‚û°Reinforcing vocabulary : Homonyms,  Antonyms, Synonyms, etc.
‚û°Describing pictures in Korean
‚û°Grammar : 
  - Constructing sentences
  - Korean honorifics, Chinese Characters in Korean
  - Complex tenses, Conditionals, Expressing yourself

Gaining an insight into Korean sentence structure and word order
     - Correct use of words and phrases (collocation)
     - Making sentences using key grammar points
     - Vocabulary training
     - Pragmatics and intercultural communication

Level 3 (Advanced) : Korean culture in 100 keywords 
‚û°Conversation-oriented class(100% Korean)
‚û°Free conversation class with various topics(you can choose a topic that interests you)
‚û°Native accent and intonation
