pro_course_detail.title: Chinese Characters for Korean Language Learners (Êº¢Â≠ó / ÌïúÏûê)
pro_course_detail.description:
Fun & Easy Chinese Characters
Three birds with one stone!! ÌïúÏûê Êº¢Â≠ó Ê±âÂ≠ó
You'll practice three language all together in my classes.

Comparative Philosophy : Korean-Chinese-Western
Ancient Korean literature
Classical Chinese

Rare book. This book contains various aids for students of written Korean, particularly the Sino-Korean characters known as Hancha or Hanmun
This specialized vocabulary includes the origin, etymology, historical classifications and signification of each word. It introduces systematically the radical elements and their compounds, together with related or associated characters. Each character is accompanied by a chart demonstrating the proper way to write it and the evolution of pictographs.

It presents first the 1,800 essential characters prescribed by the Ministry of Education as the minimum requirement for the middle school through high schools in the nation throughout Korea.

It also lists 800 more general usages, the total number of its characters amounting to 2,600 characters; 500 academic terms and phrases, 1,600 high frequency compounds, and 1,200 phrases for typical conversational usage.

teacher_info.intro: First of all, I‚Äôm a passionate language learner myself. In my travels around the world, I have learned to quickly comprehend other points of view, which is very helpful when meeting my students and teaching them German. Before teaching German full-time to students all around the world, I was a professional business lawyer. Working for the stock exchange of Stuttgart has been my longest endeavor in this field and there I have learned how to overcome language barriers in international communications. Since then I have developed strongly my communication and teaching skills and am very happy about being able to effectively teach my students German.
teacher_info.short_signature: Ambitious and immersive learning, adjusted for your way of learning :)
teacher_info.introduction:
Hallo everyone,

Since my first trip abroad, I have been fascinated with language structure and acquisition. Although it was not immediately in the forefront of my mind, I was always scanning and analyzing differences in languages ever since. So, after I had finished my studies in business law, I decided to take a position at the stock exchange of Stuttgart. There, as a member of the legal department, I was co-responsible for international relations. My main activities included the negotiation and drafting of legal agreements, whereby we had to overcome great linguistic and cultural barriers at some times. We managed to navigate those tricky waters with a lot of linguistic and cultural research. After I had been working for over a year in that field, I started to feel a great desire to take a break and travel around the world. I have never regretted that decision and continue to live my life the way I feel it should be lived. Over the years I have traveled to many countries and collected valuable insights and techniques about language acquisition, which I would like to share with you. I am a strong supporter of the immersion theory, which provides the great prospect of learning a new language very fast and efficient while immersing the student in the target language. Therefore, I always try to hold my classes in the language you want to learn, and that from the get-go.

Feel free to join me in our journey of learning a new language every day, all days!

***My cancellation and absence policy***
Please let me know asap if you can not attend our lesson. There is a 24h notice for cancellations, so if you cancel inside that time frame and are not impacted by force majeure then I will charge for the lesson.

Thank you!
teacher_info.about_me: First of all, I‚Äôm a passionate language learner myself. In my travels around the world, I have learned to quickly comprehend other points of view, which is very helpful when meeting my students and teaching them German. Before teaching German full-time to students all around the world, I was a professional business lawyer. Working for the stock exchange of Stuttgart has been my longest endeavor in this field and there I have learned how to overcome language barriers in international communications. Since then I have developed strongly my communication and teaching skills and am very happy about being able to effectively teach my students German.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
You can expect an attentive teacher, who will carefully listen to you and provide you with helpful feedback and advice. All this feedback and new concepts/words/expressions learned I will write down for you in a Google Doc. I am always genuinely interested in my student's topics and therefore I know that we will find a common ground on which we can conduct our productive lessons. In general, I am a teacher who can talk about anything and use every moment as an example for teaching purposes. Last but not least you can expect a teacher with a high command of the German language and an ample repertoire of speech expressions.

contact me for more: valerius82@gmail.com or Skype (same email)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lessons focus primarily on the ability to speak and secondarily on grammar in order to reinforce the learning process. There will always be a determined effort on my side to create a relaxing environment in our lessons. With that and my ongoing support, I am sure that you will be speaking abundantly from the first lesson on. 

Since repetition and the knowledge of basic structures are very important for quickly learning a language, I make it a habit to use the same words and language structures repetitively in my lessons after introducing them to my students.   
At the beginning of the lesson, we will probably talk about your day in order to warm up and practice some small talk.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:
Please let me know asap if you can not attend our lesson. There is a 24h notice for cancellations, so if you cancel inside that time frame then I will charge for the lesson.
If you book two lessons in a row (less than 8 hrs. difference in between) or book a lesson for the weekend then notice time increases to 48h. The weekend spots are very popular and I plan long ahead to provide them to you, still there are cancellations, which makes them unavailable for other students.

Please test your internet connection and communication applications (e.g. Skype) before the lesson starts, there will be no refunds because of viruses, windows updates, etc. 

Thank you!

pro_course_detail.title: German Kickstarter for Beginners (Material included / A1 - B1), also TEST - Preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
Welcome to the 'Kick Starter' course!

If you have zero or just a bit of knowledge in German and would like to get a jump start, then sign up for this course. 
Here, I will introduce you in a fun and casual way to the basics.
You will start talking right away and in consecutive lessons, we will recall and practice everything you had learned in our previous lessons. Eventually, we will cut out a concrete track for you to achieve your ultimate German goal, may it be for your professional career or for an immersive visit to Germany.

The goal of this course is for you to learn very quickly. We will, therefore, set the bar high (if you want :) ) and immerse you completely in German. It's called ambitious and immersive learning, whereby the possibility of failure is recognized and accepted because it is an important part of any learning process. 

Don't worry now! I am not talking about you failing in this course. 
I am talking about putting you in that comfort zone, where you can apply everything you have learned right away and without any restrictions. 

I will provide all the didactic material needed in this course!

Come, let's start your ambitious learning of the German language.

bis bald!

pro_course_detail.description:
Lieber Kandidat,

in diesem Kurs will ich dich optimal auf dein Vorstellungsgespr√§ch vorbereiten. Du wirst √ºbliche und √ºberraschende Fragen beantworten und ich werde dabei Notizen f√ºr dich machen. teacher_info.about_teacher:
Are you bored of monotone textbooks? Are you tired of difficult grammar without conversation practice and fun? Look no further :) In my lessons, you will learn everything necessary to speak German fluently asap and reach your goals with fun!

My teaching journey started right after finishing school. I immediately flew to Russia and began working as a German teacher in a language camp. It was a really fulfilling experience to work with children and help them out with German. I vividly remember the sweet letters I received from my satisfied students :)

In 2020 I started to teach online due to the pandemic.

All in all I gathered around 4 years of experience with more than 100 happy students.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
What makes a great lesson?

+Knowing your motivation and learning goal is crucial
+Building a good relationship
+Talking about shared interests
+Giving you room to express yourself without interruptions
+Fun, Musical breaks
+The more German we speak, the better

What can you expect from my lessons?

My lessons focus on your speaking ability ... with occasional writing and reading
I am using various materials like texts, novels, poems, music, videos, film scenes etc.
I can suit my lessons to different needs: Traveling to Germany? Working or Studying in Germany? 
No problem for me :)

Come and have a chat with me ... Looking forward to meet you!

English Conversation for Humans üåêüí¨ 
(ÂèØÂÖ®Ëã±ÊéàË™≤/ÂèØ‰∏≠ÊñáËºîÂä©)

- üìå Customized Topics: Your learning journey is 100% personalized. We discuss topics that matter most to you, such as:
  - *Self-introduction and explaining your work history*
  - *Comparing different development stacks plus their pros and cons*
  - *Mastering keyboard shortcuts and optimizing your Integrated Development Environment (IDE)*
  - *Integrating chatGPT and similar tools into your workflow*
  - *Sharing your Scrum/Agile experiences*
  - *Anything you want!*

Why Choose This Class?:

- üó£Ô∏è Interactive Learning: Engage in real conversation and receive valuable feedback from an experienced engineer who's also a former English teacher. This is an efficient way to practice and improve your English, especially within tech.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q. Do I have to be an engineer/developer/software engineer/cloud architect to take this class?
A. Anyone can take this class.

Q. I'm a biologist/student/doctor/violinist... Can I take this class?
A. Absolutely! All professions and interests are welcome.

Q. Why is it labeled "for tech" if anyone can join?
A. The label helps tech people find this class more easily.

Q. Do you have knowledge of my programming language?
A. I don't know every language. üòÇ We can discuss any language, its pros and cons, typing, compilation, ideal use cases, and suboptimal scenarios. We can go into any technical topic.

Q. Can you help me with my grammar?
A. Certainly! As an experienced teacher, I take notes during our session and share them in a Google doc.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have already teached German and English to japanese People in Tokyo and it worked quite well. Now i want to improve my teaching Skill and help People learning the Language.
I work since Oktober 2021 on Italki and have got some Experience by now. I think i am on a good way to become a decent Teacher.
Since i had some Experience in the last year with teaching Children, and got the Enlightment that i am not good at it, i have made the decision to not teach Students below the Age of 15 anymore.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my Introduction Video i mentioned 4 different Lesson-Types. The Grammar Lesson is recommended especially in the Beginning of learning but useful for every skill level. The Media-Lesson is for more advanced Students to practice their skill and learn more. The Conversation Lesson is for Talking, as expected. 
Since i started teaching on Italki i am writing my own "Teaching"-Book. Have a look inside to get an overview of what awaits you. Also this File is the Structure of my Grammar Lessons. 
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1f46N53LUhWG2DVvmXynjQUcnTWlwZHnrIoe76KiJhLo/edit

My Skype does not like me anymore, but i can offer a Discord Server. Discord can be downloaded, or used in Browser.

I'm a native Korean, born and raised in South Korea. I'm a friendly person who enjoys learning new things and exploring new cities. I love traveling and have visited 18 countries so far. During my travels, I had many chances to meet people interested in Korea, which inspired me to become a Korean teacher. So, I entered university to learn how to teach Korean professionally and ended up earning a bachelor's degree in Korean as a foreign language. I also studied advertising at an art college, and currently, I'm preparing for a master's degree in Korean language education. I hope that my enthusiasm can inspire my students!

During my travels, I had many chances to meet people interested in Korea, which inspired me to become a Korean teacher. So, I entered university to learn how to teach Korean professionally and ended up earning a bachelor's degree in Korean as a foreign language. I also studied advertising at an art college, and currently, I'm preparing for a master's degree in Korean language education. I hope that my enthusiasm can inspire my students!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have been teaching Korean for more than 4 years to adult learners of various nationalities, both online and offline. I have also taught Korean to multicultural families residing in Korea at a cultural center. As an experienced language teacher and learner myself, I believe that learning a language goes beyond grasping concepts and involves cultural understandings in diverse aspects. Korean, with its numerous conjugations and high-context nature, requires frequent exposure in various contexts for comprehensive understanding. Working on it by yourself can be challenging, but my lessons are designed to make this process easier and more enjoyable for my students!

pro_course_detail.title: üü¢ Korean Grammar in Use for All Levels / Interactive Structured and Tailored Lesson / Customized Materials and Homework Provided
pro_course_detail.description:
ü§Ø üìö Simply studying a lot of Korean grammar and memorizing vocabulary lists doesn't guarantee that you can use Korean naturally. This is because many Korean words and grammatical expressions are used differently depending on the context, carrying distinct nuances. Moreover, In reality, many  things that are either not found in textbooks or differ from them are also frequently used. 

üîë ‚ú® The key to fluency in the Korean language lies in the application and practice of its concepts across a variety of real-world situations and contexts, guided correctly. It involves creating sentences that "you are likely to use in your life" and "vocalizing & writing" them until they become deeply internalized, and practicing paraphrasing these sentences in various ways is necessary. 

üßôüèªüî• For this journey, I have created customized resources for this class, offering plenty of practice opportunities and guidance to suit your level in a comfortable atmosphere. If you are an absolute beginner, we'll start by forming basic sentences with essential grammar points. Otherwise, we'll start by learning the areas in which you need improvement, gradually constructing sentences that sound native. Above all, I've designed this course to be both fun and effective for everyone!

----

*If you're looking for lessons that  use textbooks from university Korean language institute, these are also available. I would recommend them for those planning to work or study in Korea and who can commit to regular sessions, at least twice a week.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Angela and I am an Italian language teacher with CEDILS certification. I have been teaching online for five years now and I'm so glad to share with my students some of the history and culture of Italy. For an insight into my Italian teaching, read the lesson description below ‚¨áÔ∏èüîë
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Angela and I am an Italian language teacher with CEDILS certification. I have been teaching online for five years now and I'm so glad to share with my students some of the history and culture of Italy. For an insight into my Italian teaching, read the lesson description below ‚¨áÔ∏èüîë
teacher_info.about_teacher: Through a diverse range of activities I help adult students to enhance their Italian language proficiency. I actively encourage the building of new skills through experience and involvement in real-life scenarios, appreciating the uniqueness of each student.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My method is based on using diversified stimuli to facilitate the developing of fresh, rich and deep mental associations. After each lesson, I'll send a review to recap what we covered, with emerged key words that will be revisited in future lessons. I integrate grammar into real-life language situations, by immersing students in the language and providing them with many opportunities to use it in a more natural and intuitive way. While spontaneous conversation is a key component of language learning, it's not enough on its own. Therefore, I employ targeted prompts and create scenarios to challenge my students' knowledge, reinforcing their understanding of the italian language and culture.

cert_info.description: Certification attesting a teaching competence in Italian as a Foreign Language.

sorted_cert_info.description: Certification attesting a teaching competence in Italian as a Foreign Language.

course_info.trial_description: The trial lesson will be an opportunity to introduce ourselves and discuss about your needs and expectations regarding your italian learning journey.

pro_course_detail.title: ‚ú® Italian lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
The following outline illustrates how a lesson could unfold. It's designed to be flexible, and could change to suit specific situations and needs.

üìå Prior to each lesson, you will receive a specific topic to prepare at home in advance of our meeting.

The one-to-one lesson is structured in three parts:

üü¢ The first part is devoted to spontaneous conversation, fostering your confidence to express yourself spontaneously.

üü¢ The second part revolves around discussing the pre-assigned topic. By responding to tailored questions provided in the document, you can organize your thoughts and structure your speech. You're encouraged to create an outline and write down few notes to refer to during the lesson, aiding in more effective expression of your ideas.

üü¢ The third part comprises two alternating activities. 
The first activity involves describing an image or a virtual tour, which encourages attention to detail and raises awareness of areas in need of improvement regarding vocabulary and expressive fluency.
The second activity involves reading a text, such as a book excerpt or article, allowing us to focus on correct pronunciation and delve into the cultural context presented in the text.

üîé Grammar is integrated into the lesson plan and is included in the materials provided for each session. Following preparation, we will review, correct, and enhance grammar usage as needed. Grammar exercises will also be included in homework assignments.

‚úèÔ∏è  After our session, you will receive a written review summarizing the keywords raised, grammatical points to focus on, and any errors needing attention.

If you're new to Italian studies, I will equip you with the necessary tools to start speaking from day one. Materials provided will be always tailored to your proficiency level.

If you believe this method suits your learning style, feel free to contact me today. I'll be happy to guide your steps on the way of your Italian learning journey.

pro_course_detail.title: üí¨ Group lesson - 3 to 4 students (reservation by invitation: please read the description)
pro_course_detail.description:
*** Booking is by invitation only, so please get in touch with me before reserving your slot ***

Level B1/B2 - INTERMEDIATE / UPPER INTERMEDIATE
EVERY SUNDAY AT 10:00 AM (UTC+2)

If you're currently enrolled in one-on-one lessons but are curious about trying group lessons, now's your chance! 
Engaging with other B1/B2 level participants can introduce you to collaborative learning dynamics. In our sessions, you will have the opportunity to exchange multiple perspectives, observe different phrase formulations, and draw inspiration from the enthusiasm of fellow students. 

Every Sunday  from 10:00 am to 11:00 am (UTC+2), we will gather in groups of 3-4 people. During the lesson, we will focus on everyday situations, vocabulary, expressions, and structures essential for fostering fluent conversations. 

After the lesson, you will also have a comprehensive review to consolidate what you have learned.

‚úÖ‰∏≠ÊñáÊ∞¥Âπ≥Âè£ËØ≠ËÄÉËØïHSKK‰∏ªË¶ÅËÄÉÊü•ËÄÉÁîüÁöÑ‰∏≠ÊñáÂè£Â§¥Ë°®ËææËÉΩÂäõHSK Speaking Test (HSKK) assesses the test takers‚Äô oral Chinese abilities. HSKK consists of three levels, HSKK (Primary level), HSKK (Intermediate level) and HSKK (Advanced level)„ÄÇ

‚úÖ‰∏≠Â∞èÂ≠¶Áîü‰∏≠ÊñáËÄÉËØï Youth Chinese Test (YCT),an international standardized test of Chinese language proficiency, assesses the primary and middle school students' abilities to use Chinese as second language in their daily and academic lives.

teacher_info.intro:
MY PASSION IS CREATING GREATER UNDERSTANDING VIA LANGUAGE AND ART.

My name is Nicolas Luna. I was born in New Mexico, USA but I grew up in a small town in Mexico My mother is a writer and a literary editor and my father is a quantum chaos physicist. When I was 19 we moved to Germany for a year and since then the language bug has gotten me! I have since lived in Hungary,  the USA, Mexico and Thailand as well as traveled quite a bit. I studied Cultural Anthropology at UCSC and later earned my teaching degree from the University of Nottingham. I am also a visual artist and a naturalist, so when I'm not coaching you can find me reading, drawing or exploring nature!
teacher_info.short_signature: Language, Communication and Leadership Coach with 15+ years of Wide-Ranging Experience
teacher_info.introduction: I received my B.A in Cultural Anthropology from the University of California in 2008 and my Post Graduate Certificate in Education from the University of Nottingham, UK. I also have a TEFL Certificate from Oxford Seminars. I have extensive experience teaching English in formal and informal settings as well as online, most recently with a large Chinese company. Jobs I have had range from Assistant to the Superintendent of The American School of Puebla, to Head of the Arts Department at Varee International School in Thailand to Professor of Art and Director of International Affairs for the Faculty of Art and Architecture at Rajamangala University in Chiang Mai, Thailand. I am also a painter and my interests are wide ranging which make me an interesting conversation partner. I love to get to know my students, their passions and their life goals. I tailor my extensive teaching experience to each student so as to help him or her reach their language goals as quickly as possible and in the funnest way. I am happy to work with all levels of students, though my favorite type, at this moment in my life, is fellow, young career professionals making their way in the world.
teacher_info.about_me:
MY PASSION IS CREATING GREATER UNDERSTANDING VIA LANGUAGE AND ART.

My name is Nicolas Luna. I was born in New Mexico, USA but I grew up in a small town in Mexico My mother is a writer and a literary editor and my father is a quantum chaos physicist. When I was 19 we moved to Germany for a year and since then the language bug has gotten me! I have since lived in Hungary,  the USA, Mexico and Thailand as well as traveled quite a bit. I studied Cultural Anthropology at UCSC and later earned my teaching degree from the University of Nottingham. I am also a visual artist and a naturalist, so when I'm not coaching you can find me reading, drawing or exploring nature!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
ARE YOU STUCK ON A LANGUAGE PLATEAU?

I CAN HELP.  I AM A LANGUAGE COACH AND THIS IS MY SPECIALTY.
 
I love helping others reach their work and life goals for which language has been an obstacle, and have worked with all different kinds of people and ages. I have been a teacher and coach for more than 15 years now. I  have worked in Mexico, Hungary, USA and Thailand at all educational levels, as well as online with business people from all over the world.

MY JOB IS TO MAKE YOUR JOB EASIER.

***Check out my interview to learn more about my coaching philosophy and method: 

https://www.brainshaman.com/2067421/15228717
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I GIVE PEOPLE THE TOOLS TO BECOME  POWERFUL COMMUNICATORS. ASAP. 

Language coaching involves learners taking the lead in acquiring a target language, with the aim of developing effective international communication skills to achieve future goals. My 15+ years of diverse teaching, learning and work experience have developed me into an extremely dynamic language coach. This allows me to give my students an absolutely personalized learning journey.

WORK WITH ME AND YOU WILL REACH YOUR LANGUAGE GOALS IN LESS TIME THAN YOU EVER THOUGHT POSSIBLE.

***Check out my podcast (below and on Spotify) to learn more about the my teaching style:

 https://open.spotify.com/show/0O0Zkb5hST80PA2JVx7mWg?si=Ni
teacher_info.cancel_policy: I try to be very flexible and understanding, so if you need to make a change, please contact me directly and I will see how I can help you.

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson we shall get to know each other and I will explain my coaching method to you as well as evaluate your current language level and thus be able to personalize the class specifically to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Fluent English
pro_course_detail.description: This is an English  session/lesson personalized to each student and focusing on four key parts of oral speech: Pronunciation, Vocabulary, Grammar and Fluency. I will work with you to create a solid foundation from which you will continue to grow in fluency. Our final goal will be for you to feel absolutely confident in reading, writing, listening and speaking in public. We will use my unique, fun and extremely effective teaching and coaching method which I have developed over the past 15+ years of teaching.

pro_course_detail.title: Learn to Draw in English or Spanish (Learn to draw in 5 lessons or 100% of your money back!)
pro_course_detail.description:
Learn to draw from scratch (or from whatever level you find yourself at). In addition to having been a professional English and Spanish teacher and coach for more than 15 years, I have also been a professional drawing instructor. I've taught drawing in schools and universities for almost as long as I've taught languages.  You are guaranteed to learn to draw within 5 hours. This course is available in English, Spanish (so you can use this as a way to practice your English or Spanish with a native speaker who is also a professional teacher) in Thai or in German (Nicolas is not a native speaker of these, though he speaks these languages fluently).

NOTE: Due to new a Italki policy, I can no longer offer packages of 10 lessons. Apologies!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher, my goal will be to make all the processes easier for you. I understand a language as a system, so you just need to understand the logic of this system and then practice it.

We'll do lots of exercises, and of course practice lots of SPEAKING.
Also during our lessons I'm trying to reach the best balance between grammar, vocabulary, and reading.

It can be both formal and informal lessons.

! Cancelation policy! If you ask to reschedule more than 24 hours before our lesson, we'll just reschedule. If you don't show up without a notification it counts as a lesson. Thanks for understanding.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
For every formal lesson I prepare material for my students. I collect the best material from different textbooks, websites, and make it easier for you to understand. After the lesson I can send it so you'll be able to go through the material as many times as you need.

For informal lessons we'll speak on everyday topics or any specific topic by your choice. So focus will be on subjects where the student feels comfortable, to progress towards topics out of your comfort zone. After each lesson you'll have a list of new vocabulary and collocations for our topic.

As a result, you'll feel comfortable speaking Russian and massively improve it!

ALL levels are welcome!

teacher_info.intro: I am a French & History graduate with an interest in language learning and cultural exchanges. I have some experience of English teaching and of sports coaching (tennis), working with both adults and children. My main hobbies include sport (particularly tennis), cinema, music, contemporary history and animals & the environment. I follow national and international news closely as well in order to keep up to date with current events.
teacher_info.short_signature: Native English speaker from Great Britain offering conversation practice and language tips.
teacher_info.about_me: I am a French & History graduate with an interest in language learning and cultural exchanges. I have some experience of English teaching and of sports coaching (tennis), working with both adults and children. My main hobbies include sport (particularly tennis), cinema, music, contemporary history and animals & the environment. I follow national and international news closely as well in order to keep up to date with current events.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have been working as a community teacher on Italki for around 18 months and plan to take a TEFL (Teaching English as a Foreign Language) qualification soon. I enjoy online teaching although I am interested in working abroad as a TEFL teacher and gaining more classroom experience. The opportunity to spend time in a foreign country to learn about a new
culture and possibly a new language is appealing to me. I think culture forms an important part of language learning and I enjoy discussing these areas with students.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching style is quite relaxed and I do not necessarily plan lessons unless a student wants to work on something specific. The emphasis is mostly on speaking practice and for students to express themselves on a wide variety of topics. In doing so, they should learn more about the English language and hopefully the Anglophone world. I also enjoy looking at the written work of students and enjoy these lessons when they crop up. Sometimes I use resources such as audio recordings and online articles to keep lessons stimulating or if a student so wishes . I send corrections and language tips via the chat on each platform and can point students in the direction of further resources.

edu_info.description: Language modules focused on different aspects of Francophone culture and the French language. Cultural modules examining a variety of different mediums (cinema, history, philosophy), often with a comparative focus between different languages and/or nations. History modules covering a broad range of ancient and more contemporary periods.

course_info.trial_description: Conversation practice for beginners to more advanced speakers of English. The lesson focus can be adapted to each student though an overall goal is for them to learn new vocabulary, phrases, grammar points and other important aspects of the English language. Each student is welcome to bring their own material to a lesson whilst learning resources such as newspaper articles can be provided.

pro_course_detail.title: English practice for beginners to advanced level
pro_course_detail.description: Practice and improve your English with a native speaker by discussing a wide range of topics. Learners can talk about their background, work, hobbies, pets etc or about some of the key issues in the news and facing society. The overall aim is to improve each student's level of expression and understanding of English and increase their confidence in using the language.

course_info.trial_description:
In this lesson, we can talk about general English, Tagalog, and Cebuano-Bisaya. You can choose any free conversational topics you like. Since this is a trial lesson, let us first get to know each other. After that, we will proceed to a formal lesson. I will focus on observing and helping you correct your grammatical mistakes, including sentence structure and pronunciation. After the lesson, I will provide an evaluation and tips to help guide you in developing your fluency in English, Tagalog, or Cebuano-Bisaya. Our lesson will be fun, easy, and engaging. See you soon, and I am happy to help you!

Take note: I am offering a more affordable lesson package for you. If you want to become fluent, it is better to take five or more lessons. Just check out my available schedules and feel free to book a lesson now.

teacher_info.intro:
~~~ Kindly note: I only teach adults here, NOT children ~~~ 

My name is Katya and I was born and raised in California in the United States, so I speak with a west coast American accent. 

 I have a Master's degree in English with an emphasis in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages. 

I currently work abroad as a preschool teacher in Canada, but I am passionate about teaching English to adults so am very excited to work with you here on Italki! 

I enjoy cooking, dancing and trying to learn French, Ukrainian, Spanish and Arabic :)
teacher_info.short_signature: ESL teacher ready to share my Californian culture with you!
teacher_info.about_me:
~~~ Kindly note: I only teach adults here, NOT children ~~~ 

My name is Katya and I was born and raised in California in the United States, so I speak with a west coast American accent. 

 I have a Master's degree in English with an emphasis in Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages. 

I currently work abroad as a preschool teacher in Canada, but I am passionate about teaching English to adults so am very excited to work with you here on Italki! 

I enjoy cooking, dancing and trying to learn French, Ukrainian, Spanish and Arabic :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have 7 years of experience teaching English learners of different ages and levels. I love to teach academic English to university students. My activities support your grammar and vocabulary skills for essay writing. I am comfortable teaching academic English (FOR ADULTS) in the fields of:

1.) Anthropology & Art History
2.) English Composition & Literature
3.) Child development & Education Studies   

I am also happy to work with you on basic English conversation :) 

 ¬°Entiendo espa√±ol b√°sico y estoy feliz de hablar espa√±ol en nuestras lecciones si necesitas ayuda o si es tu primera lecci√≥n de ingl√©s!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
After meeting you in our trial lesson, I can create lessons for your specific needs. 
In each lesson, I include emphasis on listening, speaking, reading and writing. 

 I like to talk about food & cooking and enjoy when my students tell me about the best foods from their country! 

I use fun authentic activities such as:

1.) YouTube vlogs
2.)  Cooking recipes
3.)  Personal stories
4.) Newspapers
5.) Poetry 
6.) Theatre

exp_info.description: Supported international and multilingual immigrant students at San Francisco State University with developing essay writing skills across academic content areas. This work position served as my field experience for literacy training during my graduate studies.

teaching_experience.description: Served as a volunteer English language instructor in Cairo, Egypt during my semester abroad.

course_info.trial_description:
Hello! 

Before the trial lesson please introduce yourself in a message and tell me what you want the general focus of the lesson or our conversation practice to be :)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to practice your conversational English? 

I am a kind & patient native English speaker who is happy to help you! 

While we talk, I can offer suggestions of how you can sound more fluid/natural. 

I enjoy talking about culture, current events, history, cooking, travel & food, family, celebrations & holidays, art, gardening, and interior design. What about you?

pro_course_detail.title: English for Academic & Professional Purposes
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you have to communicate in English as part of your career? Are you a university student who needs help with homework? Or do you simply love reading and writing in English?

Then this is the class for you! 

Primary goals: 
1. expand vocabulary
2.) strengthen grammar 
3.) practice composition skills 

Together we will read and analyze many different types of English texts. We can look at academic research articles, literature, news & current events, business/professional emails, theater or poetry. You can tell me what is important to you!

teacher_info.intro: I am very patient, supportive, and passionate about teaching. I love to help Beginners, Elementary, and Intermediate level learners achieve their set targets and goals. I am always excited to meet new friends as it is always a delight to learn about other people's cultures and value systems.
teacher_info.about_me: I am very patient, supportive, and passionate about teaching. I love to help Beginners, Elementary, and Intermediate level learners achieve their set targets and goals. I am always excited to meet new friends as it is always a delight to learn about other people's cultures and value systems.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am TEFL/TESOL certified and a Bachelor's degree holder in Business Management, so I am here to help improve Beginners, Elementary, and Intermediate level learners.
	
Together we can achieve your set targets and goals as I am very patient and skillful in improving my students' structures in English, diction, pronunciations, grammar, vocabulary, and business registers.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I usually send a placement test to my potential students, and his/her result will enable me know their level in English and this will equally help me generate a customized learning plan that will suit their exact needs.

I always give my active students home-work and assignments to still get them engaged outside the classroom and to equally enable me track and monitor their progress.

I have a lot of beautiful resources and teaching materials that are very engaging and interactive with my students.

exp_info.description: Being an online tutor, I taught business English, and general English and also prepared students for various English tests and examinations on; Listening, speaking, reading, and writing from March 2020 to May 2024.

cert_info.description: 120 hours online English teaching course

teaching_experience.description: Over the past five years, I have had the opportunity to work with diverse learners, including business professionals, executives, and international students. Moreover, I have had the privilege of preparing over 250 students for the IELTS, TOEFL, and CAE exams. I have also handled lots of business lessons relating to management, finance, marketing, presentations, job interview preparations, and free conversations relating to all kinds of fields.

course_info.trial_description:
Hi, I am Raymond from Nigeria, TEFL/TESOL Certified. I have a bachelor's degree in Business Management, with 5 years of teaching experience in General English, Business English, IELTS, TOEFL, CAE, CELP, etc.
I specialize in improving Beginners, Intermediate, and Advanced level learners.

I understand the challenges in learning a foreign language and so I am very witty and patient in teaching lessons on Grammar, Vocabulary, Pronunciation, Fluency, Writing, and Speaking.

pro_course_detail.title: ‚úîüí≤üí∞ Interview Preparation Coaching üëçüí™üí∞
pro_course_detail.description:
Are you getting ready to look for your new Dream Job and you need to use English? Awesome! üí≤üí∞

I'll work with you hand-in-hand to maximize opportunities by optimizing your CV/resume, tailoring your cover letters, and perfecting your interview skills üëç

Because I've been a hiring manager in several Fortune 500 companies I am the perfect coach to accompany you along your journey to get your new Dream Job. I know 1st hand what the interviewers are looking for and expecting from you. Best of all, I know exactly how to coach you to be the best you can be, shining a light on all of your most valuable strengths. I'll share with you my guaranteed interview strategy to maximize your winning that job. üí™üí™

We will select all of the most relevant questions to practice.

These classes are perfect if you are just starting your plans to change jobs, as well as preparing for the unexpected interview tomorrow.

Course Progress Journey:
 
Our journey begins with reviewing your Job Description (JD). I then help to review and optimize your English CV for maximum impact on both human readers as well as machine (AI) readers. From here we work together to draft a flexible cover letter template suitable to use with other JDs. 

Once this work is in good shape, we will begin to draft answers to many typical, standard interview questions, along with some questions that are specific to the company where you will be interviewed. Example standard questions include a self-introduction, why should we hire you, what are your strengths, and many more.

Then, in following classes, we will practice the answers in a realistic mock-interview style, and I will continue to help review and optimize the answers to create maximum value to the interviewer. As we finalize answers to each question we will continue to add new Q&A to the growing list of questions, practicing and revising, until you are fully confident and prepared, or until the interview date has arrived and our journey comes to an end. üòä

Before becoming a full-time English trainer I had over 30 years of experience working as a professional in all kinds of companies, from small start-ups to Fortune 500 enterprises. teacher_info.intro: The lessons are offered with maximum adaptablity to each student's individual requirements and goals. Lessons can be teacher- or student-led and can cover any subject of personal interest or professional demand.
teacher_info.introduction: HELLO, I'M JAMIE. I'm a native English speaker from the United Kingdom and I have a clear accent that is easy to understand. In the video above I speak quite quickly so don't worry if you didn't understand everything, that's why I'm here! From my own experience learning French and Spanish I can say that conversation is the best way to both reinforce everything you are learning and to find the places where you need to improve. It is also an opportunity to get away from the books and remind yourself that what you're learning is a real functioning language spoken by real functioning people ;) I'm able to adapt to a teaching style that suits you. We will talk about this in the first lesson and I will do my best to accommodate any requests you may have. Feel free to send me a message if you already know what you prefer. We will begin simply with conversation but there will be the opportunity to use any resources that you may want to bring to the lesson ‚Äì songs, news articles or anything else easily accessible online or that you can send me before/during the lesson. I've recently bought a book called "Grammaire Anglaise", a book about English grammar written for French students of English. I will be studying this gradually and using it as a reference to enable me to offer better insights and more helpful explanations about the way the English language works. I have studied astrophysics at university level and have an understanding of a more academic use of English.. I also play the guitar. I'm more than happy to use the guitar as a focal point for lessons if you're also a guitarist ‚Äì we can discuss our favourite musicians and steal each other's ideas ! *** IMPORTANT *** For the 5 lesson package: all 5 lessons must be taken within 3 weeks of me accepting the request :)

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson is a good chance for us to meet each other and decide if you think we're a good match.
It will help us understand whether your needs meet my opportunities.
I will explain you my teching methods and we will also focus on what you're hoping to get from our lessons, so that will help me make our program more productive.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson we will pay attention to grammar, alphabet(according to your needs) and pronunciation.
Among other things, we‚Äôll read dialogs, go through various grammatical exercises, practice commonly used phrases. After each lesson you will be provided with the list of new vocabulary we used during our lesson. I will do my best to make you feel confident in each topic of the Russian language.
Let‚Äôs start learning this interesting Slavic language together!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian - Intermediate to Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson we will have a conversation, but that doesn't mean we are just going to chat informally, I will also pay attention to your grammar, use of language and vocabulary.
Before the lesson we will consider the topics we are going to talk about.
I'll do my best to help you meet your aims and goals.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
IF YOUR DESIRED SLOT IS NOT AVAILABLE, MESSAGE ME AND IF I AM AVAILABLE WE CAN STILL BOOK A LESSON. 
I have been teaching for several years now, I used to work with kids, teenagers and adults as well. I try to incorporate a lot of visual material, as I believe, it is much more efficient to learn this way, especially on a beginner level. Therefore the lessons are always fun, catchy, and not tedious. Though Georgian is not the easiest language, I am sure we can undoubtedly conquer it.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Georgian is a very unusual but eloquent language. Everyone gets really into it once they start learning. The lessons will be completely adapted to your needs, if you are a beginner, we can start from the alphabet, if you know some Georgian already we can take on other challenging tasks. Apart from that, I will provide you with some interesting facts about Georgia, our culture, cuisine, and anything that interests you. I strongly believe it is a crucial part of learning the language.
We will have different books, pre-made materials, some audio files, videos and slides.

course_info.trial_description: During the trial lesson, we will get to know each other. You can tell me your goals for studying Georgian and your interests so that the following classes can be better adapted to your preferences and needs and, of course, we will start with some basics of the Georgian Language.

pro_course_detail.title: Georgian for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: If you are a complete beginner in Georgian, this course is for you. We will start from the basics of the language, and start studying the alphabet, alongside new vocabulary and grammar. We will do the listenings, speaking tasks and readings from books.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Georgian
pro_course_detail.description: If you already know a bit of Georgian but think you need some conversational practice, this will be the right course. Apart from just speaking we will focus on different vocabulary topics and pronunciation of the words and sounds.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, I was born in Hong Kong. I immigrated to Toronto, Canada, when I was 4 years old, and have been living here ever since then. I speak both Cantonese and Mandarin at home, so I can write and speak fluently in both English and Chinese. I am currently a part-time English tutor and a full-time Psychotherapist. I have many interests, including learning Korean, travelling, sports, Kpop, Korean Dramas, and music.

- Practice communicating in English about a variety of topics

teacher_info.intro:
Good day,
My name is Sara. I am from the United States and currently reside in a beautiful country in Southern Africa called Eswatini. I am pursuing a bachelor's degree in accounting. I have three years of experience teaching ESL to children and adults. I hold a position as an administrative assistant at a school. My interests include travelling, meeting new people, learning about different cultures, exploring nature and wildlife.
I have completed the certifications below: 
1. 120-Hour Advanced TEFL Course 
2. 30-Hour Teaching English Online Course
3. 30-Hour Teaching Business English Course
4. 30-Hour Teaching Young Learners Course 
5. 30-Hour Teaching IELTS Exam Preparation

teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a passion for teaching English. Being trilingual myself, I understand how challenging it can be to learn a new language. Therefore, I am very kind and patient when teaching. In my classroom, I like to give my students an environment that allows them to practice speaking English without hesitation and fear of making mistakes.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I can help you improve your fluency, grammar and pronunciation by having general conversations of your choice. 
I have a facilitator teaching style which means I promote learning through trial-and-error as well as by encouraging my students to ask me questions.
I offer conversational lessons for beginners, intermediate and advanced level learners (both children and adults).

teacher_info.offline_reason: I am on vacation

course_info.trial_description: Booking a trial lesson will help me understand your language level and what you hope to achieve from lessons with me so we can work towards attaining your goals together.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice - Adults
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help you improve your speaking skills, and English fluency by engaging in conversations of your choice. I can send you articles and newspaper reports which we can discuss during our lesson. I also offer structured grammar classes. 

*No test prep
*No interview practice
*No business English 

You are recommended to book a trial lesson with me before booking this lesson so I get an idea of your language level and what you hope to achieve through lessons with me.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice - Kids
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help your child gain confidence when speaking English through conversational practice. I can also teach your child basics such as shapes, colors, and numbers as well as advanced material such as grammar, punctuation, spelling, reading, and writing skills.
After determining your child's language level, I will prepare structured lessons for us to complete during our classes. The resources included are fun, engaging, and interactive to ensure your child doesn't get bored and enjoys the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English/IELTS Prep/ KET/ PET/ FCE Prep
pro_course_detail.description:
I can help you improve your speaking skills and articulation of the English language around your career. 
I can assist you in improving your speaking skills for the IELTS speaking test.

teacher_info.intro:
Namaste,

I am Sanjeeva, a native Hindi speaker from India and a language enthusiast. I am a certified TESOL, Young learners and Business English tutor. I am well-versed in Hindi, English and my beloved mother tongue Dogri. I am a graduate of History Honors from the University of Delhi and have an interest in Hindi and English. I am very keen on speaking pure Hindi, reading about the lives of freedom fighters in Hindi and autobiographies in English books.

I do have some experience in English-to-Hindi game translation. I love learning new things and interacting with people from different backgrounds.  As a student, I am interested in happenings around the world and converse over them.
teacher_info.short_signature: Experienced Hindi tutor‡•§ Certified Business English and Young Learners tutor‡•§ PG in TEFL/TESOL
teacher_info.about_me:
Namaste,

I am Sanjeeva, a native Hindi speaker from India and a language enthusiast. I am a certified TESOL, Young learners and Business English tutor. I am well-versed in Hindi, English and my beloved mother tongue Dogri. I am a graduate of History Honors from the University of Delhi and have an interest in Hindi and English. I am very keen on speaking pure Hindi, reading about the lives of freedom fighters in Hindi and autobiographies in English books.

I do have some experience in English-to-Hindi game translation. I love learning new things and interacting with people from different backgrounds.  As a student, I am interested in happenings around the world and converse over them.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
PS- I don't teach English accents.

I am providing tutoring services for the last 3 years since my school days, In the last few years, I was fortunate enough to get an opportunity to teach in one of my village schools and work with several NGOs teaching Hindi, English and Indian History to committed children. I learnt a lot from them.

With my experience in teaching different age groups ranging from 6-70 years old and from different backgrounds, I assure quality in my teaching because I am well versed with cultural differences and language learning nuisances for beginners and intermediates.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
1) Every day is a new day and it motivates me to add value to my work and teaching style.
2) I am dependable and always believe in interactive sessions.
3) In case you are scared of surprise tests, don‚Äôt worry, the teaching style would be modified at your convenience.
4) I take feedback at the end of the class to know students' requirements in a better way.
 Regular homework and discussion of past lessons to keep everything on track. 
5) Screensharing, complete class notes will be shared with you.

edu_info.description: PG in TEFL.

cert_info.description: Certified Young Learners Teacher in English

sorted_cert_info.description: Certified Young Learners Teacher in English

course_info.trial_description:
Hello Vibrant Souls,

Don't believe naysayers if you are beginning from scratch. Feel free to book a trial class and together we will assess your needs in learning Hindi or English. Trial class for me is about friendly talks on note taking, your interests, preferred mode of learning and making you familiar with my way of proceeding with you.

PS- Feel free to talk about your learning needs and put different suggestions on the table. We will make a study plan together.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Hindi Practice (adults + Kids above 9)
pro_course_detail.description:
We will talk about a topic of your choice, what interests you, Indian culture, real-life experiences, and many more. 

Target learners- This course is designed for those learners who have a basic idea of Hindi, advanced level learners from all ages and cultures ( I love interacting with people from different backgrounds and broadening my mind's horizon).

PS- I don't teach hardcore grammar in this course. This course is conversation based with a focus on your fluency, pronunciation, sentence formation, and vocabulary

pro_course_detail.title: For Conversational English only
pro_course_detail.description:
We will talk about a topic of your choice, what interests you, Indian culture, real-life experiences and many more. 

Target learners-  Intermediate to advanced from all ages and cultures (I love interacting with people from different backgrounds and broaden my mind's horizon).

PS- This course is not for those who are yet to learn English from scratch ( My General English course would be appropriate for them) and I DON'T TEACH accents.

pro_course_detail.title: General English- Phonology, Morphology, Semantics, Vocabulary.
pro_course_detail.description:
Aspects of learning- 

- Phonology, Morphology, Semantics, Pragmatics.

How will we proceed?

-  Alphabets recognition (Latin script), pronouncing, writing, Diacritics use, word formation, speech practice, Grammar, spacing, punctuation, Syntax, more speech practice, conversation.
- Personalized notes 

Target learners-

Adolescents to all age groups whether you are a traveller, homemaker, working professional, moving in with your Indian family.

pro_course_detail.title: Hindi for Beginners (A1 - B2  - adults + kids above 9)
pro_course_detail.description:
Hey there. We will cover-

1) Basics
2) Grammar
3) Spellings
4) Vocabulary

We will learn about phonology, Morphology, Semantics in this course.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Hindi for my old students before February 28th 2023.
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is specially designed with proper notes. It covers all aspects of Hindi at a conversational level. Students who have completed their basic Hindi and looking for conversation practice are welcomed to this course.

I expect students to revise notes after class. It is totally fine if you are not able to revise because of your work. I will make sure we revise them together in the class itself.

pro_course_detail.title: English for my old students before March 2024.
pro_course_detail.description: This course contains beginner and conversational English lessons for my old students before March 2024.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello, Ola,Bonjour, Marhaba, Ni hao, Breviet,
My name is Candice and I'm an experienced online English teacher from South Africa. I love walking my dog on the beach and reading any good book I can find. I am a TEFL & TESOL qualified teacher and have over 3 years of experience teaching many different types of English to people from different countries. I started off my teaching career in Thailand, teaching conversational English to Thai high school students.
I have had hundreds of students from beginner to advanced levels and I always structure my lessons depending on the needs of each student. 
Thank You!
Gracias!
Placeba!
Shukran!
Shi Shi!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My students know me as a kind and patient teacher who likes to design lessons that are student orientated.
I am a TEFL & TESOL qualified teacher and have over 3 years of experience teaching many different types of English to people from different countries. I started off my teaching career in Thailand, teaching conversational English to Thai high school students.
I have had hundreds of students from beginner to advanced levels and I always structure my lessons depending on the needs of each student.
I have my own material and books that I have used to teach grammar, writing, listening, reading and speaking for many years and they have proved to be very effective.
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are fun and student focused. I like to create powerpoints, worksheets and different activities to engage the student. The student will speak most of the time in the lessons and I will guide them and correct them when appropriate. My teaching style is to discuss every lesson and what the student wants to focus on and how I can help them.
teacher_info.interest: I am currently sick and cannot teach. Please leave a message and I will contact you when well again
teacher_info.offline_reason: I am currently sick and cannot teach. Please leave a message and I will contact you when well again

course_info.trial_description: A first meeting to see if I am the right English teacher for you and can meet your goals. I will assess your vocabulary and proficiency.

pro_course_detail.title: Let's Chat :Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
A conversational lesson where I will assess your proficiency. The student can choose the topic to discuss in the lesson, or I can. I like to discuss current events, news, or personal interests.
We will discuss your goals in learning English and I will assist in your vocabulary, pronunciation, and fluency.

pro_course_detail.title: General English Lesson
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson will help you improve your pronunciation, grammar, and fluency. The focus will be on the four aspects of the English Language Reading, Writing, Listening and Speaking.  Building confidence in all aspects of the language is important in becoming a competent English speaker.

pro_course_detail.title: English for Travel
pro_course_detail.description: With my studies in Travel and Tourism, I can help you navigate the world's airports, hotels, and attractions. English for travel will equip you with the English skills you need to travel confidently. Focus on phrases used in Travel, practical exercises, new vocabulary as well as reading and listening tools.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS preparation
pro_course_detail.description: Both the General IELTS and the Academic IELTS are integrated tests. This Lesson will focus on the four important skills in the IELTS exam reading, writing, listening, and speaking. Each skill has various practice tests as well as exercises to make sure you are ready and competent to pass the test.

pro_course_detail.title: Cambridge (CAE) preparation
pro_course_detail.description:
CAE (Cambridge exam) is an in-depth, high-level qualification that shows you have the language skills that employers and universities are looking for.
This lesson will help improve the four main skills in the exam reading, writing, listening, and speaking with practice tests and materials needed.

teacher_info.intro: ‚Ä¢ Hello! My name is Sadi I teach German and Turkish here on italki and I'm originally from Istanbul, Turkey. I came to Germany twelve  years ago to study mechanical engineering at a university, I know the difficulties of learning the German language and would like to help others master this language. In addition to German, I enjoy teaching my native language Turkish. I became a tutor to help people practice what they are learning. Conversations are an exceptional way to build your vocabulary, increase your confidence and open your world to many new opportunities. It‚Äôs hard to join or start a conversation. I can help you.
teacher_info.introduction:
‚Ä¢ Hello! My name is Sadi and I'm originally from Istanbul, Turkey. I came to Germany eight years ago to study mechanical engineering at a university, and I have been working near Berlin for the past 4 years. Having studied Germany intensively for 4 years, I know the difficulties of learning the German language and would like to help others master this language. In addition to German, I enjoy teaching my native language Turkish. If you would like to learn German or Turkish, you can contact me.

‚Ä¢ A PROVEN WAY for QUICK RESULTS

For me it is very important that your German improves quickly.
If you have suggestions on ways to optimize our lessons them simply let me know.

‚Ä¢ STEP BY STEP FOR BEGINNERS

In order to make your German familiarity better, I will teach you the grammar fundamentals. 
Before our lesson begins, I'll send you useful learning material. That way, you have a chance to prepare and get the most out of our lessons and learn quickly. After you have a better understanding of the topic I'll assign you homework, so that you can see your progress for yourself. 
To get the most out of our sessions, I recommend that you pick up this book: Deutsch als Fremdsprache ISBN 978-3-922989-70-7 (9,60 Euro)

‚Ä¢ FOR ADVANCED LEARNERS:

At this level I will continue to help you with your grammar. Here we will also work on your reading and listening skills by working through many exercises together. In order to keep the lesson fun we'll be working with interesting topic that we pick before hand. In only a short amount of time you'll really start to notice your progress.

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon!!

teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone, I am Tesol certified ESL teacher with more than 7 years of experience in teaching English and Academic Advising as well as Accent Coaching. I hold a BA in Media and Journalism from Cleveland State University and MFA in Creative Film Production from Serbian Academy of Arts. My life has taken me to many places and I have studied and worked in different countries and enjoy multicultural environments. My hobbies are photography, following daily news, and rescuing animals. Add me on Instagram to stay in touch @minka_photo
Follow me on Youtube and SUBSCRIBE!

teacher_info.about_teacher: So far I have prepared students for Toefl, Toeic, Eiken, Ielts, Versant, ESOL, and more... I teach everything, from small talk to correct intonation to complex writing and academic writing. My students come from different fields from business to creative arts and academia.
teacher_info.teaching_style: The first step in my educational technique is to make student like the subject they are learning, I always try to discover their interests and then we go on to learning English trough that, Grammar is the base of everything so I approach that first, and the everything else is a buildup. I am kind and not strict, but I often give homework and additional tasks student can work on.

course_info.trial_description: Let's get to know each other in this short trial lesson! I enjoy talking and sharing knowlege so we can talk about anything and everything. If you have a request, I will try to design a class especially for you! Lets Talk!

pro_course_detail.title: Academic Advising
pro_course_detail.description: If you need help writing an outstanding University and/or job application I can help you to formulate the best Cover Letter, Letter of Intent, Essay, Critique, Personal History and more. Send me an inquiry and I will get back to you as soon as I can!

pro_course_detail.title: Test Preparation IELTS, TOEFL, TOEIC
pro_course_detail.description: I have more than 4 years of experience in teaching for specific English tests, In the lesson we will cover all sections or select a specific one you have an issue with. Let's improve that score!

pro_course_detail.title: Creative talk
pro_course_detail.description: If you are a creative student and/or professional that wants to improve discussing art and art critique, we can do that together. I am a master of film production a photographer and illustrator and my knowlege of creative industries is vast. Using interactive tools and a little bit of homework I can teach you how to analyze creative content, write about it or present it to your boss or professor.

pro_course_detail.title: General Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Small talk is also and art and it needs practice to be mastered. If you want to improve making a good first impression in a foreign country, present your country to others in the best light or just make your life easier on a seminar, bussines trip or work/study stay in a foreign country, I can help you master the skills of small talk.

pro_course_detail.title: Exchange Program Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: If you are thinking of relocating to a foreign country as an exchange student or worker, there are several steps you should overcome to be completely ready for new adventures. One of those is English, but there is much more, I was an exchange student once and using my personal experience as well as the experience of my friends, I will make sure you are ready for the new step in your life or carrier

pro_course_detail.title: Accent Coaching
pro_course_detail.description: Lessons tailored to fit your needs in quickly mastering the American (North American) Accent. As a teacher, I am not too strict when it comes to accents, but some students need extra work to speak more naturally. If you need accent mastering for work, this lessons can be of great help.
