teacher_info.teaching_style:
Working at the Center for Development and Education Quality Assurance helps me better plan and structure our lessons.
The most important thing in teaching is to meet learning outcomes and ensure quality. I always take into account my students' needs and interests.
So make time just to enjoy speaking English. I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll have fun learning it or enhancing and developing your skills with me. We‚Äôll do lots of practice. We‚Äôll work on improving your conversational English. We‚Äôll work on speaking, listening, reading and writing. Our classes will be interactive and full of energy. We‚Äôll set learning outcomes and will gradually achieve them.
I enjoy my work so much.
Can‚Äôt wait to start our class.

exp_info.job: Lecturer and Officer of CDEQA Center
exp_info.description: I‚Äôve over 9 years of experience in teaching English. At first I started as a volunteer then did my internship at a school. 9 years ago I got a job as a lecturer. I teach English to international students of different levels and ages at a local University so I‚Äôm used to cultural diversity. Since 2017 I have been working at the Education Quality Assurance Center of the University as an Officer. I also do work-related translations and manage the social media group of the CDEQA Center.

edu_info.institution: Yerevan Brusov State University of Languages and Social Sciences
edu_info.major: Pedagogy in the field of "Foreign Language and Literature"
edu_info.description: I've a Bachelor's Degree in "Linguistics" (Englsih) and Master's Degree in Pedagogy in the field of "Foreign Language and Literature". I've graduated from Yerevan Brusov State University of Languages and Social Sciences (formerly Yerevan State University after V.Brusov), which is one of the most prestigious and leading universities of languages in Armenia. Besides English I studied French as a second foreign language. I also studied Russian.

I've a Bachelor's Degree in "Linguistics" (Englsih) and Master's Degree in Pedagogy in the field of "Foreign Language and Literature". I've graduated from Yerevan Brusov State University of Languages and Social Sciences (formerly Yerevan State University after V.Brusov), which is one of the most prestigious and leading universities of languages in Armenia. Besides English I studied French as a second foreign language. I also studied Russian.

cert_info.description:
This workshop was organized by the National Erasmus+ Office in Armenia with cooperation of other institutions, including foreign, as usual.
The workshop was particularly important as it taught how to write effective project proposals under the Erasmus+ programme. What I gained there can really be useful not only for applying for the Erasmus+ projects.
cert_info.certificate: How to write effective project proposals

cert_info.description: On May 5, 2021, I participated in a webinar on " From theory to practice: activities for any classroom" by Pearson English. The webinar focused on how different theories that underlie what we do in the classroom and how we can apply what we know about language learning to more effectively help learners in both the face-to-face and online teaching environment.

On April 14, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "An Introduction to Learner Agency Session 1" organized by Oxford University Press ELT. In this session, the importance of supporting learner agency in today‚Äôs classroom was discussed and the role of the teacher in nurturing independent learners with a lifelong investment in learning was explored.
cert_info.certificate: An Introduction to Learner Agency Session 1

cert_info.description: On February 18, 2021 I participated in a webinar on "Introducing the new Teacher Guides supporting learners with dyslexia: for learners preparing for the Cambridge English Qualifications from Pre A1 Starters to B2 First for Schools". The session offered practical take-away tips, activities and techniques for teachers to try in class with learners preparing for exam levels from the Pre A1 Starters up to B2 First for Schools.
cert_info.certificate: Supporting learners with dyslexia for Cambridge En

cert_info.description:
On April 28, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Designing for Agency in the Digital Classroom Session 2" organized by Oxford University Press ELT.
The session was devoted to explaining how we can adapt our approach and practice to help learners develop their agency, giving them a sense of control and ownership over their learning.
cert_info.certificate: Designing for Agency in the Digital Classroom

cert_info.description: On May 4, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Formative assessment: the principles and practicalities of assessing young learners‚Äô English skills from a distance" organized by Pearson English. This session explored the secrets to successful remote testing for young learners, and how a straightforward and genuinely engaging test can not only facilitate a stress-free experience for young learners, their parents and their teachers ‚Äì but also deliver the most valuable insights.

On April 29, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Our fun new game in Minecraft: helping young learners build their language skills" organized by Cambridge Assessment English.
Joined by Minecraft experts the webinar, was devoted to sharing how to integrate our approach to learning alongside the principles of games design in order to create an immerse experience for language learners.
cert_info.certificate: Our fun new game in Minecraft

cert_info.description: On May 6, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Exams, preparation and remediation in a digital world" by Pearson English. The webinar focused on the research from English language learners and teachers about their motivations and concerns in achieving their goals during the times they cannot be in the classroom.

On March 25, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Helping teachers talk to parents: A2 Key, B1 Preliminary and B2 First ‚Äì for Schools exams" organized by Cambridge Assessment English.
At the webinar, the value of assessment, how to tell if your learners are ready to take exams, and how to discuss each learner‚Äôs progression with their parents were discussed.
cert_info.certificate: Helping teachers talk to parents ... for exams

cert_info.description:
In 2019, I participated in a very engaging and productive online course on "Teaching for Outcomes: A course in higher education pedagogy".
Duration: 10 weeks
CREDITS: 30 ECTS
I think that this online course conducted by a representative of a Spanish organization will help me to better conduct my lessons and implement effective classroom management and communication with my students.
I've also participated in some other workshops, seminars and conferences and received certificates.

In June 2015, I participated in the Fourth Annual Student Research Conference, organized by College of Humanities and Social Sciences MA TEFL Program and Center for Research in Applied Linguistics at the American University of Armenia.
cert_info.institution: College of Humanities and Social Sciences MA TEFL

cert_info.description: On May 4, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Hybrid learning - tips & tricks (to move forward)" organized by Pearson English. The session touched upon how teachers and students worldwide are coping with extended hybrid learning and what we can do to make it easier and more effective. Topics such as engagement and motivation, as well as how to adapt methodology and processes were covered.
cert_info.certificate: Hybrid learning - tips & tricks (to move forward)

cert_info.description:
In 2023, I participated in a very engaging and productive online course on "Teaching for Outcomes: A course in higher education pedagogy".
Duration: 15 weeks
CREDITS: 30 ECTS
cert_info.certificate: Teaching for Outcomes: A Course in HEI Pedagogy

cert_info.description: On March 11, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Helping young learner teachers talk to parents: Pre A1 Starters, A1 Movers and A2 Flyers" organized by Cambridge Assessment English. During the webinar, the value of assessment was discussed; and also how to tell if your learners are ready to take exams, and how to discuss each learner‚Äôs progression with their parents.
cert_info.certificate: Helping young learner teachers talk to parents

cert_info.description: On March 25, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Getting the most from your test data session 2" during which the data we get from language tests used in the language classroom were introduced. The kinds of analysis that can be performed on the data, and the kinds of decisions that can be made using that data were also discussed at the webinar.
cert_info.certificate: Getting the most from your test data session 2

cert_info.description: On May 5, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "The Challenges of teaching in pandemic times" by Pearson English. The webinar focused on how teachers can cope with the situation and help students learn.
cert_info.certificate: The Challenges of teaching in pandemic times

cert_info.description:
When in 2017 I got a job at the University as a specialist of the Education Quality Assurance Center I was sent to a training on "Study Program: Anticipated Learning Outcomes and Student Assessment", organized by the National Center for Professional Education Quality Assurance Foundation (ANQA).
The certificate is in my native Armenian.
CREDITS: 24 ECTS
The training was particularly important as it taught me how to achieve learning outcomes and assess students.

I've participated in a lot of Erasmus+ conferences and received certificates.
This was yet another interesting and useful seminar organized by the National Erasmus+ Office in Armenia.

On May 5, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "One year on: adapting your self-care" by Pearson English. It touched upon the issue how social and technological stressors have put our nervous systems under undue pressure.
cert_info.certificate: One year on: adapting your self-care

cert_info.description: On May 4, 2021 I participated in a webinar on "A year of online learning: what's working, what‚Äôs not" organized by Pearson English. It touched upon countless challenges, including access to technology, adequate training, and the need to tailor presentation strategies, learning materials, and assessments.
cert_info.certificate: Online Learning What's Working, What‚Äôs Not

cert_info.description: On February 25-27, 2021, I participated in English Language Teaching Online Conference 2021 organized by the Oxford University Press ELT. The sessions were devoted to modern teaching methods and challenges.

On February 4, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "More ideas: How to teach an exam class for B2 First for Schools and C1 Advanced" organized by Cambridge Assessment English. During the webinar, I learned some useful tips that can be practiced in teaching.
cert_info.certificate: How to teach an exam class for B2 First and C1

cert_info.description: On January 25-26, 2024, I took part in Erasmus+ SIN-NEC project kick-off meeting in Teramo, Italy towards internationalization of universities and received a certificate.
On May 6, 2021, I participated in "Round table open forum on Hybrid Learning" by Pearson English.
cert_info.certificate: Round table open forum on Hybrid Learning

cert_info.description:
On April 15, 2021, I participated in a webinar on "Mock Test Toolkit - our new guide to advise how, why and when to run mock tests" organized by Cambridge Assessment English.
The webinar was devoted to giving learners a real-life exam day experience.
cert_info.certificate: Mock Test Toolkit - our new guide

cert_info.description: In October 2017, I participated in the seminar and workshop "Tracking the Progression Path of Students and Graduates at Higher Education Institutions" organized by the National Erasmus+ Office in Armenia and received a certificate.
cert_info.certificate: Tracking the Progression Path of Students

course_info.trial_description:
You can choose to have a trial lesson with me then if you like my teaching style you can choose regular lessons.
At the trial lesson I'll find out your needs and goals and also check your level of knowledge.

pro_course_detail.title: General English course for young adults and adults
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is intended for students who just want to start learning general English or master their knowledge. I teach all the CEFR levels. I provide my students with the best PDF textbooks, audio files, presentations, etc.
We'll focus on your reading, speaking, listening and writing.

pro_course_detail.title: Pharmaceutical English course
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're planning to become a pharmacist or you already are then this course is for you.
So if you need English to effectively communicate in the industry and to understand daily situations in a work environment I can help you. I will provide you with necessary materials, including PDFs and audio files.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English course for teenagers and adults
pro_course_detail.description:
If you want to enhance your conversational skills I will provide you with some of the best PDF books, news articles, audio files, online resources, etc. on the market.
The materials I provide you with build fluency through conversational grammar, themed vocabulary and relevant topics.

pro_course_detail.title: English for kids and teenagers
pro_course_detail.description: The course is designed for schoolchildren and teens who would like to start learning English or improve their skills. Special attention is paid to developing grammar, reading, writing, listening and particularly conversational skills. I will provide you with necessary materials, including PDFs and audio files.

pro_course_detail.title: Business Communication
pro_course_detail.description:
If you're planning to improve your English for getting ahead at work then this multi-level course is for you, offering more communication and language practice, helping develop relevant communication skills you need in negotiations and meetings in the workplace. 
The course is suitable for a wide range of learners, as it addresses the language and communication needs of employees at all levels of an organization.
I will provide you with necessary materials, including PDFs and audio files.

teacher_info.intro: Traveller, dancer, musician, sportsman, reader and lover of learning new things. That is me 11 words.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Professional but easygoing teacher.
I have the ability to explain well and to put the student at ease. 
I adapt to the student and I like learning while having fun.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I always adapt to the student so lessons may change according to that. 
Anyway, I normally use a pdf book (which I send to students) during half lesson, the other half of lesson is about conversation and general learning.

pro_course_detail.description:
In questa lezione si pratica tutto: la conversazione, la scrittura, la grammatica ecc. 
Normalmente si utilizza sia un libro in pdf che una lavagna virtuale (googledocs).

pro_course_detail.description: En esta clase principalmente se habla (y se escribe) con el objetivo de mejorar la capacidad de expresarse correctamente en espa√±ol.

teacher_info.intro:
Ciao! Sono Paola, sono nata e cresciuta nel sud Italia, a Salerno, una citt√† vicinissima alla bellissima Costa d‚ÄôAmalfi. Sono un'insegnante certificata DITALS presso l'Universit√† degli Studi di Siena, lavoro su Italki da pi√π di quattro anni e amo questo lavoro! 
Hi! I am Paola, I was born and raised in southern Italy, in Salerno, a city very close to the beautiful Amalfitan Coast. I am a certicated DITALS teacher, by University of Siena, I work on Italki for four years, and I love my job! I am also an actress and I love theater, literature, film and any art form!
teacher_info.short_signature: CERTIFICATED DITALS TEACHER WITH MORE THAN FOUR YEARS OF EXPERIENCE - CILS B1 EXAM PREPARATION
teacher_info.about_me:
Ciao! Sono Paola, sono nata e cresciuta nel sud Italia, a Salerno, una citt√† vicinissima alla bellissima Costa d‚ÄôAmalfi. Sono un'insegnante certificata DITALS presso l'Universit√† degli Studi di Siena, lavoro su Italki da pi√π di quattro anni e amo questo lavoro! 
Hi! I am Paola, I was born and raised in southern Italy, in Salerno, a city very close to the beautiful Amalfitan Coast. I am a certicated DITALS teacher, by University of Siena, I work on Italki for four years, and I love my job! I am also an actress and I love theater, literature, film and any art form!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Sono una persona molto paziente, solare e disponibile. Adoro parlare con persone di tutto il mondo e vedere i progressi dei miei studenti nello studio dell‚Äôitaliano!  Mi piace parlare di libri, musica, teatro, film, filosofia, sport, qualsiasi cosa! 
Amo molto il mio paese quindi possiamo parlare della cultura italiana, le splendide citt√†, il cibo, la storia!

I am a very patient, sunny and helpful person. I love talking to people from all over the world and seeing my students' progress in studying Italian!  I like to talk about books, music, theater, movies, philosophy, sports, everything!
I love my country very much so we can talk about Italian culture, beautiful cities, food, history!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Le mie lezioni sono personalizzate e basate sui tuoi interessi e le tue curiosit√†:  imparare canzoni, leggere poesie, articoli, ricette di cucina, parlare della cultura italiana. L‚Äôobiettivo principale √® parlare il pi√π possibile per praticare italiano! Ho esperienza con tutti i livelli dall‚ÄôA1 al C2: creiamo la giusta lezione per te!  

My lessons are personalized and based on your interests and curiosities: learning songs, reading poems, articles, cooking recipes, talking about Italian culture. The main goal is to speak as much as possible to practice Italian! I have experience with all levels from A1 to C2: we create together the right lesson for you!

course_info.trial_description:
30 minuti per conoscerci e capire il modo migliore per raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi!
30 minutes to know each other and understand the best way to reach your goals!

pro_course_detail.title: PARLARE ITALIANO ! Pratica di conversazione per livelli dal B1 in poi.
pro_course_detail.description:
Pratica di conversazione in lingua italiana per livelli dal B1 in poi, con aiuto di foto, articoli di giornale, schede per migliorare il proprio vocabolario e tutto quello che serve per parlare in italiano divertendosi e imparando cose nuove!

*** Se non riesci a trovare il giusto orario sul calendario per favore contattami in privato e troveremo insieme l'orario giusto per te! 
General conversation practice starting from B1 level. we will talk with the help of pictures, newspapers articles and more,  exercises to improve your vocabulary and everything you need to learn in a funny way.

**If you can't find the right time on my calendar, please contact me. We can try to find a time that works for you!

pro_course_detail.title: BASIC LEVEL A1-A2! LEARN ITALIAN WITH ME
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to learn Italian?  This is the lesson for you! A structured lesson that will take you step by step to learning the Italian language, with focus on grammar, vocabulary, listening, conversations on practical topics, and cultural insights. Lessons are organized with selected and personalized teaching materials close to your interests and needs, which will allow you to learn while having fun! 

The material for each lesson includes: 

- teaching unit and grammar focus 
- personalized vocabulary flashcards
- personalized audio 

Book a lesson and let's start together!

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Turkish for Beginners: If you don't know any Turkish, don't be afraid. It may even be better for you. You can make a more organized and disciplined start. You can be sure that I will select the best resources for you and give you lots of homework. Welcome :) 
Daily Turkish : We can organize the daily Turkish lesson according to your needs. We can work on possible dialogues in the hospital, school, market and anywhere you can think of.
Business Turkish : Business Turkish is a very broad concept. We can carry out a stable program for the field you work in.
Turkish for kids : We are going to see a lot of pictures and learn words . It will be fun :)

course_info.trial_description:
In the trial lesson
 Professionally, the student‚Äôs linguistic level and the goal of studying the Turkish language will be determined. If the student is a beginner, the student will learn to introduce himself at least, and if the student is advanced, the student will memorize 15 useful sentences and a useful word during the duration of the trial lesson in a professional manner.

pro_course_detail.title: Turkish language from zero to professionalism
pro_course_detail.description:
This professional series of lessons is presented through a recognized book in all Turkish language centers around the world
Where the lessons are structured, we start with letters and end with professionalism

pro_course_detail.title: I'm a Beginner!
pro_course_detail.description:
Merhaba!

I'm happy that you want to learn Turkish and considering me as your tutor.

If you are new to Turkish, you can choose this lesson package.

This package includes structured lessons for students who never learn Turkish before or forgot a lot. You will learn from scratch. We will make a solid foundation for your Turkish skills. to make this course more time-money-effort efficient, I will speak both Turkish and English. By the time you learn, you will hear more Turkish than English.

In this package you will get:
+ A lot of fun
+ Grammar, speaking, listening, reading, writing, pronunciation support
+ Well structured, tailor-made (personalized) lessons
+ A dynamic curriculum which changes and evolves depends on your needs
+ A free online classroom space where all our learning materials will be uploaded in a hierarchy
+ Slides, audio files, books, charts, images and all other useful materials that you need
+ Exercises to go extend and go beyond your language skills
+ Online support for your questions

You see the perks to learn with me. I take language learning as a journey and I think I'm a guide for you, not a teacher. You will discover the meaning of words and grammar rules, construct knowledge and create your sentences while I'm guiding and correcting you.

I know you are a beginner, so feel free to check your vocabulary list/dictionary, previous slides, book... and don't feel afraid to do mistakes: I'm here for you!

pro_course_detail.title: I want to improve my Turkish
pro_course_detail.description:
Merhaba!

I see you have Turkish learning experience and already know some. I'm happy because you are considering me as your tutor.

This package includes structured lessons for students who already have Turkish knowledge and want to extend their language skills. I will grab you from where you left and continue your journey. As my experience, I will find out some missing parts from your previous learning, do not worry. You are fully covered with me. I will use Turkish as much as possible. But if needed, I can go back to English any time.

In this package you will get:
+ A lot of fun
+ Grammar, speaking, listening, reading, writing, pronunciation support
+ Well structured, tailor-made (personalized) lessons
+ A dynamic curriculum which changes and evolves depends on your needs
+ A free online classroom space where all our learning materials will be uploaded in a hierarchy
+ Slides, audio files, books, charts, images and all other useful materials that you need
+ Exercises to go extend and go beyond your language skills
+ Online support for your questions

You see the perks to learn with me. I take language learning as a journey and I think I'm a guide for you, not a teacher. You will discover the meaning of words and grammar rules, construct knowledge and create your sentences while I'm guiding and correcting you. You will learn new phrases and idioms on the way. I would suggest us to read some articles, watch some videos or listen to songs and analyze them.

Even you learned Turkish before, I know you are not a native speaker. Feel free to ask anything you are curious, check your vocabulary list/dictionary. Don't feel afraid to do mistakes: I'm here for you!

Learning Languages is my Life, the best way to learn any language is through Conversation and that's what we will focus on and for sure there are many ways to learn but it depends on the person who is learning and we will follow the best way for you to learn it in a funny and easy way
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Listening is the most important part for beginners then step by step Student will know many sentences and words, so he will repeat it, here we are talking about conversations, because the basics in any language is the easiest part because at the beginning the student is curious and he learn the basics like 'good morning' and 'How are you?' then it will start to be difficult, needs effort and here it's my time to simplify everything to make it like a game, so the student will take the lesson because he enjoys it. we have a lot of worksheets, videos and games to learn through
we always have 3 parts in the lesson:  
1-learn what we need in that lesson
2-practice what we've learnt
3-Conversation

teacher_info.intro:
Ciao! My name's Chiara and I'm an experienced and certified teacher in Italian as Second Language. I'm here ready to help you in your learning path to Italian!

I'll tell you more about me: despite my young age I've been working with many students trought the years and I've developed a lot of experience both with children and adults from all over the world. I also work in public school here in Italy: I teach italian litterature, italian culture and italian language.

I'm on italki cause I love to share my passion about my country and I love to help other people using my language. So, how does that sound? Should we start?

teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a teacher I'm really thorough, patient and cheerful. I like having fun while working so the atmosphere in our lessons will always be really relaxed. I consider myself really funny (try to believe it!) and I'm sure that's the key of learning.
I'm also really empathetic with students: I speak 5 languages and I know the struggle to learn something new but no worries, I'm here to help you and motivate you in your learning path! 
Put aside your doubts and worries and get ready to really enjoy studying!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Would you like to declare your feelings to your partner using the language of love? Do you want to challenge your mother in the kitchen with original Italian recipes? Or just learn to gesture like a real native?
No matter what your learning goal is , we can create the right lesson for you!

I like to find my method of work considering what my student needs and purposes are, We can tailor our lessons in according to your personality and your learning style and I will be always there to help you and answer to your questions!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
For the past few years I have helped students to acquire fluency in the English language.
 It came to my attention that a lot of students who already speak the language at some level, feel the need to practice it in order to expand their vocabulary, improve their grammar and focus on their pronunciation. Therefore, Vocabulary, Grammar, and Pronunciation are, in my humble opinion, the three main pillars of a good and productive English conversation class.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Since I only teach adults, one-on-one, (18+) Pre-Intermediate to Advanced levels I feel free to choose the tools used in our classes.
I email articles and video clips ahead of time so they can go over and prepare the material accordingly. They recount the video clips' general ideas using their own words.
 The texts are read out loud so I can follow and answer any question about vocabulary or grammar. The pronunciation will be corrected at all times.
The video clips as well as the articles generate CONVERSATION, which is the sole purpose of the classes. 
As a result, we cover conversation, grammar, vocabulary, and pronunciation. Goals that are set out and achieved in each class.

cert_info.description:
TESOL: Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages
Training in TESOL methodology is generally recommended for teachers who plan to work with learners who are non-native English speakers living in an English speaking country.

Teachers help students to use English to communicate in their daily life in an English speaking country. This includes things like going shopping, ordering food at a restaurant, interviewing for a job, how to make small talk with coworkers, and so on.

teacher_info.intro:
I have a Bachelor's Degree on Communication Arts, Major in Mass Communication. I worked in the customer service industry for almost 13 years, talking to native speakers of English on a daily basis. I have experience with recruitment, training and front line management.
I love hanging out with my friends. I love discovering new places and meeting new people. I love learning new things. I love life!
teacher_info.short_signature: TESOL/TEFL Certified, Online tutor since March, 2016. September Price Drop, available now!
teacher_info.introduction:
***Update as of January 9th, 2018: Due to unfortunate circumstances, this resulted conflicts in my schedules. Hence, classes will now start from 7:00 PM 'til midnight, PHT, 'til further notice. If my new schedule proves to be difficult, especially for those who bought a package, please contact me as soon as possible so we work out our schedules. Thank you for understanding.***
I have a Bachelor's Degree on Communication Arts, Major in Mass Communication. I worked in the customer service industry for almost 13 years, talking to native speakers of English on a daily basis. I have experience with recruitment, training and front line management. I shifted to online teaching March of 2016.
I can teach students on all levels. I teach Business English, Conversation English, Grammar, Pronunciation and Accent Neutralization.
I tailor my teaching to my student's learning style and learning curve. That means, if you want me to go slow, I can. If you want me to go fast, I can do that too. Should you just want to have a conversation, that's super 'cause I enjoy that the most! Having a conversation is the easiest way to learn new things. So I can't wait to learn from all of you!
Your first call with me is when I will assess your skill. Yet what's more important to me is to know what you want to learn. So never hesitate to tell me what you want to get out of my classes. I'm more than happy to listen.
I will come up with a lesson plan for you. The lesson pan will not only be based on what you need to improve on. It will also be about the things you're interested in. This way, you will surely enjoy every class.
After each class, I give detailed yet concise feedback. I'll let you know what your strengths are, what you need to improve on and what we can do to work on them. I can also give you some activities you can do on your own so you can continuously learn even without a teacher.
So thank you for checking out my profile. I look forward to speaking with you. Stay awesome!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I shifted to online teaching March of 2016. I can teach students on all levels. I teach Business English, Conversation English, Grammar, Pronunciation and Accent Neutralization.
Immersion is the key to being fluent in a language. If you're not in an environment where you can experience the language you are learning, then I'll help create that environment for you.

In this package, I will train you to:
1. Be QUICK in organizing your thoughts.
2. GIVE UNIQUE ANSWERS and not sound like everybody else.
3. REMEMBER your answers very well.


We will do the following:
1. Identify the different types of job interview questions.
2. Learn the flow in answering job interview questions.
3. Create an impressive resume for no additional charge.


What to expect in the 30-minute package:
1. You can only buy this package if you're done with the 60-minute package.
2. This package is for practice.
3. Homework is to be expected.
4. We will be using different tools to document our lessons - e.g., Google or WeChat.


What to expect in the 60-minute package:
1. First 3 lessons are for discussing the different types of job interview questions and how to answer them.
2. Last 2 lessons are for practicing.
3. Homework is to be expected.
4. We will be using different tools to document our lessons - e.g., Google or WeChat.


Reminders:
1. In filling out the contact form, please indicate what job you're interested in applying for.

teacher_info.teaching_style: My mission being to bring the learner to the best of himself in order to achieve his goals, my French lessons focus primarily on the basic rules of grammar and conjugation. teacher_info.intro: Hello there! My name is Vicky Frost and I am passionate about languages. My goal is to learn as many languages as possible. I was raised bilingual by my French mother and English father. My level of French and English are therefore equal. My experience with other languages goes back to college where I learned Spanish, German and Italian while having literature classes in English and French. Later, I studied teaching for second language learners at University. I'm quite outgoing and love to share my passion for languages. I also like traveling, video games, singing, and playing piano.
teacher_info.short_signature: 9 years of experience, 8 years of them online (Fluency specialist)
teacher_info.introduction: Hello there! My Name is Vicky. I was raised in a French and English environment and I've taught to children and adults in the past as a teacher in a private school. My experience with languages goes back to college/university where I learned Spanish, German and Italian. The way I teach is by having discussions and adding some grammar if needed. I mainly focus on speaking practice since I think this is the best way to become fluent. I have many different ways of teaching and I talk about it with my students first to see what they like best. During my time in my languages program in college, I learned the business language also. My program consisted of communication classes along with languages which helped me develop my business skills. I am now a tutor online as well, where I teach beginners of any age. I like teaching children as much as adults. What I can do for you: - Conversation practice - Pronunciation coaching - Accent coaching - Grammar lessons and more *As your tutor, you can reach me 24/7 for help outside of classes. Cancellation Policy: Please offer a 24-hour notice for cancellation or rescheduling please. I will wait up to 15 minutes. If you don‚Äôt show up within the time frame, you will be charged full rate. Thank you!

Later, I studied teaching for second language learners at University. I'm quite outgoing and love to share my passion for languages. I also like traveling, video games, singing, and playing piano.

I now have 6 years of experience teaching online and 2 years of teaching in schools. I teach to both adults and children (at least 10 years old). I mainly focus on speaking practice on Italki since I think this is the best way to become fluent. I usually use recast as a corrective method but I will adjust my interventions according to each student's needs. I also have many different ways of teaching and I talk about it with my students first to see what they like best.  

What I can do for you:

- Conversation practice

- Pronunciation coaching

- Feedback

- Corrections
teacher_info.teaching_style: Lessons are different for every student since I customize my classes for everyone. I now teach only conversation with students while correcting their mistakes out loud. I also type some notes on skype/zoom while talking and explaining when needed to make sure that nothing is missed. For conversation classes, I usually engage in discussions with a topic chosen by the student for the vocabulary to be more relevant to them after having several classes. That way we won't talk about the same thing all the time. I then make all corrections verbally while having a conversation. The goal is to have an immersion.
teacher_info.cancel_policy:

Instant tutoring is non-refundable as the student is advised to check his/her material before the call.

 Cancellation Policy: Please offer minimum of  12-hours notice for cancellation or rescheduling please. I will wait up to 15 minutes during a class. If you don‚Äôt show up within the time frame, you will be charged full rate. Thank you!

edu_info.description: Dissertation completed on Mid-Twentieth Century Gothic literature (specifically the work of Shirley Jackson) and I obtained a Distinction overall.

cert_info.description: One of the most prestigious certificates for teaching English to adults, in which I attained a Pass B (the second-highest grade) and was able to take this knowledge to kickstart my teaching career.

A Level 7 course specialising in TESOL (Teaching English to Speakers of Other Languages), specifically teaching methodology and using literature in the classroom, and theories behind Second Language Acquisition

A 15 credit microcredential at Postgraduate level, which demonstrates that I can design and implement lessons which are conducive to students' mental wellbeing (considering aspects such as self-esteem, learning strategies, and individual differences).
cert_info.certificate: Embedding Mental Health in the Curriculum

specialty_cert.description: In this course, I widened and deepened my understanding of the most common English proficiency examinations around the world and how to assess my students' exact needs throughout their preparation time. teacher_info.intro:
Hello everyone, my name is Alex, I am Serbian/Italian and I have been living in Italy for many years. I also lived in Ireland for 12 years so I speak three languages: native Serbian, native Italian and fluent English.
I like reading, I am a tech savvy person and I like to keep myself updated on the latest tech news, I am a Movies and TV series addict. In my free time I like to do some trekking, traveling to remote places and being surrounded by nature and its sounds.
I have a partner and we live together in Italy.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hello everyone, my name is Alex, I'm Serbian/Italian and I would like to help people from all over the world to learn Italian or Serbian. 
If you have questions you can message me on Italki and I'll reply asap!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
If you want to learn Italian or Serbian language and you are a beginner my lessons are easy and fun: for example we can read and understand stories together to expand your vocabulary, or we can practice the Cyrillic alphabet (for Serbian) or we can practice the basic rules of the language.

If you are planning to go to Italy on vacation, we can have lessons where I teach you phrases to use during your stay to make your life easier.

course_info.trial_description: This type of lesson is a way for us to get to know each other and where you can ask me any questions you might have about my lessons and my teaching method. We could also speak a bit in Serbian so I can assess your level, if you're ok with it.

pro_course_detail.title: Serbian Lesson for Complete Beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
My Serbian Lesson for Complete Beginners are organised so that we can do a little bit of everything: learning Cyrillic alphabet, basic grammar, reading, pronunciation.
I have plenty of material to use during the lessons but we can use your own material if you prefer.

pro_course_detail.title: Italian Basics
pro_course_detail.description: This type of lessons are perfect if you are a beginner or medium level: we'll do a bit of grammar, we'll read and translate stories together to improve your vocabulary and comprehension. We'll do other activities to consolidate your basic skills and we'll start speaking from day one, with very easy sentences at first, increasing the difficulty little by little.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation in Italian
pro_course_detail.description: If you need to practice your Italian conversation skills this lesson is for you. We can discuss any topic you like. :)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Im an experienced teacher.
My class tends to focus on conversational skills, as well as increasing vocabulary (both formal, and informal). I have lot of experience to teach foreigner who starts from scratch . I am a very patient and compassionate teacher. I encourage you to make mistakes. Since mistakes are signs of learning. Every person learns differently, so my methods are not the same for everyone. However, I like the main conversational style that unconsciously and consciously involves people in the language deeply. You can tell me whatever you want to discuss and we can talk about that. Daily practice is an important part of learning a language and I will assist you.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I offer personalized lessons for my students who choose this option. I believe that this is the best way to learn a language. During the trial, we will talk about your interests and language goals. Based on your answers, I will create learning content that will best suit your learning needs. I will incorporate many different elements into the lessons, including reading, quizzes, free talk, role-play, etc. My goal is to make the learning process as fun and interactive as possible!

course_info.trial_description: HI! Im Lucia from Argentina and Im a Spanish teacher! In my lessons you will learn to express yourself with confidence having fun at the same time. My lessons are personalized for your interests and topics. Feel free to schedule a lesson with me!

teacher_info.intro: Hello, I'm Eleanor an English tutor with many years of experience as a private tutor and classroom teacher. I work with students at all levels, from beginner to advanced. I have such a passion for teaching English as I'm so in love with this beautiful language and it's always a great pleasure when I meet people who are working towards improving their English language skills. In my lessons, it will be all fun and you won't need to memorize expressions. After the first lesson with me, you will already feel comfortable communicating in English and speaking so freely. If you're working on improving your fluency, grammar, vocabulary, reading, pronunciation, i am here for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description: Being able to keep up with conversations is the most important part of learning a language. In my lessons I focus on interactive learning, which gives the students the opportunity to express themselves on diverse topics ranging from sports, recent news, politics and day to day conversations which learners can use be it in a formal or informal environment. I have a great experience helping students to loosen up and speak as much as they can regardless of mistakes because I'm here to correct the mistakes. Speaking English fluently is a priority objective in my lessons.

pro_course_detail.title: IELTS
pro_course_detail.description: Because English has become a global language, it often happens that as an important requirement you provide proof that you have English skills.IELTS certificate has become a very important certificate when it comes to this proof. Students often have a hard time with the speaking and reading but I make them more equiped for all sections with alot of practice. Come to my lessons let's get great results in IELTS. I have over 3years of tutoring experience in preparing students for this test.

pro_course_detail.title: Interview, Business And Workplace  English Practice
pro_course_detail.description: we will practice scenarios of your working life to give you  more confidence to get more involved using English language at your work, we will learn common phrasal verbs and expressions that are often use in the business world.  In these lessons, we can also work on preparing you for a job interview in English

pro_course_detail.description: There is a phase between knowing a language and fluently speaking it. In this class I will guide you through your speech in a structured way, never stop you mid-sentence, take notes of the point to focus on and teach you the necessary points to speak fluently. In my classes, I explain the topics with different materials. I care about being organized and disciplined. I give visual and written examples for students to remember topics easily. I support the lessons with examples from daily life. I prepare activities suitable for 4 different language skills. I prepare materials suitable for the student's purpose and target. I care about making our lessons fun. I explain Turkish culture and history to prepare students for Turkish life. I am also trying to explain the history of the Turkish language and words.

pro_course_detail.title: TURKISH SPEAKING LESSON 1 to 1 (DISCOUNTED PRICES UNTIL 23.09.2024)
pro_course_detail.description:
Speaking and listening based lessons are available here:
- Lessons in this type of course focus on speaking, listening and pronunciation.
-Speaking lessons are taught according to language levels. (A1-C1-Academic Turkish)
-In this course type, the student is always active. The teacher simply asks the questions or start the conversation and gently and instructively corrects the students' speech errors.
-The teacher prepares speaking questions according to the level of the student for each lesson.
-The teacher asks the student to prepare a presentation according to the level of the student for each lesson. (About the student's country, language, culture, favorite things etc.) 
- -Speaking topics can sometimes be a video, news, music, game or Chatgpt, depending on the level of the student.
- If there is a subject/grammar rule/word that the student does not know or remember, the teacher (if the student wishes) can briefly explain this subject to the student.

pro_course_detail.title: GENERAL TURKISH (FOR DAILY LIFE, WORK, EDUCATION, FAMILY, TOURISM)  (DISCOUNTED PRICES UNTIL 23.09.2024)
pro_course_detail.description:
General Turkish Lessons Suitable for the Official Curriculum
NOTE: 
-This course is not just a speaking course. It is a type of course where the 4 basic skills are taught through books, dialogues, videos, podcasts, exercises and texts.

-Courses continue according to the achievements in the official curriculum. 
After the level of the student is determined in the first lesson, the lessons are taught accordingly.
-Grammar can be very confusing sometimes. But if you want to learn the grammar in real life, easily and practically, this course is for you!
- In this type of course, lessons are taught in a balanced way based on 4 skills (speaking, listening, reading, writing). 
-Lessons are taught according to language levels. (A1-C1-Academic Turkish)
-Textbooks and materials are provided free of charge
-Based on the official Turkish curriculum and achievements.
-Students are given textbooks and different materials and special exercises for 4 skills for better and formal learning.
-At the end of each lesson, homework is given for the next lesson and these homeworks are checked at the beginning of the next lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: JUST GRAMMAR   (DISCOUNTED PRICES UNTIL 23.09.2024)
pro_course_detail.description:
If you think there's something in grammar that you don't understand, this course is for you.
In this course, we learn the grammar rules of Turkish and we do written practices. We read texts and examples from different books. 
NOTE: This package does not include speaking and listening activities.

pro_course_detail.title: LET'S WATCH TURKISH SERIES AND LEARN NEW WORDS !
pro_course_detail.description:
-In this type of lesson, we learn new words,expressions and idioms with various Turkish 
TV series and movies, and examine grammatical structures in the context of daily conversation. 
-We practice with the words we learn through the movies.
-I wrote my master thesis on this subject. I am an expert on how to improve the language abilities through the TV shows and movies. 
-In 30/35 minutes of the lesson, we practice watching TV series and learning vocabulary, and in 20 minutes we practice speaking with various techniques.
-90 minutes lesson are recommended for a better experience.

If you want to see my thesis on it text me on Italki.

teacher_info.about_me:
Hi there!
 I'm Alexandra, from Ghana, a lovely country in West Africa. I enjoy exploring new interests in my free time. You can find me listening to music, watching K-dramas and anime, or trying out new experiences. I'm currently learning French and German, and excited to see where these new skills take me!
teacher_info.about_teacher: Learning a new language can prove very challenging at times, but I aim to make it easier for my students. My plan is to break down complex concepts into simpler terms, providing clear explanations and examples. I hope that with my help, my students will feel more confident with their learning language.
teacher_info.teaching_style: To effectively support my students, an assessment will be carried out to determine their current proficiency level in their chosen language of study. This will give me a clear understanding of their strengths and weaknesses are. Additionally, setting specific objectives and goals aligned with their purpose for learning the language will ensure significant progress over a defined period. This personalized approach will enable me to tailor classes to meet each student's unique language needs and goals.

course_info.trial_description: This class will be focused on assessing one's proficiency level and background in the language. In addition the student will get a brief introduction to the language.

pro_course_detail.title: General Twi Class for Entry level and Intermediate learners
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson caters to beginners and intermediate level students looking to learn and improve their proficiency in Twi. The main focus of this class is on a number different elements including vocabulary, grammar, tenses etc.  which  are considered to be some fundamental aspects of this language. Aside this, I will also take the opportunity to work on and improve the student's pronunciation and diction. All in all, this class is geared towards building a strong and solid foundation in Twi.

pro_course_detail.title: General English for all levels
pro_course_detail.description: This lesson is suitable for learners of all levels and ages, this class will help you understand and interpret written English more effectively. During this class we will explore a variety of texts, including stories, grammar, articles, and dialogues, to improve your reading abilities. Through guided reading sessions, vocabulary-building exercises, and comprehension activities, you'll learn to read with confidence and understand the context and nuances of the language. J

pro_course_detail.description: This class looks to help English learners improve their fluency. We will focus on real-life dialogues, interesting discussions, and role-plays to help one communicate more effectively. Additionally, we'll work on pronunciations, expand one's vocabulary which will help the student speak naturally and confidently.

pro_course_detail.title: Twi Listening & Speaking Class
pro_course_detail.description: This class is meant for people who struggle to have simple or fluid conversations in twi. In this class we will work on your listening and speaking ability by listening to a number of audios/ videos and also have simple conversations on various topics. The main of this class is to build one's confidence so that they are able to have better interactions with native speakers and other speakers of Twi.

pro_course_detail.title: Assistance with English homework, English Interview Prep, English exam prep etc.
pro_course_detail.description: Do you need assistance with your English homework, preparing for an English exam or probably an interview in English then this is the class for you. I will explain to you areas of English you may find difficult and practice extensively to build your confidence and achieve your goals.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! I'm Michael, a stage and movie actor living in London. My roots are in Georgia, Ukraine, and Russia, blending a rich mix of languages and cultures into my life. üåç English, which I've loved since I first heard it in movies and through chatting with international friends, is now a big part of my daily life.

Over the past two years, I've dedicated more than 2000 hours both on and off Italki to mastering languages and teaching others. I've learned languages on my own, and now I use that experience to make learning simpler and more enjoyable for you. I'm fluent in several languages and can also help you with Georgian! üìöLet‚Äôs explore the art of language together!

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hello language lovers! üåü I'm a TEFL-certified language teacher fueled by passion. What started as a hobby is now my profession, and I know all the nuances of learning a new language.

‚úÖ Making mistakes? That's part of the journey!
‚úÖ Need help with Business English, conversational skills, idioms, or grammar? I've got you covered.
‚úÖ I tailor my approach to fit your unique style and pace.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
In our first lesson, I would like to get to know you better. Speaking in your native language initially will help you focus on expressing complete thoughts rather than worrying about individual words. This approach will allow us to communicate more effectively and understand the complex meanings behind your words.

I also want to learn about your interests so that I can tailor our lessons to suit you. It is essential to know your goals, whether you want to improve your language skills, pass a test, or for any other reason. If you're unsure about why you decided to learn a language, don't worry‚Äîwe can always set clear objectives and work towards them together.

course_info.trial_description:
Welcome to an exciting language-learning adventure! I'm an experienced language teacher ready to guide you through a trial lesson that will ignite your passion for learning. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, I'm here to support you every step of the way.

In our trial lesson, we'll focus on activities that match your interests. We can dive into books, explore movies, play games, and much more. The goal is to make learning enjoyable and relevant to your life.

We'll work on all essential language skills, including grammar, speaking, reading, and writing. Grammar is a vital part of language learning, and we'll tackle it together. Through engaging conversations and authentic materials, we'll improve your ability to communicate effectively.

During our lesson, we'll assess your current level and discuss your specific objectives. Together, we'll create a personalized study plan that suits your schedule and learning style. Additionally, I'll provide resources, exercises, and useful tips to help you progress outside our lessons.

Are you ready to embark on this language-learning journey? Let's take a modern and interactive approach to transform your skills. Unlock a world of opportunities and discover the power of language! Book your trial lesson now!

I'm very fond of foreign languages and I'd like to share the joy of learning with you. Romanian is my native tongue, I'm near native in English and fluent in French. You can also master any of these languages by choosing me as your teacher. My teaching methods are adjusted to you, my student. That is why the virtual learning environment in our case will provide optimal conditions for you to absorb as much as possible during our class. First, let me know why you want to learn English, French or Romanian. Do you need it for your job, for school or is it a newly discovered hobby? No matter the reason, I promise you one thing: with me as your teacher, learning will be fun and you will master English, French or Romanian sooner than you've ever imagined. I look forward to working with you.

60- and 30-minute lessons might be ended 1-2 minutes earlier in case I have back-to-back lessons. Thank you for understanding!
CANCELLATION POLICY:
NON-ATTENDANCE
Please note that you will nevertheless have to pay when you don't attend a class and don't provide any explanation BEFORE the lesson is scheduled to start.
RE-SCHEDULING
I will agree only ONCE to your trying to re-schedule a lesson which starts in less then 24 hours, but if you attempt to do this more than once, you will need to pay for it.
PACKAGE TERMINATION
A package is a learning contract, so I will not agree to your trying to terminate a package 
1) you previously requested an extension for (in this case I will be fully refunded for the package)
2) whose sessions I agreed to cancel and re-add to the package due to various reasons you presented either directly in the lesson messages or via email or Skype. In this case I will get the full/undiscounted price of the sessions I have already taught and I will also be refunded for 100% of the price of the sessions which have been re-added to the package. (This rule also applies when I agreed to cancel and re-add lessons to previous packages you used in the past)

Wait for my <bunƒÉ> message and answer <bunƒÉ> so that I can call you and start the lesson.

Don't message and/or call me before the lesson to say you are ready. (I usually have another lesson right before yours and thus don't have the availability to start earlier.)
Don't start asking additional questions when I am about to close the lesson. Answering those takes time from my break time and might also prevent me from being on time for the next lesson. Instead, type your questions in the Skype chatbox and I will make sure to answer them as soon as possible.

RESCHEDULING or CANCELLING less than 24 hours before the lesson is scheduled to start is NOT possible and/or negotiable.
I will not accept students' requests to reschedule or be refunded for classes they intend to miss or have missed. 
PACKAGE PRIVILEGES
Packages are offered ONLY on demand and ONLY to committed students who have taken more than 10 classes with me.
PACKAGE TERMINATION
Students who have requested to terminate a package can no longer benefit from package (discounted) lessons and, in case they wish to take lessons with me again, they agree to pay 1.5 times the undiscounted price.

COPYRIGHT
All the materials I design and distribute during our lessons are meant to be used only during the lesson and for the personal use of the student. Distribution in any way, shape or form is strictly forbidden.

pro_course_detail.title: Introduction to French (A0, A1, A2)
pro_course_detail.description:
An introductory crash course in French, taking you from zero to conversational. My sessions are very intense and target all skills: reading, listening, writing and speaking. I usually give homework (usually consisting of listening /& grammar & vocabulary practice), so that you can practise French as much as possible. 
If you are willing to do a lot of homework that takes me too long (more than 15 minutes) to correct, I may 1) recommend you to purchase a homework correction asynchronous lesson, or 2) decide to shorten the lesson time or 3) decide to correct the homework during the lesson time.
Explanations are usually offered in English, but I use a special method that will get you speaking French in no time!

LESSON LENGTH: 
The usual lesson length is of 59 minutes, BUT, in case I have back-to-back lessons, I will offer you only 55 minutes OR I will ask you to start and finish the lesson 5-15 MINUTES EARLIER or LATER so that you can benefit from the full 59 minutes.

If you need me to correct your homework and/or answer various questions between the lessons, you need to buy a Homework Correction lesson. Contact me directly for further info.
Please note that weekend lessons can NOT be bought in packages and they are worth 1.5 times more than a usual lesson. 
RESCHEDULING less than 24 hours before the lesson is scheduled to start is NOT possible and/or negotiable.
CANCELLATION:
If a student requests to cancel a lesson that starts in less than 3 days (72 hours), I will take a 50% fee.
PACKAGE TERMINATION
Students who have requested to terminate a package can no longer benefit from package (discounted) lessons and, in case they wish to take lessons with me again, they agree to pay 1.5 times the undiscounted price.

CANCELLATION:

pro_course_detail.title: A2-B1 Instant Messaging Course - NO audio or video (read description)
pro_course_detail.description:
This is a new type of course, that involves NO audio and/or video interaction.
Why choose it? You will get to practice a lot more effectively than you would while speaking because all your mistakes and problem areas will become clear and thus easier to fix.

Before the course I will send you a link to a Google doc where we will both be typing at the same time.
I will provide explanations and corrections in real-time (I am a very fast typist, my typing speed is of around 200 characters per minute).
After the lesson you will have access to the document not only to study your mistakes and learn from them, but also to consolidate your newly-acquired knowledge.
NOTE: When you send a request for this type of lesson, make sure to indicate that you understand that there will be NO audio and/or video interaction.
CLASS DURATION/LESSON LENGTH: 55 minutes
OFFER AVAILABILITY: ONLY until the overall number of lessons (for all students taking this class) reaches 50

pro_course_detail.title: *Premium* Romanian Citizenship Course
pro_course_detail.description:
*Premium* Romanian Citizenship Course
This premium course provides a mix of engaging and highly effective activities to acquire information about the naturalization process and skills needed for the citizenship interview and the oath of allegiance. Lessons also cover Romanian culture, civilisation, diaspora, history, geography and politics. I also provide proofreading, editing and writing services to assist the student in obtaining the documents required by the Romanian Citizenship Authority.

pro_course_detail.title: One-on-One coaching (synchronous) OR Personalized materials such as cover letters, CVs etc - ASYNCHRONOUS
pro_course_detail.description:
One-on-One coaching: Life coaching, Relationship coaching, Career Coaching
Only 45-minute sessions can be booked! Do NOT choose 60-minute sessions.
Personalized materials:
If you need a detailed cover letter, or a supporting statement, that requires you to outline how you meet the selection criteria for a specific job, I can write this for you! These are usually quite detailed and require you to give specific examples of situations, often using the STAR format (Situation, Task, Action, Result) and I will know exactly how to turn your information into perfectly crafted responses.
I can also prepare customized learning materials such as audio files & pdfs with topic vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: ASYNCHRONOUS CRASH COURSE
pro_course_detail.description: Learn Romanian effectively via asynchronous lessons. You will receive presentations, audio materials and written assignments to make the most possible progress in your Romanian learning journey. I will be available for coaching, Q&A and homework correction via email or other apps that do not involve real-time instant response.

Al ser abogado puedo orientarte en temas como la redacci√≥n, ortograf√≠a y gram√°tica, por lo que estar√© encantado de ayudarte. 

Finalmente es muy importante para mi que poseas un registro de la c√°tedra, por lo que anotar√© los errores m√°s comunes que cometas y te los enviar√© al final de la clase para que puedas estudiarlos y corregirlos en tus tiempos libres. 

Ingles:  

Hello my name is Camilo, I am from Colombia, I hope you are very well, I want to start by telling you that I have been an online teacher for several years, helping hundreds of people to improve their Spanish, during that time I have been able to perfect my way of teaching by coupling my teaching methods to the different needs of the student.

As for my professional experience, I must tell you that I work as a lawyer and I also dedicate myself to graphic design.

As a lawyer I can guide you on issues such as writing, spelling and grammar, so I will be happy to help you.

Finally, it is very important for me that you have a record of the chair, so I will write down the most common mistakes you make and I will send them to you at the end of the class so that you can study and correct them in your free time.

pro_course_detail.title: Aprende espa√±ol de manera din√°mica
pro_course_detail.description:
Hola te doy la bienvenida, muchas gracias por contar conmigo para ayudarte a mejorar tu espa√±ol. En lo que respecta a "aprender espa√±ol de manera din√°mica" esta es una clase conversacional en la cual podr√°s practicar tu espa√±ol sobre diferentes temas, algunos comunes y otros no tan comunes, para hacerlo utilizare presentaciones para guiar la clase, mientras la conversaci√≥n sucede, voy a anotar tus errores y te explicar√© porqu√© suceden y como puedes solucionarlos. 

Hello, I welcome you, thank you very much for counting on me to help you improve your Spanish. Regarding "learning Spanish dynamically" this is a conversational class in which you can practice your Spanish on different topics, some common and others not so common, to do so I will use presentations to guide the class, while the conversation happens, I'm going to write down your mistakes and explain why they happen and how you can fix them.

pro_course_detail.title: Aprende gram√°tica junto a un hispanohablante
pro_course_detail.description:
Aprender gram√°tica puede ser algo tedioso, pero es necesario si se busca hablar correctamente cualquier idioma, por ello en esta clase aprender√°s gram√°tica sobre diferentes temas tanto sencillos como simples, por ejemplo: los pronombres, el subjuntivo, el pret√©rito perfecto y el pluscuamperfecto, entre otros. 

Para hacerlo utilizo diferentes materiales did√°cticos que se componen de:  textos, material explicativo, ejercicios, etc. Para el final de la clase realizamos una conversaci√≥n utilizando el tiempo que estemos practicando, con el fin que el alumno pueda entenderlo mucho mejor y corregir errores. 

Learning grammar can be somewhat tedious, but it is necessary if you want to speak any language correctly, so in this class you will learn grammar on different topics, both simple and simple, for example: pronouns, the subjunctive, the past perfect and the pluperfect, between others.

To do this, I use different teaching materials that are made up of: texts, explanatory material, exercises, etc. By the end of the class we carry out a conversation using the time we are practicing, so that the student can understand it much better and correct mistakes.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Conversations and exchange are key. It is important to be able to talk and not just listen and write down things that are said by the teacher. That is why I prefer building a solid base (pronunciation, subtle differences etc) and letting the students improve by having interesting chats until the goal is reached.
I usually find articles, videos and documents related to what the students enjoy, make them read/see, correct some mistakes and then have a conversation about it.

Ich habe letztes Jah eine Fortbilung bei Telc abgeschlossen, deswegen bin ich bin zertifizierte DaF Dozentin. Ich unterrichte alle Sprachnievaus und Lerntypen. M√∂chtest du dich f√ºr eine Pr√ºfung vorbereiten? Ich helfe dir dabei! Oder suchst eine/n Muttersprachler/in f√ºrs Gespr√§ch?

You can experience the basic lesson plan!
(Please read the details of each course for the content of each lesson)

First, please tell me your goals by all means!

For example,
‚ÄúI want to make Japanese friends.‚Äù
‚ÄúI want to understand Japanese manga and anime.‚Äù
‚ÄúI want to work in Japan.‚Äù
‚ÄúI want to sing Japanese songs.‚Äù
etc.

I will speak in a way that suits your wishes.
I will match the speed of conversation and the level of vocabulary to you!

I look forward to meeting you :)

*Note
„ÉªIf you cancel or change your lesson within 24 hours of the scheduled lesson start time, no refund or transfer will be made. 100% of the fee will be charged. Please understand this.
„ÉªI will not give out more personal information than necessary, such as my address.
„ÉªIf you behave inappropriately during the lesson, I will not allow you to take the next lesson.
„ÉªIf you record the lesson, please do not post it on Youtube, tiktok, Instagram, or other social networking sites.
„ÉªIf you have any problems, such as a bad connection, please contact me via message.

teacher_info.about_me:
I‚Äôm back guys!! Thanks for waiting! Let‚Äôs get back to work :)

Hi there!  I've traveled for the past 6 years, living in the USA, Europe, and Mexico.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
At first, I started as an English tutor and after completing my Bachelor's Degree in Education, I started working in a language center immediately and now have been teaching English for 5+ years! 
I am experienced in teaching English to children and adults!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I love everything about teaching English. Teaching in a student-centered manner, always listening to my student's needs. I help my students identify their strengths and weaknesses so that they can continue improving not only while being tutored, but when they practice their English in real-life scenarios.

In our trial lesson, we will get to know each other, I will determine your English level, and we will also talk about the areas you need to improve.

course_info.trial_description: The lesson of getting to know each other with corrections on Grammar, Vocabulary & Pronunciation. Can't wait to see you!

pro_course_detail.title: General English
pro_course_detail.description: Let's start your journey from the very beginning! However if you already have some knowledge, let's master it! Feel free to book a lesson and find out how:)

pro_course_detail.title: English Grammar, Vocabulary and Speaking
pro_course_detail.description:
Whichever level you are, I will help you improve your vocabulary, understand different grammatical structures, and learn the language through reading, listening, and speaking.

I also develop my materials and curriculum for teaching English to any level, so I can provide a more grammar-focused lesson by request for students with lower levels of English.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
With most of my students (esp. A2-C2 levels), I use a conversational method for teaching English in which I correct your mistakes at intervals throughout the lesson so as not to interrupt you.

If you order more than 1 lesson, I will track your mistakes over time so that I can give priority to your most frequent ones.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Meghan, I am a native English speaker from South Africa. I am currently studying a Bachelor degree of Education. I have been teaching on Italki for over 4 years now. I have experience with both young children and adults from countries all over the world. I am currently a part time English teacher at a school for learners age 6 - 9 years old. I have experience in IELTS practice and preparation.

I love talking about different things like music, culture, and what's happening around the world. I make sure to keep up with the latest news and trends. Plus, I really enjoy spending time outdoors, I love to relax at the beach or go for hikes in the forest or mountains. :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Affordable| Clear accent  | IELTS Practice| 4 years experience!
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Meghan, I am a native English speaker from South Africa. I am currently studying a Bachelor degree of Education. I have been teaching on Italki for over 4 years now. I have experience with both young children and adults from countries all over the world. I am currently a part time English teacher at a school for learners age 6 - 9 years old. I have experience in IELTS practice and preparation.

I love talking about different things like music, culture, and what's happening around the world. I make sure to keep up with the latest news and trends. Plus, I really enjoy spending time outdoors, I love to relax at the beach or go for hikes in the forest or mountains. :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a very patient and easy going person, I will create a comfortable environment for all my students. I aim to cater each lesson to my students needs and capabilities, and make sure that all my students feel confident and fully understand what I teach them. 

I have been teaching on Italki for over 4 years now, I have a wide range of experience with different levels of speaking. I have come across many challenges and obstacles with students over the years, and have always been able to work together with my students to find solutions and make improvements.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
In my lessons, I will help expand my students vocabulary by discussing interesting and depth full topics. I enjoy discussing cultures, music, current affairs and love speaking about my beautiful country South Africa. I will help you along the way as we speak correcting your mistakes and guiding you while we talk about these topics. 

I love writing and editing English and will help you correct important English documents, such as emails, essays, speeches and presentations. I can help students complete homework and study for upcoming tests and exams. I have taught many students online and in person from all places and of all ages. I look forward to helping and guiding you learn!
