course_info.trial_description: During this trail lesson, we can expand your vocabulary by talking about interesting topics and current affairs. I will correct your mistakes along the way.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational English
pro_course_detail.description: During conversation practice, we can expand your vocabulary by talking about interesting topics and current affairs. I will correct your mistakes along the way.

pro_course_detail.title: Reading and pronunciation
pro_course_detail.description: This is perfect for students that struggle with pronunciation and sentence structure. I will read along with you and help you to pronounce each word correctly, this will help with accents, as well as help you understand new word that you do  not understand. After the article we can discuss the topics in the article and make sure you fully understand what you are reading.

pro_course_detail.title: Writing correction and Editing
pro_course_detail.description:
I will edit your english documents such as essays,emails,CVs and make sure that your grammar and spelling is all correct, as well as making sure it sounds professional.

During this lesson, we will go through your document and correct all your mistakes!

teacher_info.intro: Hi everyone, I'm Claudia. I was born and raised in Milan, Italy. However, I soon became a citizen of the world when I started living in different countries in my teenage years. I can proudly call home Portland (Oregon, USA) where I lived for a couple of years, Dublin (Ireland) where I graduated from Dublin Business School, and Sydney (Australia) where I worked as an Italian teacher for Newington College.
teacher_info.short_signature: TEFL qualified teacher with A LOT of experience ;)
teacher_info.about_me: Hi everyone, I'm Claudia. I was born and raised in Milan, Italy. However, I soon became a citizen of the world when I started living in different countries in my teenage years. I can proudly call home Portland (Oregon, USA) where I lived for a couple of years, Dublin (Ireland) where I graduated from Dublin Business School, and Sydney (Australia) where I worked as an Italian teacher for Newington College.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Before becoming a teacher, I was just like you: a student who had to learn a new language.
I know exactly how you feel and I know you're afraid of making mistakes. Been there, done that, but guess what? I MADE IT, so can you!
teacher_info.teaching_style: All my lessons are completely tailored to my students' needs. During the trial lesson, I'll have the chance to assess your level, strengths and weaknesses, and final goal. I'll design a training path for you and find out which techniques and methods maximize your learning. Anyways, no worries: we can always have an open conversation about which learning style you prefer.

cert_info.description: This certificate qualifies me as an international English teacher.

sorted_cert_info.description: This certificate qualifies me as an international English teacher.

course_info.trial_description: A trial lesson is a good chance for us to get to know each other and identify your starting level and your goal. Once we did this, I'll recommend you the best learning strategy for you and we can finally start to improve your Italian. Come on, I'm already excited and can't wait to meet you.

pro_course_detail.title: "chiacchieriamo" - let's chit chat! - Language insights from a native speaker.
pro_course_detail.description:
This type of lesson is perfect for you to practice your speaking and listening skills. You will find out about all sorts of curiosity related to the Italian language and culture. 
Ultimately, it will help you become more fluent and confident while speaking Italian.

pro_course_detail.title: BOOST VOCABULARY&GRAMMAR - From A-Z, a tailored learning journey.
pro_course_detail.description:
First, we assess your level and goals, where you start from, and where you want to get. 
Then I'll design a complete learning experience for you based on the number of lessons you purchased.

pro_course_detail.title: FARE COLPO - How to impress italian women!
pro_course_detail.description: Let's have some fun talking about what to say/do and not say/do around Italian women  (beautiful yet dangerous creatures). Obviously, all women are different, so I do not guarantee results whatsoever. Hopefully, my knowledge of the culture will help you out with this venture. LOL

pro_course_detail.title: GRAMMAR EXPLAINED!
pro_course_detail.description: Uncertain about English grammar? Well, I'm here to clear up any possible doubt you might have. Let me unlock your knowledge and boost your confidence through a quick and easy explanation, some exercise, and speaking practice! Results guaranteed.

teacher_info.intro: I'm a Thai tutor. I have been teaching Thai since 2015 . I have taught students from many countries, I know about their common problems with Thai language and I help them to fix and improve their abilities in learning a new language.
teacher_info.short_signature: Can't speak Thai? No problem. Let me be your Thai tutor!!
teacher_info.about_me: I'm a Thai tutor. I have been teaching Thai since 2015 . I have taught students from many countries, I know about their common problems with Thai language and I help them to fix and improve their abilities in learning a new language.
teacher_info.about_teacher: My teaching style, I will teach you as one of my friends and as a result you will enjoy to learn the common Thai language and culture that can help you to understand how Thais think.  You could also request specific topics or ideas you would like to learn. I'm here to assist you in achieving your goals so you can increasingly become more proficient within the Thai language and use it on a regular basis or in real life situations.
teacher_info.teaching_style: for the beginner we will learn basic Thai. for the first hour you will can make a easy sentence.

course_info.trial_description: Thai is tonal languages every each tone will have different meaning therefore in our trial lesson. we will learn about Thai tones and pronunciation to make you get know Thai.

pro_course_detail.title: Thai coversation for every levels
pro_course_detail.description:
Thai is a tonal languages first of all we will learn about tones, how to make a Thai sentences, learn the word that you can use in our daily life, how to make a question. or if you have any particular topic you would like to learn just let me know your needs. 

but if you can speak Thai and would like to practice coversation we will talk about topic that you are interested, or the topic that I decide.

pro_course_detail.title: Thai reading and writing
pro_course_detail.description: Lean Thai alphabet ,vowel and pronunciation. Lean how to read write the word from the beginning(if you have never learned)

teacher_info.about_teacher:
As a patient and friendly teacher, my goal is to share my passion for teaching and explore various learning methods that best suit your needs. I can recommend engaging online resources, such as www.russianincontext.com and YouTube, where you can listen to Russian daily.

Effective communication is vital in my lessons, and you'll start speaking from the very first class. Visit my website, www.russianincontext.com, to discover my new courses, which cater to different levels: beginners (A1-A2), intermediate (A2-B1), and advanced (B1-C1). Let me know your current level, and I look forward to having you in my class.
teacher_info.teaching_style:

My classes are dynamic, interesting and customized accordingly to the student's goals and objectives. 
You will learn Russian that you can use in any situation and context. 
I will teach you not only to understand this language but also to talk in it.

pro_course_detail.description:
Here's what you can expect from my lessons:

Personalized lessons that cater to your needs.
A relaxed and encouraging learning environment.
A lot of speaking practice.
Feedback, corrections, and examples provided in Google Docs.
Systematic practice of grammar and new vocabulary in natural conversations.
Encouragement to express yourself in various ways to expand your vocabulary.
Emphasis on practical application rather than theory.
Options to work on reading, writing, and listening skills.
The choice to do homework if you prefer.

In our conversation classes, you have the opportunity to not only practice Russian but also to listen and comprehend it. These lessons revolve around topics that interest you or current events. While the primary focus is on conversation, I can still explain some grammar or conjugation points if needed. If you have a specific topic in mind, please don't hesitate to share it.

pro_course_detail.title: A1-A2 - Welcome, Absolute Beginners in Russian A1!
pro_course_detail.description:
Here's what you can expect from my lessons:

Personalized lessons that cater to your needs.
A relaxed and encouraging learning environment.
A lot of speaking practice.
Feedback, corrections, and examples provided in Google Docs.
Systematic practice of grammar and new vocabulary in natural conversations.
Encouragement to express yourself in various ways to expand your vocabulary.
Emphasis on practical application rather than theory.
Options to work on reading, writing, and listening skills.
The choice to do homework if you prefer.

Following our initial lesson, I am at your disposal 24/7 to address any questions you may have concerning our lessons or the Russian language.

I've also prepared a beginner's course for you, including 5 hours of audio and dialogues. You can access the course right here: https://www.russianincontext.com/product/russianfromthefirstday/

pro_course_detail.title: ONLY!  For the EXCLUSIVE use of students enrolled in the 'Improve Your Russian in 10 Days' Digital Course (A2-B1) - www.russianincontext.com
pro_course_detail.description:
How to become a student of this course? Easy! 

Visit my Homepage www.russianincontext.com

Choose the course "Improve your Russian in 10 days". 

Start the course - finish the course and book a lesson with me to practice. 

I am looking forward to get to know you better and practice with you.

pro_course_detail.title: A2 - Russian from the first day / Beginner¬¥s course / A2 - B2 Let us talk and have fun!
pro_course_detail.description:
In this course i will introduce you my special methode how to learn and to speak russian from the first day. 
Check my website https://www.russianincontext.com/
There you will find the podcast and videos for beginners (A1 - A2); 
intermediate (A2 - B1), 
advanced (B1 - C1).  

I prepared a beginner¬¥s course for you. 5 hours with audio and dialogues. At the moment you will find the course right here: https://www.patreon.com/russianincontext?fan_landing=true

Let your dream to come true. Let us make it happen. :-)
Start to speak some russian right now.

pro_course_detail.title: A2 - B2 Grammar Course: Verbs of Motion
pro_course_detail.description:
In this class, we will focus on practicing verbs of motion. For additional resources, please visit my website at https://www.russianincontext.com/. There, you can discover podcasts and videos tailored to intermediate learners (A2 - B1) and advanced learners (B1 - C1).

Furthermore, I've prepared a comprehensive digital course for you, which consists of 29 lessons featuring 65 videos (with approximately 6 hours of total duration). Each video comes with Russian subtitles, and you'll also have access to over 30 PDF documents, 52 practical exercises, pronunciation exercises, and a final test at the end of the course. You can access this course right here: https://www.russianincontext.com/product/course-3/

pro_course_detail.title: Lerne Deutsch mit mir! Alle Niveaus von A1 bis C1!  Learn German with Me! All Levels from A1 to C1
pro_course_detail.description:
The option to have a second teaching language like German is no longer available on Italki. However, through this platform, I can offer you the opportunity to learn German with me.

Deutsch ist nicht nur meine zweite Muttersprache, sondern auch die Sprache, die ich seit √ºber einem Jahrzehnt unterrichte. Lass es mich wissen, wenn du Interesse hast, gemeinsam zu lernen.

teacher_info.intro:
Hello! I'm a passionate English teacher with over 8 years of experience guiding students of all ages‚Äîfrom kids and teenagers to adults‚Äîtowards language fluency. My teaching philosophy is rooted in making English both accessible and enjoyable, with a strong focus on speaking and correct pronunciation. Whether you're looking to overcome language barriers or refine your conversational skills, I'm here to help you achieve your goals. Let's embark on this language-learning journey together and turn your English dreams into reality!

I study marketing and I like cinema, series, books and music.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I'm a native Spanish speaker who loves cultural exchange. I learned English and Portuguese by talking with natives. I work in a field that requires writing, so I have a keen eye for spelling and grammar. My colleagues ask me to review their texts.

As a tutor, I will help you improve your Spanish skills in a fun way. I will tailor the classes to your level, goals and interests. We will practice vocabulary, pronunciation, conversation and culture. I will give you feedback and tips to learn faster and better.

If you want to learn Spanish with a friendly, professional and enthusiastic tutor, book a trial class with me. You will love it. Let's speak Spanish!
teacher_info.teaching_style: My teaching method is based on immersion and conversation. I think the best way to learn a language is to use it in real situations and talk about what you love. That's why I create a friendly and relaxed atmosphere in my classes, where you can express yourself freely and confidently. I also adapt the content and the pace of the lessons to your level, goals and interests. You will learn vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation and culture while having fun and engaging discussions. Whether you want to travel, work, study or enjoy Spanish, I will help you achieve your dreams. Book a trial class with me today and discover the joy of learning Spanish. You won't regret it. Let's speak Spanish!

teacher_info.intro:
Hi :),
I'm Siamak from Kurdistan. I'm both a native Kurdish (Sorani dialect) & Persian (Farsi) speaker.

Long time ago when I was just an English student I went to various language schools, mostly boring & unproductive, forcing their students to memorize pointless grammar rules, doing boring drills, .. So I feel what most of you've been through!

I learned the ways that have been the most efficient, since then have employed those ways to help my students (different age groups, adults, kids, and business people)

Being patient allows me to adapt each students different pace in learning. I'm so excited to help you to learn, no matter what your purpose is, or how old you are.

*Learn effortlessly LIKE A NATIVE, without boring and pointless grammar rules.

Since I have been teaching 3 languages for many years, and have been a language learner as well, I'm familiar with challenges of learning a new language. On the other hand I believe language acquisition should replicate a natural approach that's why learning with me will be easy and quick.

teacher_info.intro:
‚úÖ  Speak the language from day 1!  

‚úÖ Hi, I am Jonathan, a vegan and animal lover. I am also a tutor of Spanish as a foreign language. I come from Ecuador (yes, home of the Galapagos Islands; that is right).

‚úÖ I have now been teaching Spanish for 8 years. My experience encompasses teaching Spanish to native speakers at schools in Ecuador, online tutoring to students from all over the world (mainly English speakers from the UK and US) and face-to-face tutoring of students in the Tunbridge Wells/Tonbridge area in the UK.

‚úÖ I graduated from the state University of Guayaquil in 2015 with a BSc. in Marketing and for which I wrote a dissertation on Second Language Acquisition.
teacher_info.short_signature: üî• Professional with a dissertation on Second Language Acquisition and 8 years of experience. üî•
teacher_info.introduction:
I am a successful language learner who taught himself English later in life (23 when I started out). I am of humble birth so work was always a priority and I never really had so much time or enough money to get my head down for hours to learn languages like polygosts or other successful language learners do. I have never been to any English speaking country either. I am just an average person like you

*My classes last 55 minutes as I need to get ready for a lesson right after yours*

HOW IT WORKS?
You will receive tailor-made support with enough flexibility to ensure that you get the best from your programme of study.

1) First, as a prospective student you will be interviewed for 30 minutes (trial lesson) to assess the following: - your current level of proficiency as well as the level of proficiency you wish to reach - the kind of Spanish you wish to focus on - the way you best tackle a foreign language (e.g. whether you are an auditory or visual learner).

2) From this interview, I come up with a recommendation in line with your needs. The purpose of this is to: make sure you have a clear understanding of what you are learning and aiming for - allow me to monitor whether you are advancing toward your previously agreed objectives.

3) You will be introduced to my online resources. I will provide you with the material necessary for class and self-study through Google Drive and email.

4) Lastly, once you have devised a programme to suit your needs, and provided that you can give total commitment to it, I guarantee that you will achieve your learning language goals. 

CANCELLATION POLICY
*You can be up to 15 minutes late for class. More than 15 minutes, the lesson will not take place.
*Scheduled lessons can be cancelled with at least 24 hours' notice. If you cancel a lesson with less than 24 hours' notice, I reserve the right to claim the ITCs. 
*It is up to the student to have the lesson with the camera on or off, and to ask for the same in return. Comfort counts.

‚úÖ I will accept any rescheduling requests with more than 24 hours notice. This gives me time to find another student to take your spot. If you reschedule with less than 24 hours notice or if you fail to attend the lesson, you will need to pay for the lesson in full. 
‚úÖ Please be on time. I often have back to back classes.

course_info.trial_description: Let‚Äôs take some time to get to know each other and determine if I‚Äôm the right tutor for you. It's important to find a tutor who not only understands the subject matter but also aligns with your learning style and goals. During our initial meeting, we can discuss your specific needs, challenges, and what you hope to achieve. I‚Äôll share my teaching approach, experience, and how I can help you reach your objectives. This way, we can both ensure that our collaboration will be effective and enjoyable. Finding the right tutor is crucial for your success, so let's explore whether we‚Äôre a good match and how I can best support you on your academic journey.

pro_course_detail.title: Cracking spanish: Modern and easy Spanish for daily life, all levels
pro_course_detail.description:
Join me to build a consistent foundation in your language learning path, improve your communication skills
- Useful vocabulary + expressions.
- Straightforward grammar: Focus on verbs, prepositions and collocations.
- Pronunciation.
- Listening, reading.
- emails and informal messaging.

pro_course_detail.title: **FLUENT IN 6 MONTHS**
pro_course_detail.description:
Using this guy's approach https://www.fluentin3months.com/hours-not-years/  I aim to get you fluent enough to get by in any spanish speaking country. If you are a regular or casual traveller or just happen to come out.
You will be introduced to a massive compilation of short clips with their respective transcripts, which we will explore and break down during our classes. This along with 'the communication approach' will improve your language skills dramatically
You must commit yourself to take a minimum of 4 lessons a week.

pro_course_detail.description: Para todos aquellos que desean platicar un rato sobre lo que sea. Podemos aclarar puntos sintacticos, hacer un poco de pronunciacion o lo que se te venga a la mente.

pro_course_detail.title: UK/US Life skills: General English for all purposes
pro_course_detail.description:
Native speakers may not always the best choice to learn English from because they never had to learn English as adults. They learnt their native language from a very early age, in different conditions from those you are in now. They can certainly tell you what 'sounds' right or wrong and give a sense of the flavour of their culture. Nevertheless, unless they're SUCCESSFUL language learners themselves, they won't be able to guide you through the techniques for/processes of effectively acquiring English or any other language. In a nutshell, at best they might be able to tell you 'what's wrong', but they might not be able to 'fix it'. 

Over the course of my lessons, I  will walk you through all manner of language learning TRICKS as well as the main implications of Second Language Acquisition (based on my own experience) whilst exploring the English language by your side. 

I look forward to meeting you soon! 

See you in our lessons.

**No children**
I'm a fun, relaxed teacher so don't worry about anything üòÄ
I have an MA in English with TEFL, a CELTA and I also hold an N2 qualification in Japanese. 
I have 10+ years' experience teaching in class and online.
I have taught grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking (including pronunciation) to students all over the world.
I want you to talk more than me, so I will always encourage you to speak as much as you can.  Don't be afraid to make mistakes, the more mistakes the better.

I can also teach basic to intermediate  Japanese.  This can be taught either in English or in straight Japanese for a more immersive experience!

pro_course_detail.description:
This lesson will help prepare you for the IELTS speaking and writing exams. 
Most students are able to train themselves to do the reading/listening parts of the test, but not for the speaking and writing parts. 

We will focus on grammar and fluency, especially idiomatic language, pronunciation, vocabulary and so on.

pro_course_detail.title: ***CURRENT STUDENTS ONLY ***
pro_course_detail.description:
***New students > PLEASE DO NOT BOOK***
This is for  current students who I have had many lessons with before. 



Here we will talk using natural English to improve your speaking and listening ability.  To do this we will use topics ranging from a wide range of areas. 
News articles to improve your vocabulary.  
Conversation topics to discuss ideas and your thoughts.  
Pictures to talk about what you see and how you can put it into words.  
With these, we can increase your vocabulary and comprehension.
 In these lessons, you will do most of the talking :).

teacher_info.intro: I'm a 27 year old English teacher, who loves travelling and meeting new people. One of my greatest pleasures in life is learning about different cultures and lifestyles, which is what inspired my decision to start teaching English as a foreign language. In my free time, I love running and keeping active outdoors!
teacher_info.short_signature: üëãExperienced and certified TEFL Teacher from London, UK.
teacher_info.about_me: I'm a 27 year old English teacher, who loves travelling and meeting new people. One of my greatest pleasures in life is learning about different cultures and lifestyles, which is what inspired my decision to start teaching English as a foreign language. In my free time, I love running and keeping active outdoors!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hi, I'm Molly and I'm a TEFL-qualified English teacher with five years of teaching experience. I'm originally from London, UK, but I am currently based in Barcelona where I teach English to both children and adults. I have experience giving classes to people of all ages - from 5 to 70 years old! I am able to adapt my methodology, vocabulary, and speed to the requirements and abilities of my students. If your aim is to refine your conversation skills in English, then let's have a class together and I will provide discussion topics to expand your vocabulary AND your confidence!
If you don't see a time that suits you on my calendar, message me and I'll try my best to adapt to your schedule :)
teacher_info.teaching_style: The main objective of all my classes is to empower my students to feel confident in speaking English. No matter what their level is, I want my students to feel confident in speaking the language to the best of their ability. I achieve this goal by ensuring my classes are always engaging and using vocabulary and grammar relevant to the needs of my student. From the first class, I will ask you what your language goals are so I can curate a lesson-by-lesson plan to achieve them with you. For example, if you are moving to an English-speaking country, I will ensure you are equipped to handle all day-to-day scenarios - from doctor's appointments to haircuts!

exp_info.description: In this role, I was responsible for planning and teaching conversation classes to children aged 5-18 years old. The objective of these classes was to encourage students to provide students with a fun and engaging opportunity to speak English and to improve their pronunciation and vocabulary.

I am responsible for teaching English speaking classes to students aged 5-18. This means creating activities to encourage students to feel confident speaking English, and to enhance their pronunciation and vocabulary. A key skill required for this role is to be able to adapt my methodology to the level of my students.

cert_info.institution: La Universidad Internacional Isabel I de Castilla
cert_info.certificate: Advanced Teaching English as Foreign Language

cert_info.description: This certificate verifies my completion of my role as a Language Assistant in Escola Pia, Vilanova i la Geltru.

sorted_cert_info.certificate: Advanced Teaching English as Foreign Language
sorted_cert_info.institution: La Universidad Internacional Isabel I de Castilla

sorted_cert_info.description: This certificate verifies my completion of my role as a Language Assistant in Escola Pia, Vilanova i la Geltru.

course_info.trial_description: In this class, I will ask you about your language objectives to determine how best I can help you achieve them!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation
pro_course_detail.description:
These conversation classes will challenge you and your vocabulary, to make sure you're able to go beyond talking about your day or explaining your hobbies.
After verifying your level in our first class together, I like to give podcasts or videos with comprehension/discussion questions for you to listen and answer between our classes. This way, when we speak you can put into practice the new vocabulary you've heard AND practice expressing opinions on more complex topics. 
I'm always open and happy to adapt my style to your needs and preferences, so book a class with me and let's see how I can help you :)

pro_course_detail.title: Children's classes :)
pro_course_detail.description:
Classes centred around activities, vocabulary, and most importantly having fun speaking English! Perfect for children who have a low-level, and need help feeling more confident with the language.
Please book these for any children under 16/with a level below B1.

teacher_info.intro:
Bonjour ! 
Je m'appelle Christophe.
I've been teaching on iTalki for over 7 years.

Why do i love to teach french language?
I work as a promoter in high-tech products sales for many customers, and communication is important to analyse the needs of people and to develop exchange based on confidence, trust.

I also love to communicate and discover new people, new culture related to my different trips in the world, people who are eager to learn a foreign language, and i love to show how easy it is to learn a language using my natural style in teaching related to my experience of my job :)
teacher_info.short_signature: Learning french has never been so entertaining ;)
teacher_info.introduction:
Bonjour tout le monde !

I was born in Paris and I love the communication and the interaction I have with customers from different countries in my job as a promoter and that's what pushed me to teach French to other people eager to improve their skills in a natural way.

I have been teaching for over three years on italki.com as a tutor and it is always an enjoyable and entertaining experience to have exchanges with people from all over the world ready to learn new stuff.‚Ää

My interest is to teach my language with beginners/intermediates/non native speakers and to break the barrier language, :)

So, what are you waiting for? Put your shoes on! Go for it! Aim for the top!
teacher_info.about_me:
Bonjour ! 
Je m'appelle Christophe.
I've been teaching on iTalki for over 7 years.

Why do i love to teach french language?
I work as a promoter in high-tech products sales for many customers, and communication is important to analyse the needs of people and to develop exchange based on confidence, trust.

I also love to communicate and discover new people, new culture related to my different trips in the world, people who are eager to learn a foreign language, and i love to show how easy it is to learn a language using my natural style in teaching related to my experience of my job :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Come and learn REAL natural french with me!
Don't be shy, speak out your mind, i'll be glad to help you improve your french!

I'm very thankful to my students for their feedback and for trusting me :)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My lesson is mainly based on conversation, speaking or oral showing the good ways on right pronunciation, on right natural sound of french language and using different forms of language (formal language versus real life language, slangs).

All along the conversation i can type and write the right spelling of words which can be used in different context when needed.

course_info.trial_description:
Let's start easy and let's introduce ourselves with simple and efficient talk :)
I will be patient and will guide you ;)

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation practice
pro_course_detail.description: Lesson focused on conversation development using different forms of language (formal language versus real life language, slangs) in real natural french language :)

pro_course_detail.title: Perfect french!
pro_course_detail.description:
Lesson only focused on perfect pronunciation, accentuation, liaisons between words with specific sentences of current french language.

Suitable for experienced and experimented students feeling comfortable with conversation and who want to polish as best as possible their oral french!

Audio can be provided on specific french words on request after the lesson.

pro_course_detail.title: Listening, spelling, speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description: Lesson focused on the right listening of words/sentences, on the way it should be understood from an oral natural french, and on the right spelling of words/sentences so the student can try to comprehend and to pronounce them naturally.

teacher_info.teaching_style:
Class tool recommended : Tencent meeting
Teaching style : 
1. I pay a lot of attention to the interaction. To make you understand well every grammar points, I will give you examples and then ask you to make another one, to make sure that you completely have mastery of the rules of this language. I am a very patient teacher.
2. As the supervisor of HSK, HSKK, and YCT exams in 2018-2020, and a deeply passionate and patient teacher, I'd love to give you practical advices during the class. 
Welcome!

This is a class by which you can find if my teaching style is suitable for you, and we can get to know each other. Which is your level? What are you good at and vice versa. Then fix together a goal of learning, for exemple, if you want to improve your pronunciation, we will emphasize this part for the following lessons as you wish.
Besides, I can teach you one grammar point or pronunciation note on this class, so it could be more easy for you to find that if we match or not. 
Welcome!

pro_course_detail.title: Beginners/ HSK/HSKK 1-2 class (materials provided)
pro_course_detail.description:
We will follow HSK 1-2 text books and focus on the exam preparing, so textbooks, exercises, practice test will be provided during the class. 
1. Teaching method: Official textbooks will help you to prepare it systematically, and I will help you to reinforce the foundation on  vocabulary, grammar, difficult sentences, pronunciation, aural comprehension and conversation practice. I'll give you homework and correct them, then find and solve any problems you may have in your homework, which is a key to improve and difficult to realize all by oneself. 
2. Practice and exam: As the supervisor of HSK, HSKK, and YCT exams in 2018-2020, and a deeply passionate and patient teacher, I can give you practical advices during your preparation. 
3. Teaching style: I pay a lot of attention to the interaction. To make you understand well every grammar point, I will give you examples and then ask you to make another one, to make sure that you completely have mastery of the rules of this language. I‚Äôm a so-patient teacher. Any questions about Chinese or Chinese culture are welcome!

teacher_info.intro:
Ciao, I'm Alessia, I'm 30 and I'm currently located Brindisi in the beautiful Puglia region  (the heel of our bootüë¢ ).
I've studied Chinese and Linguistics in London - where I lived for 3 years- and currently I'm studying Cultural Anthropology.  I started to teach Italian in 2015 in China, where I lived for a year, and took a teaching certification in 2020 in Italy. 
I am a passionate reader, a foodie and wine lover and I love discovering new music.
My goal is to make your journey into the Italian language as enjoyable as possible and help you to achieve your goals.


*** Please notice that I have few spots left for new students until December 2024. ***

teacher_info.about_me:

teacher_info.about_teacher:
I'm a student-centered teacher , meaning that I put you and your needs at the center of my lesson plan. 
As a language learner myself, I know that learning a new language can be tough and frustrating at times so I try to put this awareness into my teaching. I like to encourage my students and guide them  during their learning process.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I will take into account your personal interests and try to put those interests into our lessons. I like using different material - depending also on the language level of the student - such as textbooks, short movies, music, audio material, grammar textbook, games, flashcards and so on. 

Of course my teaching style can vary a lot depending on the student's needs and goals.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! I'm Jaime, your Spanish teacher on italki. With over 6 years of experience on this platform and ELE certifications from the Cervantes Institute, I'm passionate about teaching Spanish in a fun and effective way. I specialize in connecting with both children and adults, tailoring lesson plans to their levels and ages. I've seen 6-year-old students go from not speaking Spanish to conversing fluently, teenagers improve their grades, and adults feel more confident in their progress. You can verify this in the testimonials from my students. In my video and profile, you'll see my creativity, which adds extra value to my classes. Book a trial class and discover it for yourself!
teacher_info.short_signature: Complete study plan with TEXTBOOK, VIDEO GAMES, and PDF assignments INCLUDED in the classes.
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, my name is Jaime and here is something about me.  As a volunteer teacher I teach people about principles that help them improve their life. I am a professional translator. I translate from Spanish and English to sign language. Those experiences have given me qualities to teach you as a Spanish native tutor.
Nobody knows everything but I will always try to give you the confidence you need to speak clearly and to improve your listening skills.
Just try it and see for yourself.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! I'm Jaime, your Spanish teacher on italki. With over 6 years of experience on this platform and ELE certifications from the Cervantes Institute, I'm passionate about teaching Spanish in a fun and effective way. I specialize in connecting with both children and adults, tailoring lesson plans to their levels and ages. I've seen 6-year-old students go from not speaking Spanish to conversing fluently, teenagers improve their grades, and adults feel more confident in their progress. You can verify this in the testimonials from my students. In my video and profile, you'll see my creativity, which adds extra value to my classes. Book a trial class and discover it for yourself!
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a dedicated Spanish teacher with a unique approach tailored to both children and adults. My program includes the "Espa√±ol en casa" series, featuring fun and engaging textbooks like "Explorers," "Adventurers," and "Champions," each with approximately 30 lessons. Classes incorporate interactive Wordwall games, PDF activities, homework, and a reward system to ensure effective learning. For adults, I offer a structured curriculum from A1 to B1 levels. My goal is to make learning Spanish enjoyable and effective, helping students achieve fluency through a well-rounded and motivating program.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer personalized study plans for children aged 6 to 10, featuring captivating homework assignments including interactive games and activities for parents to participate in. I also provide customized plans for students of different Spanish proficiency levels, incorporating diverse resources like readings, audios, and videos to enhance their skill development.

Adapting to my students' individual needs is my specialty. Whether it's providing tutoring sessions, speech training, exam preparation, exploring topics related to travel and culture, or facilitating conversation practice, I am equipped to cater to their unique requirements.

exp_info.description: Worked as a Spanish coach, facilitating online conversation sessions with students from various U.S. universities. Focused on improving students' fluency and cultural understanding through dynamic, contextualized conversational methods.

Coordinated the coaching team in Honduras, overseeing performance and ensuring quality standards in learning sessions. Implemented communication protocols and enhanced team efficiency, contributing to the success of the online conversational program.

exp_info.job: LinguaMeeting - Quality Manager and Coach Support
exp_info.description: As Quality Manager, ensured that all coaches met the required quality standards, providing continuous support and training. Additionally, in the role of Coach Support, provided assistance to coaches outside of Honduras, facilitating problem resolution and ensuring consistency in session delivery.

Managed LinguaMeeting's cultural immersion program, coordinating activities and experiences that enriched students' learning, integrating cultural elements into conversation sessions for greater understanding and appreciation of the language.

teaching_experience.description: Teach online Spanish classes, adapting content to the needs of each student. I use interactive and personalized methods, integrating teaching materials and digital resources to effectively teach speakers of different levels.

teaching_experience.position: Volunteer - Literacy and Sign Language Teaching
teaching_experience.description: As a volunteer, I have worked on literacy programs for the deaf, teaching sign language and developing essential communication skills. I implemented educational programs focused on inclusion and access to education for the deaf, in collaboration with a specialized translation center.

Developed a course consisting of three books designed to teach Spanish to children. pro_course_detail.title: Beginner level Spanish course for teenagers and adults.
pro_course_detail.description:
Beginner level Spanish course for teenagers and adults. Description

Our Spanish language teaching program is designed for students at A1, A2, and B1 levels, providing a clear structure and high-quality resources for language learning. We use materials from well-known sites such as StudySpanish and ProfeDeELE to ensure that students have access to relevant and well-developed content.

Program Levels

Level A1: Focuses on the fundamentals of Spanish, including basic vocabulary and elementary grammar. Students will learn to introduce themselves, talk about their surroundings, and perform simple interactions. Each level consists of approximately 30 one-hour lessons.

Level A2: Expands on the knowledge acquired at Level A1, introducing more complex grammatical structures and additional vocabulary. Students will be able to describe past experiences and express simple opinions. Each level consists of approximately 30 one-hour lessons.

Level B1: Designed to consolidate and expand language skills. Students will learn to handle more complex situations, discuss topics of interest, and understand longer and more detailed texts. Each level consists of approximately 30 one-hour lessons.

Resources and Practices

Each level includes a variety of resources and practices tailored to learning relevant vocabulary and grammar. The activities are carefully selected to ensure structured and effective learning. Additionally, students will receive homework based on the activities of each level to reinforce their learning.

At the end of each level, students will take a level test provided by T√≠a Tula to assess their progress and ensure they are ready to advance to the next level.

Program Objective

Our program aims to provide a structured learning experience, helping students see their progress clearly and stay motivated. With continuous practice and assessment, we focus on ensuring each student achieves solid Spanish proficiency appropriate to their level.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Lesson Style: Informal

My English conversation practice lessons might be what you need if you want:
- to practice speaking and listening in an informal, conversational way 
- to improve the flow of your speech 
- to become more confident and comfortable speaking
- to improve your listening comprehension   
- to practice without detailed grammar lessons or homework

You are welcome to suggest a topic before our lesson. We can talk about day-to-day life, or I can prepare some conversation topics of interest for you. We can talk through common scenarios such as booking a hotel room or ordering in a restaurant. We can also read articles together to work on pronunciation and new vocabulary.  As always, it is up to you. Our lessons will be tailored to your goals and needs. 

I look forward to our conversation!

teacher_info.about_teacher: Ken's ability to hold and keep conversations going is his best asset as a teacher. You don't have to worry about awkward silences, because he guides the class with thoughtful questions that allow the students to think deeply about their answers, which is good for strengthening the skill of  thinking in English. Ken is also a great typer, which allows him send any mistakes that occur directly to the student to ensure the student understands the mistake and how to fix it. Pronunciation is one of his strong points and has various strategies that has worked very well with his prior students. Despite all that, Ken maintains a very laid back and calm demeanor throughout his classes.
teacher_info.teaching_style: For every lesson, in-class typed out corrections are always provided. Free talk with corrections is the most common lesson Ken teaches. This tests student's ability to speak freely on common daily topics to improve the student's conversational speed. Online conversation topics is another type of lesson Ken provides. These lessons encourage the student to speak on deeper topics which strengthens the student's ability to describe complex ideas, use uncommon vocabulary, and think critically. One more would be daily news articles which are good for introducing new vocabulary, checking pronunciation, discussing the student's views and opinions. Ken is also open to any class the student suggests

course_info.trial_description:
Self introduction Practice+ Small talk 101
Introductions are an important part of English, and life in general. Teacher Ken will guide the student in perfecting their introduction and small talk skills. 

Student Objectives:
1.) The student will introduce themselves and answer various questions about their lives. 
2.) The student will introduce their English language background and preferences for the next class. 
3.) The student will learn, gain confidence, and have some fun

Teacher Objectives:
1.) The teacher will challenge the student to talk deeper on various topics about themselves
2.) The teacher will analyze the student's abilities and provide corrections/feedback
3.) The teacher will introduce various materials that will fit the student's needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and ways to make the student's english sound more natural
pro_course_detail.description: Do you find yourself getting stuck when talking about various topics in English?  If so, it might be due to the challenge of trying to think in English, and this could be a great class for you. These classes are taught in a very open style. The discussion could range from everyday life topics (How was work, holiday plans, future goals etc.)  to online materials to guide the conversation. The goal is to challenge the student into talking deeply about each topic which will encourage the student to strengthen their ability to think in English. This class in includes in-class corrections that cover: Pronunciation, grammar, vocabulary, and ways to make the student's english sound more natural.

pro_course_detail.title: News Corner! "What's your thoughts on...?"
pro_course_detail.description: This class is great for students that want to improve their vocabulary, pronunciation, and ability to speak their mind/opinion on current events. While covering the article any mispronunciations are covered as well as the meaning of new words.  After the article, a discussion is had by the student and tutor. Students are encourage to not hold back and talk about their true feelings about the article in detail. This class is great for learners seeking new words (meanings and pronunciation), general pronunciation, how to express themselves, describe complex ideas, and to think deeply in English.

For four years I have been an online tutor, and have experience teaching children, adults, and students. I do have my 120-hour advanced practical TEFL/TESL certificate with distinction. 

My previous teaching experience includes mentoring adults, one year of experience as a lecturer, and teaching small children. For the past four years, I have thoroughly enjoyed teaching online and my students consider me to be patient and kind.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I do have a neutral English accent, and speak slowly and clearly making it easy for my students to understand what I am saying. Students have a choice of either having informal conversations with me or more structured lessons where I can provide worksheets and homework etc. I do customize my lessons according to the student's level, their language needs, and their interests. 

For children, I do use the TPR method to teach which includes the creative use of props, games, songs, and other teaching materials. For me, lessons should be fun and interactive as this stimulates the mind allowing students to learn English faster and finding the lessons rewarding.

pro_course_detail.description:

Learning English with me is not boring, but fun and rewarding! I am an outgoing and cheerful person who loves teaching and motivating students to achieve their goals. I live in South Africa which is also known as the Rainbow Nation as we have many different ethnic groups, cultures, and languages. 

I am a native English speaker with a clear, neutral accent, making it far easier for students to understand what I am saying. I teach students of all ages and all levels so it doesn't matter if you are a beginner or advanced. My lessons are customized to the student's needs and I create a personalized and goal-orientated learning plan. 

For me, my students must be comfortable, relaxed, and have fun during their lessons as this allows the student to learn far quicker. I truly care about my students and aim to be helpful and understanding. Each student is unique and so should be the way they're taught. 

It will be great to hear your reason for wanting to learn English and how I can assist you in reaching your goals! To begin you can simply book a trial lesson with me. course_info.trial_description:
Join me 30-minute trial lesson! In this session, we will focus on essential conversation skills. You will learn simple greetings, introductions, and common phrases that you can use in everyday situations. This 30-minute trial lesson will help us assess your level and work with you to plan your future lessons and how you would like to study.

pro_course_detail.title: JLPT Success!
pro_course_detail.description:
In this 60-minute focused lesson, we will cover key grammar points, vocabulary, and reading comprehension skills required for any JLPT level you are aiming for, from N5 to N1. This lesson is perfect for students who are serious about passing the JLPT and want to practice specific skills needed for the test.

pro_course_detail.title: General Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
In this 60-minute lesson we will practise everyday conversation. 
Learn the Japanese we use from the moment we wake up in the morning until we go to bed at night. How to book hotels and restaurants, how to ask for directions, and much more! Please let me know if you have any topic preference when you book this lesson! Let's have fun and practice Japanese together!

pro_course_detail.title: Business Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
In this 60-minute lesson, we will practise business conversation. 
Practice how to introduce yourself, set up meetings, and give presentations. Let me know if you are looking to learn something specific when you book this lesson!

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Samuel and I am from Cameroon in Central Africa. 

I consider myself a friendly, outgoing and adventurous person, who remains constantly amazed by the diversity of the world. I enjoy travelling to new places around my country and meeting new people. Aside from that my other hobbies are  sports, music and watching movies.

I hope to get the chance to travel to foreign countries in the future and learn about new cultures, so I consider this platform as a means to do that from the comfort of my home. Becoming a teacher of something I love, then just seems as a natural continuity of things !
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Samuel and I am from Cameroon in Central Africa. 

I consider myself a friendly, outgoing and adventurous person, who remains constantly amazed by the diversity of the world. I enjoy travelling to new places around my country and meeting new people. Aside from that my other hobbies are  sports, music and watching movies.

I hope to get the chance to travel to foreign countries in the future and learn about new cultures, so I consider this platform as a means to do that from the comfort of my home. Becoming a teacher of something I love, then just seems as a natural continuity of things !
teacher_info.about_teacher: I believe I am a fun, passionate and adaptative teacher. To me the key of every lesson is making every student feel comfortable, create a connection and motivate him or her to reach the objectives that were set, or even higher ! I also truly believe patience and understanding are key to improve one's proficiency, and out of everything, listening is the golden tool! I know all the challenges it takes to learn or improve in a specific language so I believe the right attitude, patience, determination and passion are the best secrets to achieve it!
teacher_info.teaching_style: My lessons are entirely personalized to every single student according to the goals and proficiency the student has or is seeking. Whether beginner, intermediate or advanced, the lessons will be structured according to each specific need and interest. I believe oral communication through audiovisual content and interacting about different topics are the key to acquire a natural feeling for the language and remove this dreaded fear of making mistakes !

course_info.trial_description: This lesson will be like a preview of a real lesson with me. So we shall discuss your level and learning goals and I will show you how we could do lessons according to your needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational French
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we shall discuss anything that interests you. I am fun and interested in so many things, so we certainly won't lack what to talk about. But it may happen that we run out of what to talk about, don't worry, I got you covered. I have interesting articles on a variety of topics that we could read and discuss.

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar/vocabulary
pro_course_detail.description: in this lesson, we shall study general french grammar and vocabulary. We shall focus on key points of french grammar according to your level and needs

pro_course_detail.title: French for Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we shall start from the basis of the french language to enable the student to get impregnated with the language eventually. The learning method will be very relaxed I will be providing you reading with the adequate material necessary for your apprentice. I hope to see you soon.
